rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ nyi ma bdun tu stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na nges par 'ong ste/ gal te ma 'ongs na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'dis brgya byin mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing pang na gnas pa blangs te

ster bar byed do/ /gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing dum bu brgyar 'jig la rang gi rigs rgyud rnams brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong ste/ gzhon nu mngag gzhug

par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu'i gdon thams cad bran du 'gyur zhing che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig /che ge mo sod cig ces smras na de dag thams cad byed do/ /tshogs kyi bdag po mnan te/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma

bdun na myur du 'ong ste/ gal te ma 'ongs na rigs rgyud brlag cing 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /log 'dren thams cad mngag gzhug mar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te brgyad stong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong ste rgyal

srid ster ro/ /gal te ma 'ongs na 'chi ba 'am rang gi brgyud brlag par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mnan te brgyad stong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na myur du 'ong zhing mngag gzhug par 'gyur la gser srang brgya ster ro/ /gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas

shing skams te 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /rang gi rigs dang rgyud phung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /'di ni zla ba 'khor du bsgrub par bshad pa'o/ /'jig byed rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas yang

mtshan mo mchod pa chen po byas te/ sha chen pos mchod pa byas nas sha chen po'i gtor ma byas te sha chen po nyid dang til gyis mar me rab tu sbyar te/ nam phyed na sgra chen po byung ste drag du rgod cing bsdad nas kye skyes bu chen po
'di bza' yis slang cig ces zer ro/ /des skrag par mi bya'o ste/ gal te skrag par gyur na yi ge hU~M bzlas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs byed 'khor dang bcas pa bran du 'gyur ro/ /khams

gsum pa'i rgyal srid ster zhing yi ge hU~M bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i lha thams cad 'joms so/ /gar gyi dbang phyug rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ nyi ma bdun du brgyad stong bzlas na skad cig de la 'ong zhing mngag gzhug par 'gyur

ro/ /gal te ma 'ongs na skams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nag po chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te 'ong ngo / /gal te ma 'ongs na skad cig

de nyid la 'chi zhing rang gi rigs rgyud phung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha nag po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /gdong bzhi pa phyug po'i khang par song ste/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas khri

phrag bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te 'ong ngo / /gal te ma 'ongs na rigs dang rgyud brlag par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad kyis g.yog 'khor du 'gyur la/ rgyab du zhon na mtho ris su yang 'khyer

ro/ /pang pa na gnas pa blangs nas ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len bzang po ster ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
po las mngag gzhug bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzogs s+ho// // de nas stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa'i bran mo sgrub

pa'i thabs khro bo nyid kyis mi rnams la phan pa'i don du gsungs pa dngos grub kyi mchog bshad par bya ste/ le lo can dang sdig pa byed pa dang brdzun du smra bas kyang 'grub par byed do/ /tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / zang zing spangs

pa dang tshangs par spyod pa la rtag tu gnas pa dang / rtag tu khro bo'i bzlas pa la gnas pas 'byung mo dang / klu mo dang gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod na sngags kyi tshogs kyis dgug pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /lha mo u ma sgrub

par byed pa rnams la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bkur du mar bya bar bshad pa'o/ /dang por bsgrub par bya zhing de'i 'og tu dngos grub kyi mchog bzang po rig 'dzin dang / phyogs kyi bdag po dang nor gyi char dang /
gter chen po dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bum pa bzang po la sogs pa dang gnod sbyin mo'i bsgrub pa dang / sha za mo dang sa la 'joms ma la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang

'grub na/ tha mal pa 'byung mo bran du bya ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po 'dul byed kyi rgyud chen po la ni bsgrub pa po rtag tu khro bo'i bzlas pa la gnas na

slob dpon la smod pa dang / lha thams cad la smod pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / thams cad du dam tshig nyams pa dang med pa dang sngags dang rgyud spangs pas kyang gal te 'dod na nges par de'i mod la myur du 'grub

par 'gyur bar khro bo nyid kyis gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i sgrub pa'i

thabs gsungs pa/ dang por re shig bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par byed pa bran po dang / bran mo thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po bzlas pa tsam gyis myur du 'grub par byed pa/

don yod cing bgegs 'joms la grub par byed pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams so/ /oM hrIHhU~M ka T+ya ka T+ya che ge mo hU~M hU~M hU~M dzaH khro bo 'di dang bcas pas brgyad brgya bzlas pa tsam gyis myur du 'ong ste thams cad bran dang bran mor
'gyur ro/ /gal te ma 'ongs na spyi bo 'gas shing skams te 'chi la/ rigs dang rang gi rigs rgyud brlag par 'gyur ro/ /'byung mo'i gzugs ba lang gi gi'u wang gis bris te/ rkang pa g.yon pas

mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na skad cig de la kye ma kye ma zhes zer zhing 'ong ste/ 'gum mo 'gum mo/ /kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsol zhes zer ro/ /sgrub pa pos kye 'byung mo bdag gi khol mo gyis shig ces smras na de

khol mo'i las thams cad byed do/ /gro ba'i shun pa la ba lang gi gi'u wang gis gzugs brnyan bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de'i mod la 'ong ngo / /gal te de'i mod la ma 'ongs na yungs

kar gyis kha la bsnun cing sgra chen pos bskul na 'byung mo de rims drag pos 'chi'o/ /phyir gso ba ni mar dang / sbrang rtsi khar bcug na slar 'tsho'o/ /'byung mo 'dis bran mo'i las byed cing sgrub pa po bdag nyid dang

gsum la gos dang / rgyan dang bza' ba nyi ma re re ster ro/ /gtsug lag khang gi sgor song ste/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'dis ba lang mo'i blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo 'ong ste/ 'ongs pa la gtor ma byin na sdug pa

ngas ci bya zhes smra'o/ /ma gyis shig ces bsgo na ma dang 'dra bar yongs su skyong zhing bdag nyid dang lnga la gos dang / rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bran mo bsgrub
pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u rdzogs s+ho// // de nas mchog tu gsang ba shin tu gsang ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ste/
dbul po rnams la phan pa'i don du dngos grub kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ khro bo nyid kyi gsungs pa'o/ /de la 'byung mo rnams kyi ming bshad pa/ rgyan can ma dang rna can ma dang / do shal can ma dang /

seng ge ma dang / rgod byed ma dang gar byed ma dang / dga' ba ma dang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / lha mo rnams so/ /'byung mo brgyad po rnams chung mar don du gnyer ram/ mar gnyer ram/ yang na sring mor gnyer
na sgrub pa po shing gcig par song ste/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas nas bzlas pa'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas/ gu gul gyi bdug pa byin te bzlas na/ de nas nam

phyed kyi dus su rgyan can ma nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i yon chab byin na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ma dang sring mo dang chung mar 'gyur te/ gang mngon par 'dod pa de smra bar bya'o/ /gal te

mar gyur na ni 'khor brgyad brgya'i gos dang / rgyan dang bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro/ /gal te chung mar gyur na ni dong tshe stong stong ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster ro/ /gal te sring mor gyur na ni

dpag tshad stong nas bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster la lha'i gter ster ro/ /mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste khri bzlas na/ bzlas pa'i mthar rna cha dang / do shal can
gyi 'byung mo nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la khrag gi mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ma gyis shig ces sgo na ma dang 'dra bar yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /mtshan mo lha khang stong par song

ste khri bzlas na 'byung mo do shal can myur du 'ongs so/ /'ongs pa la chags pa spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba bcu gnyis yongs su skyong bar byed cing dong tse nyi shu rtsa lnga dang ras zung gcig

ster ro/ /de nas seng ge ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa mtshan mo ling ka gcig par song ste khri bzlas na rang nyid 'ongs shing kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsal zhes smra zhing sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na

lha'i dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing dong tse brgyad dang ras zung gcig ster ro/ /de nas rgod byed ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ phyag na rdo rje'i khang par song ste/ phyag na rdo rje dang nye bar 'dab ma la

bris la/ ka ra bI ra'i me tog byin te/ nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du rings par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na kye sgrub pa po bka' ci stsal zhes smra'o/ /sgrub pa

pos bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces brjod na rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing ras dang rgyan dang / bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro/ /de ma lus pa zad pa byas te gal te cung zad bzhag na phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

mtshan mo gzhal yas khang skyed par byed do/ /de nas gar byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste/ brgyad stong bzlas nas nyi ma bdun na mchod pa chen po byas la nyi ma shar ba tsam

gyis bzlas pa rdzogs par bya ste/ tsan dan gyi bdug pa byin nas yang bzlas na nam phyed kyi dus na nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gser srang brgya mal du dor nas

tho rangs kyis 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du nyi ma re re rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de yang ma lus pa zad par byas te/ gal te cung zad lus na phyin chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bran mo chen mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi

cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa bzlas pa tsam gyis rtag tu 'grub cing sbyin bsreg kyi las mi dgos la sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas phyag na rdo rjes ji ltar gsungs pa ltar skad cig de la 'grub pa'i dga' byed

ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo rang gi khyim sgor bzlas na nyi ma gsum na nges par 'ong ngo / /bran mo'i las byed cing sa bon thams cad dang zhing gi las dang khyim gyi bya ba la sogs pa sgrub par

byed do/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrubs pa'i thabs bshad pa/ sha'i zas khyer te ma mo'i gnas su song nas mtshan mo nya dang shas bya ba byas te/ lan stong bzlas na nyi ma bdun na nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la

khrag gi mchod yon byin na bdag po bka' ci stsal zhes smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos lha mo chung mar gyur cig ces smras na chung mar 'gyur zhing re ba thams cad skong la rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /de nas lha mo'i

sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo lha mo'i khang par song ste/ stan bshams la tsan dan dkar po dang sna ma'i me tog gis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mthar nges par

'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la 'khyud pa dang / 'o byas pa dang / ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa byas na lha mo gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chung mar 'gyur ro/ /dong tse brgyad dang / ras

zung gcig dang / gnas rnams dang / bza' ba mang po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa la ster ro/ /'di nyid kyis rnam thos sras kyi khang par 'dug na gsang ba'i mtha' dang bzlas pa'i mtha' la shin du myur bar rdzas
blangs nas ster bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// //
dpal rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs lha chen po thams cad gsod par byed pa'i sngags kyi tshig gsungs pa/ oM ha na ha na sarba

mA ra ya badzra dz+wa le hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rnon po 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pas gang bar gyur to/ /hU~M ha na phaT/

de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'-i lha thams cad dang rig 'dzin du ma dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang yi dgas dang lha'i

bu mo dang / sha za dang dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dum bu brgyar byas te dgug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la

sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa yang 'khor der 'dus pa rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i tshe ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdug pa
dang / lha thams cad tshar gcod pa ni legs so legs so/ /de nas lha'i bu mo rnams langs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi snying po phul ba/

oM shrI zla ba'i lha mo'i'o/ /oM shrI thig le mchog ma'i'o/ oM shrI gser gyi phreng ba ma'i'o/ /oM shrI 'khyil pa'i phreng ba ma'i'o/ /oM hU~M rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o/ /oM sa/ rtsom pa mo'i'o/ /oM sru/ brang
na gnas pa ma'i'o/ /oM ba~M dpal rgyan can ma'i'o/ /de nas lha'i bu mo brgyad kyi dngos grub kyi bsgrub pa thams cad kyi cho ga bshad pa/ ri'i rtse mo la song ste 'bum bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu spar nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs lha mo rang nyid 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na dga' tshig smra bar

byed do/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras na dngos grub kyi rdzas dang / dngul chu dang bcud kyis len la sogs pa ster ro/ /de'i bcud kyis len gyis ni lo stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas thig le

mchog ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa tsan dan dang / 'o ma'i zas la khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun na mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ri'i rtse mor song la mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par

'ong ste/ cung zad rgod pas chags pa byas nas mdun du sdod do/ /'khyud pa dang 'o byas shing dga' bas chags par byas nas 'di ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de ster zhing rgyab du zhon na mtho ris su yang

'khyer bar byed do/ /gzhan yang rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /de nas gser gyi phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste/ nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa

la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ste/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /de nas 'khyil ba'i phreng ba ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs

kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ tshes grangs mi dgos shing rgyu skar yang mi dgos la/ smyung ba yang mi dgos par 'grub par byed pa ste/ ri'i rtse mor song ste khri bzlas na de nam phyed na nges par 'ong ngo / /chung

mar 'gyur la dong tse stong ster zhing / dngul chu dang bcud kyis len dang / grub pa'i rdzas ster ro/ /de nas rin chen phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ lha'i khang par song ste zla ba gcig tu stong phrag brgyad brgyad

bzlas nas zla ba de'i tha ma la zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra chen pos 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin nas lha mo legs par 'ongs sam zhes smras na bdag po bdag

gis ci bya zhes zer te sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na chung ma'i las byed cing lha mos 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/ /lo stong 'tsho bar byed do/ /de nas rtsom pa mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ tshes

gcig la brtsams te mchod pa byas nas tsan dan gyi chus dkyil 'khor byas te gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas shing zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas nas mtshan thog

thag bzlas na nges par 'ong ngo / /gal te myur du ma 'ongs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na chung mar 'gyur la dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing ci ltar 'dod pas chags par byed la lo khri 'tsho'o/ /gang gi

tshe 'chi ba na rgyal rigs su skye'o/ /de nas brang na gnas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa mtshan mo lha'i khang par song ste/ tsan dan gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing khri khri bzlas nas zla ba de 'das pa dang / ci ltar 'byor pa'i

mchod pa byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs myur du 'ong 'ongs pa la me tog gi stan sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod na sgrub pa po bka' ci stsal zhes zer ro/ /sgrub pa pos chung mar gyis

shig ces smras nas/ dngul chu dang bcud kyis len dang / dngos grub kyi rdzas ster ro/ /gzhan gyi bud med la mngon bar bgrod pa spang bar bya ste/ lo stong phrag lnga 'tsho'o/ /mtshan mo gcig gtsang sbra byas

te/ gro ba'i 'dab ma la gur gum gyis dpal gyi rgyan can bris te/ tsan dan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing bzlas la zla ba de'i tha ma la mchod pa rgya cher byas te/ re zhig bzlas na nam phyed na nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la

myur du chags par byas na dga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyig dang gser dang mu tig la sogs pa ster ro/ /nyi ma re re zhing zas bzang po ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs so/ /lha'i bu mo rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gal te lha'i bu mo rnams ma grub na de'i tshe khro bo 'di

dang bcas te bzlas par bya'o/ /oM hrIHA kaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya che ge mo hU~M dza phaT/ khro bo 'di dang bcas te/ bzlas pa tsam gyis spyi bo 'gas shing dum bu brgyad du 'jig go/ /sngags 'dis bcing bar bya'o/ /oM

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ha na ha na che ge mo hU~M phaT sngags 'dis dbang du bya'o/ /oM tsa la tsa la che ge mo sa ma na ye hU~M phaT/ lha mo thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /de nas 'dir ni mi rnams la phan pa'i don du lha mo brgyad kyi phyag

rgya rab tu bshad par bya ste/ dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gnas par byed pa/ sngags bzlas pa bde bar grub pa'i phyag rgya khro bo nyid kyis bshad pa rgyud rnams kyi nang nas

mchog tu gyur pa 'byung po 'dul byed kyis gsungs pa 'di nyid la myur du bde ba sbyin pa'i lha mo rnams grub par byed pa bzlas pa tsam gyis 'byung mo rnams ma dang / sring mo dang de bzhin du chung ma dang / bran mo sgrub par

byed pa khro bo zlos pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba sbyin pa'i bsnyen bkur mar sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /khu tshur so sor bcangs te lag pa gnyis ka pad ma 'khor ba'i tshul du byas nas gung mo sor mo khab ltar byas pa brkyang

ba ni lha mo brgyad po spyi'i bde ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka sor mo gcig gi steng du gcig bskyon pa'i sbyor bas bzung ba ni lha'i bu mo thams cad dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ nye bar byed cing mngon

du phyogs par byed la thams cad du 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka pad ma 'khor ba'i sbyor bas bzung ba ni lha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ bcings pa tsam gyis skad cig

de nyid la bran mor 'gyur ro/ /oM sarba a ba sa ra sa ra oM A gats+tsha hU~M dzaHdzaHsngags 'dis lha'i bu mo thams cad bod par bya'o/ /oM sarba sid+d+hi b+ho ge shwa ri swA hA/ nye bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /oM kA ma pri ye

swA hA/ mngon du byed pa'i sngags so/ /oM ba~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHdzaH/ lha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i sngags so/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las lha'i bu mo rnams bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas

pa'i le'u'o// // de nas gnod sbyin mo thams cad langs te/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM A gats+tsha su ra sun d+ha ri swA hA sdug gu mdzes ma'i'o/ /

oM ma no ha ri na maHswA hA/ yid 'phrog ma'i'o/ /oM ka na ka mai thu na pri ye swA hA gser ldan ma'i'o/ /oM A gats+tsha kA me shwa ri swA hA/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i'o/ /oM ra ti pri ye swA hA rgan mo'i'o/ /oM pad mi ni ye swA hA/

pad ma ma'i'o/ /oM ni ti ma hA ni ti su ru pa ma ti swA hA/ gar byed ma'i'o/ /oM A nu rA gi ni mai thu ni swA hA/ rjes su chags ma'i'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/

rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag re bzlas na zla ba gcig gi nang du nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chus mchod yon byin na ma dang / sring mo dang chung ma'i las

byed do/ /gal te mar gyur na sems sun dbyung bar mi bya ste/ dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing / nyi ma re re zhing dong tse stong ster ro/ /gal te sring mor gyur na ni grub pa'i rdzas dang / dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster

zhing lha'i bu mo bzang mo blangs nas ster la/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smra bar byed do/ /gal te chung mar gyur na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed cing nor gyi bdag po chen po byed do/ /de nas yid 'phrog

ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa chu bo'i 'gram du song ste/ tsan dan gyis maN+Dal nye bar byugs te/ mchod pa shin tu chen po byas nas a ka ru'i bdug pa sbyin zhing nyi ma bdun du khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par

byas te/ nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na de ni nges par 'ong ngo / /gal te ma 'ongs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /bka' stsal cig ces smra bar byed cing des bdag gi bran mo gyis shig ces bsgo na 'khor brgyad brgya'i zhal ta

byed cing dong tshe brgya nyi ma re re la ster te/ des kyang ma lus par zad par bya'o/ /gal te cung zad 'jog na phyin cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas gser ldan ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ ba ru ra'i shing gnas

par song ste nya dang shas bsgrub cing chang yang byin nas bdag nyid kyang btung zhing sbags par gnas par bzlas pa bya ste/ stong phrag re re bzlas so/ /de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa'i mtshan mo bsgrub par bya ste/ ci srid nam

phyed kyi bar du bzlas na/ nam phyed na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'khor brgyad brgyas bskor nas rang nyid 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /'khor bcu gnyis kyi gos dang / rgyan dang /

bza' ba bzang po rnams nyin gcig bzhin du ster zhing dong tse brgyad ster ro/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa gro ba'i 'dab ma la ba glang gi gi'u wang gis gzugs brnyan bris te/ gcig

pu stan la 'dug la stong phrag re re bzlas so/ /de nas zla ba'i tha ma la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mi smra bar gyur pas bzlas na mtshan mo de'i phyed na nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la

chags pas longs spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rgyan mal du dor te tho rangs kyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi chung ma la mi bgrod par yang bya ste/ gal te bgrod na rnam par 'joms par byed do/ /de nas
rgan mo'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ma/ lag na ut+pa la thogs pa gzhon nu ma ras la ri mo bris te/ sna ma'i me tog gis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin

la stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas te/ zla ba tha ma la c-i ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu spar te ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la dga'

bas chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po 'khor dang bcas pa yongs su skyong bar byed cing lhas 'dod par bya ba'i zas dang / dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len ster zhing dong tshe nyi shu rtsa lnga ster bar byed do/ /

de nas pad+ma ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ rang gi khyim du mgo'i gnas su tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas te gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing zla ba phyed du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa

byas te/ ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur te/ lha mos 'dod pa ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster bar byed do/ /de nas

gar byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa a sho ka'i shing gi rtsar song ste bsgrub par bya'o/ /sha'i bza' ba dang spos dang dri dang / me tog sbyin zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ zla ba gcig gi nang du nges par

'ong ngo / /mdor bsdus na 'ongs na ma dang / sring mo dang chung mar 'gyur ro/ /gal te chung mar gyur na bza' ba dang / ras zung re dang / dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing dong tshe brgyad ster bar byed do/ /gal

te mar gyur na bza' ba bzang po dang / /ras zung re ster zhing gser srang brgya ster ro/ /gal te sring mor gyur na dpag tshad stong nas bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gos dang rgyan dang / bza' ba bzang po ster
ro/ /dngul chu dang bcud kyis len yang ster bar byed do/ /de nas sring mo sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ gur gum gyis gro ba'i 'dab ma la gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris te/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams nas/

spos dang / me tog dang mar me sbyin zhing dus gsum du bzlas pa byas nas zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas te/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo / /

'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs spyad na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dong tshe stong ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing lo stong 'tsho'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i
thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gal te dam tshig la mi gnas na khro bo 'di dang bcas te/ dgug pa'i phyir

bzlas par bya'o/ /oM d+h+ru~M/ ka T+ya ka T+ya che ge mo yak+Shi ni hrIHdza dza/ khro bo 'di dang bcas te/ sngags stong bzlas na myur du 'ong ngo / /gal te myur du ma 'ongs na mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing de'i mod la 'chi ste/ dmyal

ba chen po brgyad du ltung ngo / /de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te mthe'u chung gnyis 'khyud nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bkug pa 'di ni khro bo'i mi phyed pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya

'o/ /phyag rgya 'dis 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas gnod sbyin mo'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ gung mo'i sor mo gnyis mi mnyam par byas te/ srin lag gnyis rnam par brkyang zhing mdzub mo gnyis

sbyar bar byas nas mthe'u chung gnyis snying por byas pa ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dam pa ste/ 'di bcangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin mo thams cad 'ong ngo / /phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe bo gnyis pas

bod par bya'o/ /oM hrIHA gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ /sarba yak+Shi ni swA hA/ bod pa'i sngags so/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bong g.yon pas slar gtang bar bya'o/ /oM shrI gats+tsha/ gats+tsha che ge mo yak+Shi Ni shI g+h+ra~M pu na rA ga nA

ma ya swA hA/ khu tshur so sor bcangs te gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad mngon du phyogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM ma hA yak+Shi bi me thu na pr-i ye swA hA/ khu tshur phan tshun

bcangs la mthe'u chung brkyang ste/ bkug pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad nye bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM kA ma b+ho ge shwa ri swA hA/ khu tshur phan tshun bsnol te lag pa gnyis mdzub mo gcig gi steng du gcig

bskyon pa'i sbyor ba bzhag pa ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /k+Sh+Ri snying po'o/ /khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te mdzub mo dang / gung mo brkyang ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi bdug pa dang /
me tog dang / dri dang mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba ma no ha ra pri swA hA/ 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// //

de nas klu'i rgyal mo rnams langs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos mngon bar btud nas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM A/ oM phuH/ a nan+ta mu khi phuHshrI phuHbA su kha

mu khi phuH/ i phuHpad ma mi ni phuH/ a phuHma hA pad ma mi ni phuHd+hi phuHkarko Te mu khi phuH sa phuHshang+khi ni phuHdzu phu dza la mu khi phuHtru~M phuH dru ma mu khi phuH klu mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par
bshad pa klu'i khang par song ste/ 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /klu mo rnams dga' bar 'gyur zhing klu mo thams cad tshim par 'gyur ro/ /yar ngo'i tshes bcu la klu'i khang par

chu 'bogs te/ bdug pa dang / dri dang me tog dang 'o ma rnams kyis ji ltar brjod pa'i mchod pa byas te/ de nas klu mo brgyad stong phrag re re bzlas na myur du klu'i bu mo rnams rang gi khyim nas 'ong ngo / /'ongs

pa la legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod cing bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na nyi ma re re zhing dong tshe brgyad brgyad so sor ster bar byed do/ /che ge mo 'tsho bar shog shig che ge mo sod cig ces bya ba la sogs pa

thams cad 'grub par byed de/ chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste 'o ma'i bza' bas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mthar klu'i bu mo bzang mo 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la spyi bor me tog sbyin zhing chung mar gyis shig

ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /lha'i bza' ba bzang po dang / dong tshe lnga lnga nyi ma re re zhing ster bar byed do/ /klu'i gnas su mtshan mo song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mthar skad cig de nyid la klu mo spyi bo'i nad

chen po dang tsha bar gyur pas 'ong shing sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed do/ /chung mar gyur cig ces smras na/ bdag nyid dang lnga la ras dang rgyan dang / bza' ba la sogs pa ster zhing dong tshe lnga lnga ster ro/ /mtshan

mo pad ma'i tshal du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na klu'i bu mo rnams myur du 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /dong tshe brgyad brgyad ster te/ des kyang ma lus par zad par bya'o/ /gal te

cung zad 'jog na phyin chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la klu'i bu mo nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la gser gyi pad ma'i gdan byin

te legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod cing bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na nyi ma re re gser srang re re sbyin par byed do/ /mtshan mo rgya mtsho chen por song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de nam bzlas pa'i mtha'

la klu'i bu mo 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na dong tshe gcig dang ras zung gcig ster bar byed do/ /klu'i khang par song ste lte ba nub tsam du chur zhugs te stong phrag brgyad bzlas na

de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la spyi bor me tog byin te legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod cing chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na dong tshe brgyad dang lha'i zas bzang po ster bar byed do/ /

mtshan mo klu'i khang par song ste mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i tho rangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te klu'i bu mo skad cig de la 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la me tog dang tsan dan gyi mchod yon byin te legs par 'ongs so

zhes brjod cing chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na lha'i dngul chu dang bcud kyis len dang / grub pa'i rdzas ster zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed la rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /mtshan mo klu'i

gnas su song ste khri bzlas na klu'i bu mo nges par 'ong ngo / /klu 'ongs pa la myur du chags par byas nas chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo na nyi ma re re dong tshe brgyad dang / lha'i bza' ba bzang po dang gos rnams ster bar

byed do/ /mtshan mo klu'i khang par song la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo rings par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la klu'i me tog spyi bor byin na chung mar 'gyur zhing lha'i ras dang rgyan dang /

bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro/ /de nas klu mo'i dam tshig gi sngags bshad pa/ oM phuHA gats+tsha nA ga ni phu: bod pa'i sngags so/ /oM i phu: spos dang me tog gi sngags so/ /oM phuHa phuHdri dang mchod yon

gyi sngags so/ /a phuHi phuHha~M phuHba~M phuHklu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sngags so/ /phuHA gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ shI g+h+ra~M pu nA na ra ga ma na ya swA hA/ slar gtang ba'i sngags so/ /de nas klu mo rnams

kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa thal mo mnyam par byas te/ sor mo rnams mgo bo'i tshul du sbyar la mdzub mo kha bsgyur bas mthe bo'i sor mo brkyang ba ni klu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /las

thams cad byed cing grub pa'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang / slar btang ba dang / mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni khu tshur so sor bcangs te/ mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bos mnan nas sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba ni klu mo thams
cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las klu mo rnams kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro zhing

gsor te/ khro bo 'di dang bcas nas gsungs pa/ oM b+ha na Na badzra hU~M che ge mo nA gi ni A kaR+Sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis klu thams cad brgyal zhing 'gyel te spyi bo'i nad chen pos shi'o/ /

gal te dam tshig las 'das na khro bo 'di dang bcas te/ bzlas pas myur du 'chi zhing dmyal ba chen po brgyad du ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes dpal rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal
po chen po las klu mo rnams sgrub par byed pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der mi 'am ci mo drug langs te/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi

bos btud nas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM ma no ha ri swA hA oM su ba ge swA hA/ oM bi shA la ne tri swA hA/ oM su ra bi phre ye swA hA/ oM a sha mu khi swA hA/ oM bi tha ka ra mu khi swA hA/ de nas mi 'am ci

mo drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ ri'i rtse mo la song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na mi 'am ci mo drug gi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang / mchod pa shin tu chen po byas te/ ba glang gi sha dang /

gu gul dang ldan pa'i bdug pas bdug cing ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges par 'ong ste/ de la 'jigs par ma byas na/ kye sgrub pa po ci bka' stsal ces smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos kyang kye bzang

mo bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces smras nas rgyab tu zhon na lha'i 'jig rten du 'khyer bar byed cing bza' ba bzang po ster bar byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs phyi ma bshad pa ri'i drung ngam gtsug lag khang du

khri bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la rang nyid 'ong zhing lha mo'i lag pa 'jam pos rkang pa la nyug par byed cing myur du chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur zhing dong tshe brgyad dang gos zung gcig ster bar byed do/ /chu bo'i

'gram du song nas khri bzlas nas/ yang mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs nas chung mar 'gyur zhing nyi ma re re zhing dong tshe lnga lnga ster bar byed do/ /mtshan mo chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du

stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong zhing blta bar byed do/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la mdun du 'dug cing gtam smra bar byed do/ /nyi ma gsum pa la chags pa spyad na nges par 'grub cing chung

ma'i las thams cad byed la/ dong tshe brgyad dang ras phrugs gcig ster bar byed do/ /nyin gcig bzhin du ri'i rtse mor sha za zhing khri khri bzlas na/ lha mo'i gzugs kyis myur du 'ongs shing mdun du sdod do/ /

'khyud cing 'o byas te mi smra bas chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur te/ dong tshe brgyad stong ster zhing lhas mngon bar 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed do/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las mi 'am
ci'i bu mo bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khyod nyon cig 'jig rten

gsum gyi bdag po lha rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa mngag gzhug ma lus pa sgrub par byed pa ma rungs pa rnams dang lha rnams la bstan par bya'o/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen pos 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi phyed pa bstan pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u dang phyag rgya dang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bshad
du gsol/ de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa rnams kyis lha chen po legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa gsol ba btab pa ni legs so legs so/ /

de nas rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /cha rnams bcu drug dag dang ldan/ /

rdo rje ra bas mdzes pa'o/ /de yi dbus su drag po che/ /rdo rje khro bo rgod bya ba/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrug cing gsal/ /bskal pa tha ma'i me 'od 'dra/ /lha chen mig sman sbyar 'dra zhing / /thod pa'i phreng bas
rgyan du byas/ /drag shul bzhad cing cher 'jigs pa/ /'jig rten gsum po 'jigs mdzad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su/ /lha chen po ni bri bya ste/ /ba zho mu tig ltar dkar zhing / /
de bzhin dkar po dung 'dra zhing / /mig gsum lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /zhi zhing lag pa g.yon pa na/ /mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyogs kyi cha ru ni/ /sred med bu ni bri bya ste/ /g.yas

pa na ni rnga yab dung / /g.yon na 'khor lo gsal shing ngo / /rgyab tu brgya byin rgyal po ste/ /de bzhin smin drug mdun du'o/ /tshangs pa lag na gdugs 'dzin pa/ /kha ba me tog kun d+ha dang / /zla 'dra brgya byin

mdun bri ste/ /rang gi stan la 'khod par ro/ /yang na sngags pas mu tig dang / /ba yi zho 'dra dkar po ni/ /rnga yab thogs par smin drug bri/ /tshangs pa kha dog dmar po bri/ /brgya byin kha dog ser po bri/ /
rgyan kun gyis ni rnam spras shing / /rnga yab thogs par khyab 'jug bri/ /de bzhin khyu mchog la zhon par/ /lha chen po ni bri bya ste/ /kun bged lag na 'khor lo can/ /ngang pa la zhon bri bar

bya/ /brgya byin glang chen zhon pa ste/ /smin drug rma bya la zhon pa'o/ /phyi rol dang ni grwa rnams su/ /'byung mo brgyad ni bri bar bya/ /pad ma can dang pad chen dang / /rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma/ /'phrog

ma mchog dang rin po che/ /brgyan ma 'gro ba skyong ma rnams/ /dpal gyi sgra yis rab grags pa'i/ /'byung mo chen mo brgyad po ste/ /pad ma can dang pad chen ma/ /pad ma dkar po lta bur bri/ /rnam 'byung ma dang lha

'joms ma/ /kha dog dmar po bri bar bya/ /'byung mo bzhi rnams mtshungs par ni/ /gser gyi mdog du bri bar bya/ /rdzu 'phrul che ldan 'byung mo brgyad/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin de legs bri/ /de nas 'dir dkyil

'khor gyi cho ga bshad pa/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid me tog sngon po'i phreng bas brgyan cing gtsug tor sngon po bcings nas ras sngon po zung gcig bgos te sngon bzhin du khro bo'i snying po 'di brjod par bya ste/ sems can kun

la phan don du/ /myur du dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/ /grub pa'i rdo rje khro bo ste/ /lha nyid dam tshig la bzhugs shig /oM hUM badzra phaT sa/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha thams cad grub par byed do/ /de nas 'dir

rdo rje gsor ba bshad pa/ /'di ltar yi ge hU~M zlos shing phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa ltar/ lha thams cad gzhom zhing lha'i bu mo thams cad dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / klu mo dang 'byung mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo can rnams

skad cig de nyid la gzhom par bya ste/ rdo rje gsor ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ oM badzra dIp+ta ma hA kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ skad cig de nyid la lha thams cad gsod cing

'khrug par byed do/ /hU~M hU~M phaT phaT sbyor ba 'dis kyang nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang zhig par byed do/ /de nas slob ma bzhug par bya ste/ khro bo'i phyag rgya go cha byas la sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o/ /\u0f00 bi sh+ya kro d+ha

hU~M hU~M a dz+wa la ma la a ku la/ b+hI Sha Na badzra a/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyi rol gyi dbab pa dang dgug pa dang lhung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las khro bo'i dkyil

'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM b+hU shrI~M sid hA d+h+wa dza d+hi ri hrIHkhro bo'i mdun du'o/ /oM hUM b+h+ra~M ma hA pad ma ba ti d+ha nur ban d+ha ri hU~M/ rgyab tu'o/ /oM hUM bi hU~M ti/ oM ku sho d+hA ri Ni hU~M dza/ lho ru'o/ /hU~M b+hU su

ra ha ri Ni tsin+tA ma Ni d+h+wa dza d+hA ra ni sru~M g.yon du'o/ /oM shrI ba ra ha ri Ni puSh+pe haste hU~M/ me tog dbang ldan gyi grwar oM shrI rat+ne shwa ri d+hu pa haste hU~M/ spos me'i grwa ru'o/ /oM shrI b+hU Shi Ni gan+d+ha haste hU~M/ dri bden bral du'o/ /oM shrI

dza ga ta pA li ni a d+hi pa ti hU~M/ mar me rlung du'o/ /de nas 'byung mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas par bshad pa khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /

lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo brkyang ba n-i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag pa ni gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa
khu tshur bcangs te/ mdzub mo brkyang ba nas bskyil ba ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo mnyam par byas te/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo rnams phan tshun du 'khyud de

mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa so sor brkyang ste/ dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyis su bzhag pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang ba ni
mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas 'byung po brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi

cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ oM hrIHdzaHgzhan gyis mi thub pa'i'o/ /oM hU~M dzaH rgyal ba'i'o/ /oM hrI dzaH rdzogs byed kyi'o/ /oM b+h+ru~M dzaH kun tu rdzogs byed kyi'o/ /oM sru~M dzaH/ dur khrod kyi bdag
po'i'o/ /oM ru~M dzaH/ rig sngags kyi dbang phyug gi'o/ /oM hrI hU~M dzaH'byung po'i dbang phyug gi'o/ /oM a~M dzaHmngag gzhug mchog gi'o/ /'byung po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs

bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi khyim du song ste/ sngon du 'bum bzlas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ ci ltar gsungs pa'i 'bras chan dkar po dang /

sbrang rtsi dang zho dang / bu ram dang 'o ma dang / sha rnams kyis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas/ mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo / /gal te nges par ma 'ongs na skad cig de la
'chi'o/ /'ongs na bsgo ba don med par mi byed do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las byed la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal srid ster bar byed cing dgra thams

cad tshar gcod par byed do/ /zla ba'i lha mo blangs nas ster zhing rgyab tu zhon na lha'i 'jig rten du yang 'khyer bar byed do/ /brgya byin nyid kyang ster bar byed cing bskal pa bdun 'tsho'o/ /de nas rgyal ba'i

sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo sbyin byed ma'i mdun du song ste/ nyi ma re re stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ gtor ma sbyin zhing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas

bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong ste/ kye sgrub pa pos bka' ci stsal zhes smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyab du zhon na gling bzhi pa rnams su yang khyer

bar byed cing gzhan yang rgyal srid ster la lo lnga stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi pho brang du song ste nyi ma bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa

la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ 'bras chen dkar po dang / zhos ci ltar gsungs pa ltar byin nas ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rang nyid 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin na dga'
bar 'gyur te/ rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing lo stong 'tsho'o/ /ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mngag gzhug gi las byed do/ /che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig /

che ge mo sod cig ces smras na de dag thams cad byed do/ /kun tu rdzogs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa chen po byas te/ ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na rings par 'ongs nas mdun du sdod do/ /kye sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed do/ /sgrub pa pos
mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug gi las thams cad byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gter thams cad ster la lhas 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro/ /

nyin gcig bzhin du ras dmar po zung re ster zhing dong tshe lnga lnga ster la lo lnga brgya 'tsho'o/ /de nas dur khrod kyi bdag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste nyi ma bdun du

stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun pa la 'byung po la sha dang / nya dang til dang / 'dzam bu ti dang / mngar gsum zan gyis dril ba'i ril bu dang / rta sha kham tshad du gtubs pa bsregs nas mar la

rngos la 'dzam bu ti ka dang / 'bras chan dang / zho dang bu ram dang / 'o thug dang / sran tshod dang / snum khur rnams kyi ci ltar gsungs pa byin nas gu gul gyi bdug pa yang byin te/ ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du

bzlas na ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par byed de/ 'jigs par ma byas na rang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la gtor ma byin na dga' bar 'gyur te/ 'byung po'i mngag gzhug thams cad

byed do/ /nyi ma re re dong tshe brgyad brgyad ster zhing dgra thams cad 'joms te lo lnga stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ lha'i khang par song ste/ spos dmar po dang me tog

dmar po dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing khri bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la nya dang / sha dang til dang 'dzam bu ti dang / 'bras chen dmar pos ji lta bar bsgrub

cing du ru ska dang / me tog sbyin te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na snang ba chen po dang / 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong ste/ de la 'jigs par ma byas na sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed

do/ /sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na/ nyi ma re dus gsum du dong tshe lnga lnga ster bar byed do/ /lhas mngon bar 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed cing lo lnga stong 'tsho'o/ /de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug

gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo ling ka gcig par song ste/ gcig pu nub gsum du 'bras chan dmar po dang nya dang shas gtor ma sbyin zhing ra skyes kyi sha dang / gu gul dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i bdug pas bdug

cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ nyi ma dang po la rmi lam du mthong bar byed do/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la rang nyid mthong bar byed do/ /nyi ma gsum pa la rings par 'ongs zhing mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smra bar byed do/ /

bka' ci stsol de nas sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing rang nyid song nas mi zad pa'i gter ster zhing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar

byung ba rnams smra bar byed do/ /gos dang rgyan dang / bza' ba bzang po rnams ster bar byed cing lo nyis stong 'tsho bar byed do/ /de nas pho nya mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa rdo rje 'chang gi khang par song ste/

nag po'i tshes bcu bzhi la khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing me tog dkar po dang 'bras can dkar po

dang / mar dang 'o thug sbyin zhing ku sha'i khri la 'dug ste/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan mo ci srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na mngag gzhug mchog rang nyid 'ong ste/ 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi mchod
yon byin na/ kye sgrub pa po bdag gis ci bya zhes smra bar byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phan chad mngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing lhas mngon bar 'dod pa'i

bza' ba ster ro/ /dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing gter rnyed par byed la rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su yang 'khyer bar byed cing gzhan yang rgyal srid ster bar byed do/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi
rgyal po chen po las/ mngag gzhug bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas 'dir yang dag par bshad pa ni dngos grub sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa slob dpon rnams la phan pa'i don du ji ltar
gsungs pa mngag gzhug pa'i thabs te/ bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i le lo can dang sdig pa byed pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / tshul 'chos can dang / dbul po dang / nad kyis gdungs pa dang /

tshe thung ba dang sems mi brtan pa'i mi rnams kyang spang bar mi bya ste gal te longs spyod dang nor dang grags pa 'dod na yang skad cig gis phun sum tshogs par ster ro/ /sngags 'dis dngul chu dang / bcud kyis

len pa'i dngos grub dang / lha'i rgyal srid kyi dngos grub kyang grub par byed na mi rnams kyi rgyal srid grub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin du 'di lha'i bu mo thams cad skad cig tsam gyis grub

par byed do/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bklags pas grub par byed cing shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa rnams la yang ci ltar bde ba ltar myur du grub par byed cing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa yi ge

bzhi po cher gsang ba/ dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed pa bklags pa tsam gyis mngon par grub par byed pa ste/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las dngos grub kyi bsgrub
pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o// // de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ sor mo rnams phan tshun 'khyud de/ gung mo brkyang nas khab

ltar bzung ba ni 'byung po chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid gung mo bkug cing mdzub mo brkyang nas bkug pa ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa

bskyil zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ste/ so sor bzung ba ni rdzogs byed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo phan tshun 'khyud de bzung ba ni kun du rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang mthe bo

nang du bkug te bzung ba ni dur khrod kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung gnyis rab tu brkyang ste bzung ba ni rigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni pho nya mchog gi phyag

rgya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ 'byung po'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bcom ldan 'das kyis
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje slob dpon la phan pa'i don du bsnyen bskur ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya ste/ 'byung mo rnams

kyis ni yid la dga' ba bskyed cing phan tshun tshim par byed pa'o/ /de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las 'byung mo dpal chen mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa/ dpal khro bo'i
bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'bum bzlas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zla ba nya la ci ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing mtshan thog thag

bzlas so/ /de nas tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi mchod yon sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod na kye sgrub pa po ci bka' stsal ces smra'o/ /sgrub pa pos bdag gi chung ma

gyis shig ces brjod na lha'i dngul chu dang / bcud kyis len ster zhing dngos grub kyi rdzas dang gter dang / rgyal srid rnams ster bar byed do/ /zhi ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang po'o// // de nas
gzhan yang nan tur gyis sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ gro ba'i 'dab ma la 'byung mo dpal chen mo bris te/ mtshan mo gcer bur gyur pas/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gi
mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na myur du 'ong ngo / /'ongs pa la chags pa byas na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid kyang ster bar byed do/ /brgya byin nyid kyang ster ro/ /

rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su yang 'khyer zhing lo khri 'tsho'o/ /gal te ma grub na mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing skams te skad cig de nyid la 'chi'o/ /zhes khro bo nyid kyis gsungs so/ /gur gum gyis ming bris

te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing yi ge hU~M hU~M phaT phaT lan bdun brjod na brjod par gyur pas nges par skad cig gis 'chi bar byed do/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgrub pa'i thabs
kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// // gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing gtor ma bshams te ras dkar pos bkab la/ sngags 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /de ba sa~M b+hU ta ma hi ta/ pra Ni pa tA ya bi ba dza yed phr-i thag

ma hA b+hU ta swa s+thA na ma ta tra gats+tsha tish+ma shA ni de ba a la ya Shu na dI ta te/ tsa tu Shu the e ka ling ge wa de ba A ya ta nai wa/ shrI g+h+ra~M gats+tsha tu/ b+hU tA nA ma sa ma ya pra ti pA la nu ya/ ya ti sa i ban gats+tsha ti ta k+She Na

mur d+ha ni/ spa la yed/ b+hU ta nA~M rai ra wa~M na ra ka~M pa ted/ ya tha ya tha/ swa s+thA ne gats+tsha tu ya thA su khI swA hA/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis lha rnams nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rim
par phye ba gnyis pa rdzogs te/ 'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las ji snyed pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha A ka ra bar ma dang / lo ts+tsha ba
dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //

@#/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog
gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas pa/ gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/ /

de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni/ khyod
gtum pa yin bsten par dka' ba yin shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams

cad ni gsang ba med par las mi byed do/ /lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo rje'i rigs 'di dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad pa gsang ba gsang

sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar

'gyur ba dang / log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad pa yang tshangs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang / thub par

ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang / basmyung bar ma byas pa yang basmyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong ma yin pa yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang / las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming brgyad pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na

rdo rje ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /'di lta ste/ khyod ni glang po che'i rna ba can yin/ khyod ni rgyan bzang po dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni bden pa nyid

yin/ khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin no/ /khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do/ /chos

bstan pa des na de dag dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/ na mo d+harma s+ya/ na maH

sa~M g+ha s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ aT+Te/ maT+Te/ kha raT+Te/ so me so mA su khi/ hi ri hi ri/ mi ri ki r-i/ b+hi ri bi sa ni sid+d+h+yan du/ sarba kA r+yA Ni/ sA d+ha ya man+t+ra pa da swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de ni legs te/ bcom ldan
'das de de lags so/ /de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog sgrub pa ni bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad pa bklag par bgyi'o/ /bklags nas bdag bstod
par 'gyur te/ dga' nas dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol bar bgyid do/ /nyal ba'i tshe bklags na rmi lam ngan pa

mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa yang bskal pa bzang por byang chub
sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bdag mchi'o/ /yang lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// ! //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra NA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje

sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/ mi thub pa/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden pa/
sra ba brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/
rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ 'byung

po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad tshar gcod pa/ rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed tu 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu

sbyin pa/ sems can thams cad bsrung ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM tru Ta tru Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho s+pho Ta ya/ g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na/ g+hUr+N+Na pa ya g+hUr+N+Na pa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/

sa~M bo d+hA ya sa~M bo d+hA ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ sa~M b+h+rA ma ya sa~M b+h+rA ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ ku Ta ku Ta/ sa~M ku Ta ya sa~M ku Ta ya/ sarba sha trU~M na/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ sa~M g+ha Ta ya sa~M g+ha Ta ya/ sarba bid+yA badzra badzra/ s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/

ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ aT+Ta hA sa nI la badzra/ su badzrA ya swA hA/ he phul+lu/ ni ru phul+lu/ ni gr-ih+Na kul+lu/ mi li tsul+lu/ ku ru kul+lu/ badzra bi dza yA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/

ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na pra mo Ta nA ya swA hA/ tsa ra ni tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya/ badzra bi dA rA ya swA hA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha kI li kI la ya

swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da la kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ badzra kI li kI la ya swA hA/ ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swA hA/ ma ti s+thi ra badzra/ su ti s+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ ma hA

badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi badzra/ shI g+h+ra~M badzrA ya swA hA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badzra ku lA~M bar+t+ta ya swA hA/ a mu ka~M mA ra ya phaT/ na mas+sa man+ta badzrA Na~M/ sarba ba la~M A bar+t+ta ya/ ma hA

ba le/ ka ta ba le/ ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN+Da la ma ye/ a ti badzra/ ma hA ba le/ be ga ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ ting ga le/ da ha da ha/ te dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma hA ba le/ badzrA~M ku sha dz+wa la ya swA

hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na

badzra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/ b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hU~M phaT/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ /sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad med par

byed/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs

pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran gza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa

dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag
yid dge sems dang zhing / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /

mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang / /de dag thams cad zhi bar blta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang / /rin chen rma med tsan dan bcas/ /

shel dang rdo rje me tog dang / /chu yis gser ram yang na ni/ /dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang / /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam

'joms bzlas nas ni/ /rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes

sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA badzra me ru shi kha ra kU TA gA ra d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i

gnas rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis

brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje chen po'i seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa

bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi

zhing rnam par 'phrul ba dang cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid

snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge

'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon bar shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang snying rje

dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / dben pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes

bya ba dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje nga ro dang / rdo rje bzang

po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad
cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/

rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA

ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /

tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i

ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhal du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab

bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po

thags zangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang /

'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad ma dang / pad ma chen po dang / mtha' yas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po

ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal

po'i g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang /

gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / sring mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong chen po bdun dang / bar snang

la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza'i lha thams cad dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren

rnams dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi

bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang

bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la dang / log 'dren dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug bcu dang /

sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / ma bdun dang / rdo rje lcags kyu can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzangs dang / gtsug gis 'gro dang rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma

dang bcas pa dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto

'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang /

dus tshigs kyi lha dang / nub ka'i lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / gnam sa'i lha thams cad dang yang thabs gcig go/ /de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin du bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi

mdzad pa ni shin du yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin du yongs su rdzogs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa ni brnyes pas ni shin du yongs

su gzung / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mnga' ba sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni sku brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus ni yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rnam par spras/ spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis

lhar mi mthong / bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni dkrugs/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugs su chud/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye

shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyis rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ brjod pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang /

seng ge'i sgra ni sgrog /ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun du bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes

rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon bar grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku brgyan pas ni

mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje'i pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/ gdan rin po che dang / rdo rje'i pad ma'i seng ge'i khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil

sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam brten dang bcas pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad ma'i

snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas kun du mdzes pa/ rin po che dang / rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs

yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsams gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong bas lhag

pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes par gyur pa/ zla ba nya ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag par rgyas pa chos ston te/

tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dkar ba yang dag par ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi

gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par

gyur to/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston to/ /nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs

gcig go/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs gcig

go/ de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de dag thams cad kyang kun du snang ngo / /skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis

tshim par gyur to/ /'on pa rnams ni sgra thos so/ /long ba rnams ni mig thob bo/ /smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do/ /nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas so/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad

kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni med par gyur to/ /yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang /

mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so/ /de nas

sems can de dag thams cad kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste bde ba mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun du bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste/

de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon bar 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i

'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag tu son pa snyam du shes so/ /snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun du snang ngo / /bdud kyi ris

kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar ngu zhing skrag nas byer ro/ /bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud

kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur ba dang / dge sbyong gau ta ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo / /

mtho brtsams so/ /phyogs gang na gnas su gtol med do/ /longs la dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i gan du dong ste/ bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud kyi ris

kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ lag na mtshon ca sna tshogs can/ lus la go ca sna tshogs pa/ cha byad dang / rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi

bzad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba/ mig dang / bzhin dang / skra kun du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig

can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung zad kyang mi

bskyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go/ /rnam par gzhom mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste shin du dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de

nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang / bdud kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga

dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyi sil dkrol dang / rnga bo che rdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang / bi rtsi zhes bya ba dang / zung shig zung shig /sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang / gtun shing dang / gtun rked nyag pa

dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/

skad cig de nyid la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen por gyur par snang ngo / /

bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go/ bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i bcings pas bdag nyid bcings par mthong

ngo / /de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /

bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la zhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis

brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes pa gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag

sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang / gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / bsgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems

dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang / dkon mchog gsum

la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa yang ston cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'

mnyan nas/ rin po che'i pad ma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar

ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon bar bstod do/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa/ /gzhig pa'i slad du 'dren par byung / /khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal/ /'jig
rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod/ /thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam/ /ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus/ /yang dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis/ /brnyan pa'i thugs kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /khyod sngon sbyin

dang tshul khrims dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / /shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis/ /bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud/ /khyod kyis chos rnams skye med par/ /bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang / /

'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa/ /kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad/ /'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor/ /mu stegs can dang bdud btul te/ /chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad/ /

nyon mongs brag chen rnam kun du/ /ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas/ /sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i/ /byang chub bla na med pa brnyes/ /gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mchog

gcig pu/ /dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags/ /khyod ni mgon po khyod kyi pha/ /khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags/ /thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid/ /mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod/ /khyod nyid gshegs nas

sems can rnams/ /sems can dmyal las rnam par bkrol/ /rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas/ /khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs/ /lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i/ /ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas/ /grol

te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol/ /kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang / /mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi/ /dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste/ /mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde/ /lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad/ /khyod kyi 'od kyi

gzis bcom pa/ /gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang / /gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang / /nor bu lam mer ma gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis

bcom ldan 'das la mngon bar bstod nas yang rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad

'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs
