sha ka ra dang bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bdug par bya'o/ /bdug pa 'di sbyar la/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas shin tu khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma gon la sngags 'di nyid kyis nye reg dang / brag

bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / gos gdegs pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / khrus bya ba rnams bya'o/ /klu kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ rig

pa 'dzin pa klu la bltas te/ skyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang / gtor ma dang / bdug pas slar btang bar bya'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re la

bzlas la klu'i gzugs la bsnan par bya'o/ /mar me kha bzhi 'bud do/ /klu'i ming bri'o/ /gang bos pa de 'grang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na klu'i rgyal po chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad

ston par 'gyur ro/ /ci bsams pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /dbang thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi skye bo dang / 'khor du bcas pa dang / bu dang tsha bor bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /las

thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi khyim bzhin du yongs su skyang bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i gzugs de gnas dben par bzhag la/ /me tog dang bdug pa sbyin no/ /lang long med par bzhag cing mi mthong bar bya ste/

su la yang mi bstan no/ /gos gtsang mas dgab bo/ /nam dgos pa yod pa de'i tshe yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya ste/ /bsnun na dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gar btang ba der 'gro

zhing slar yang 'ong ngo / /rmi lam du dgos pa thams cad ston cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / sad

byung ba de'i tshe skye tshe'i 'bru dang / yungs kar du bsres la lan brgya rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ khros pas klu'i gzugs la bsnun na skad cig de la rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin med par 'gyur te thams cad

bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /than pa byung ba de'i tshe yi ger bris la skud pa dmar po dkris la skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ klu'i mgul du btags la klu'i spyi bor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa
byas na skad cig de la char gyi rgyun 'bebs te/ sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so/ /ha cang char che na skud pa sngon po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/ mdud pa bdun bor na char chen
po mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga dang rig pa bsgrub pa gzhan thams cad la yang sngags 'di thog ma kho nar lan bdun bdun brjod do/ /'di kun tu sbyor ba ste/ brjod pa bsgrub pa 'grub bo/ /nam mkha'
lding chen po rdo rje shugs 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi snying po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i snying po'i cho ga ston to/ /gzungs bton

ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad 'dar yed yed do/ /bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma dang / shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas rlung dang / sprin bzlog par bya'o/ /ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas khang steng du dkyil 'khor
grwa bzhi pa shin du rnam par phye ba re'u cha legs par byas pa byas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa brgyad phyogs mtshams su gzugs so/ /mda' lnga gzugs so/ /rtse gsum pa gzugs so/ /
mda' bzhi la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa bzhis 'khor bar bskor ro/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / pog phor dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi bzhag go/ /gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
su bzhag /me tog sil mas gang bar gtor/ bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor ro/ /thams cad la lan bdun bdun gyis bzlas pa byas te gzugs so/ /yungs kar dang chu bsres la bzlas pa
byas pas phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad do/ /de nas dpag tshad tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /der klu mi bsrun pa rnams 'phrog mi nus so/ /klu chen po rnams kyang rtag tu
dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba 'bebs mi nus so/ /me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad 'tshe yang mi nus/ lan 'ga' yang rtswa'i lo ma yang 'tshe mi nus/ bcing ba lngas bsdams te thams
cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /'di zla ba brgyad du mtshams bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba 'od zer snang pa de rnams
gnas 'di las mi 'da'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug te/ bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas klu bzlog par bya'o/ /shin du khro bas bzlog par bya

ba ni ma yin no/ /klu'i skyil mo dkrung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ mdzub mo gnyis mgo bo gdengs ka ltar byas la mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ngo / /'di ni klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /brjod ma

thag tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi snying dag la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu dag phyogs de ma rung bar bya bar 'dod na de'i tshe bye tshan mgo la 'bab bo/ /mgo dang / mjug ma dang / khog pa ji tsam par
de tsam du lus la ral gri'i char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu thams cad dngangs skrag par gnas par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /klu mi
bgrungs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /khang steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ me tog sil mas gang bar gtor la bdug pas bdugs te/ bum pa chus bkang ba thams cad la lan bdun

du bzlas par bya'o/ /gtor ma bzhag go/ seng ldeng gi phur bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad kyi nyes
pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/ phur bu ma phyung gi bar du thub par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la sprin la bltas te gtor na/ ser ba thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra

bI ra'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ gdu bur byas na thams cad du ser ba chod par 'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra bI ra'i dmar po'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ glog byung ba'i tshe na
nam mkha' la 'phangs na nam mkha' nyid du 'dug ste bcings par 'gyur ro/ /chu la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'brug zer ba'i tshe rtse gsum pa la lan nyi shu
rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtsugs na rtse gsum pa ma phyung gi bar du 'brug zer te sprin bcings par 'gyur ro/ /phyung nas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /ral gri la lan bdun bzlas
te/ klu'i phyag rgya skyil mo dkrung gis bzung la sprin la bltas te 'dug na bzung ma thag tu klu mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur te/ klu thams cad lkug par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri thogs la lan brgya
rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gur gum gyis de'i steng du nam mkha' lding bris nas ci lta ji lta bur bskor ba de lta bur nam mkha' lding gi 'dab gshog klu'i lus la 'bab par gyur te/ klu thams cad
skrag cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur te/ phyis rlung dang ser ba 'bebs mi nus so/ /shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang yungs kar bsres te/ dkyil 'khor du lan drug bcu sbyin sreg
byas na klu thams cad grang ba'i stobs byed pa dang / ser ba dang kha ba'i bar la sogs pa thub par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe char dgos par 'gyur ba de'i tshe char 'bebs so/ /spra tshil las klu'i gzugs
tshad sor bzhi pa mgo lnga pa byas te/ gser gyis g.yogs la steng gos dkar pos g.yogs te/ rtsa ba'i sngags lan stong bzlas pa byas la/ bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa'i nang du bcug ste/
lus gos kyis dkri'o/ /rgyas gdab bo/ /ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor la bdug pas bdug ste/ sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /bal po se'u shing gi
lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas te/ bum pa la dal bu dal bus gzhus na ser ba thams cad bum pa'i nang du 'pho'o/ /klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs spra tshil la byas pa la

klu thams cad kyi ming bris na gang gis ming gis rigs brjod pas klu de dbang du 'gyur te/ 'khor dang bcas pa bram ze'i gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug cing ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed do/ /klu'i rgyal po chos can

ma yin pa yul yongs su mi skyong ba/ lo tog dang 'bras bu chud gzon pa'i klu'i khyim du song ste/ shin tu khrus byas la gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te/ rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ klu'i khyim de nas bud

med rgan mo dag 'byung zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa ci tshol zhes zer ba dang / lan mi gdab par rdo rje sa la brdab par bya'o/ /phaT zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /klu rgan mo de ngus nas shi'o shi'o zhes zer zhing khyim du 'jug go/ /

de nas klu rnams 'dus te dngangs skrag ste/ khye'u yi gzugs su bsgyur nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol/ rig pa 'dzin pas sngar sngags brjod la/ khros pas bal po

se'u shing gi lcug ma sa la brdabs pa dang / khye'u yi gzugs can de sa la 'gre ldog cing / kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol zhes smra'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pas snying rje med par bya ste/ bsgyel ba'i tshul gyis bsgyel

ba dang / 'di skad ces kye rig pa 'dzin pa bsgo ba thams cad bgyid do zhes smra'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'di skad ces brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bsrungs shig /bsrung ngo / /rig pa 'dzin
pas yang 'di skad ces brjod do/ /dge ba bcu zung shig /'dzin to/ /rig pa 'dzin pas yang gsum la skyabs su gsol/ gtad do rjes su 'dzin to/ /rig pa 'dzin pa phur bu dbyung du gsol/ mi dbyung ngo / /
'di skad ces brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bzlas pa rjes su bzung shig /gdod phur bu dbyung ngo zhes bya'o/ /'on tang klu de 'khor dang bcas te rkang pa gnyis la gtug go/ /gsum

la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /dam tshig rjes su 'dzin du gzhug go/ /de nas gdod phur bu phyung la de nyid du kha zas kyang byin pa dang / klu thams
cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rang gi khyim du 'jug pa bzhin du zhugs shing las su bya ba rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang du btang ba der 'gro'o/ bya ba
thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i khyim der phyis klu mi bsrun pa mi 'byung ngo / /dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /dus dus su lo tog sgrub bo/ /der me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma rnams
sgrub bo/ /phyis gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs chen po las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /las thams cad 'grub/ mchog 'grub pa/ bla na med pa'o/ /
rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bya ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad bzlog pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang
lo tog thams cad sgrub pa/ sa'i rdul dang / snying po dang / byin 'phel bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje'i mchu klog 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bgyid na/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad
yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de byin gyis brlab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' lding gi
bdag po rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong
dag gis kyang byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha' lding gi bdag po klu mi bsrun pa rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir smros shig /de nas nam mkha' lding gi bdag pos rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras

so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma s+t+rai lo kya a d+hi pa ta ye/ na mash+tsa tur+NA ma ma hA rA dzA nA/ oM badzra dun+ta dun+ta/ ma hA dun+ta/ du ti du ti/ badzra shi kha ra dun+te/ ma ni

ka Na ka bi tsi ta/ a b+ha ra Na bi b+hU Shi ta sha rI re/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ nA ga rA dza bi dra ba Ni hr-i da yaM/ s+pho Ta ya badzra dun+ta na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dz+wa la ti badzra dun+te na/ ha na ha na/ ga ru Da pak+Sha ni pa te

na b+ha ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru duSh+TaM nA gA nAM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ b+ho b+ho pan+nA gen+d+ra spu ta spu ta spu dan+du nA ga sa sma ni kro d+ha ra dzA ma hA ba la ba rA kra ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT

phaT phaT phaT/ b+ho ga ru Da rA dza badzra dun+te/ su ba ra na pak+Sha ma hA ba la/ ma hA ka na ka pi tsi ti ma hU~M dar/ bak+Sha ya duSh+Ta nA gaM bi ba du b+ho ba yu ba la ha kaM hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ sho sha ya shi ta ba la ha ga ga ru Da u sme na/

hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ b+ho b+ho badzra dun+ta bi tsu hu na/ bi d+hu dz+wa la na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ bany+dza ya/ sarba sha ra ni ma ti kra ma si maM/ b+ho ban+na/ gen+d+ra ma te/ badzra dun+te/ na mUr+NAM/ spa ta yA mi/ ha ra ha ra/

pra ha ra hU~M phaT/ ma ta ma ta/ sarba nA gA nAM hU~M hU~M phaT/ ta thA ga ta pA tsa na ma nu sma ra hU~M hU~M phaT/ badzra pA Ni sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ trai lo kya a ti ba deR+pa tsa na ma nu pA la ya hU~M hU~M phaT/

sa rA sa rA/ sma ra sma ra/ sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ tri rat+na sa t+ye na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ hri badzra dun+ta sarba nA ga bi dra ba na ga ra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ tri rat+na ma nu pA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ pra ma dan+ta ha da sa hU~M hU~M hU~M

phaT swA hA/ bi ni tsakra ha ta/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ ma he shwa ra tri shU la hasta ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ ga ru Da bi kra ma ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ nA ga ku la na shra na ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ ga ru Da sarba a sha ni

ba pa na ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sarba pA pa ba yu saM bak+Sha NA ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sarba a ka la ba ta me g+ha a sha ni ba ra Na ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ ma hA badzra dz+wa la swA hA/ sarba duSh+Ta nA ga bi nA sha ka ya

swA hA/ ga ru Ta hri da ya swA hA/ ga ru Da dun+da ya swA hA/ sarba nA shA na ya swA hA/ oM du ru du ru swA hA/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu ru swA hA/ di ri di ri/ du ru ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT

phaT phaT swA hA/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos rdo rje mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu khas bub du 'gyel nas lus rngul byung zhing lus
rab tu 'dar te brgyal nas sa la 'gre ldog go/ /kye ma'o gzungs chen po sngags kyi tshig mi bzad pa dag smras so zhes 'dzer zhing / thams cad lus 'dar yed yed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan cad 'dzam bu'i

gling du ma rung bar mi bgyid do/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog ma rung bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs 'di mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin te/ gang na cho ga'i rgyal po chen po 'di spyod pa dang /
gang na gnas pas spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rgyun tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin to/ /yul lam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ grong ngam/ gtsug

lag khang de rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i sprin thams cad snum pa dang / mngar ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / ro zhim pa dang /

snyi ba dang / ro bro ba'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /'thab pa dang / sdig pa thams cad byung ba dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus dus su char gyis

rgyun dbab par bgyi'o/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams yang dag par 'grub par bgyi/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / byi ba dang / sbrul dang / sbal pa dang / trai ma bu ka dang / mak+Shi ka dang / trai la

ta dang / sha ta pa da dang / bung ba dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs kyis 'jigs pa thams cad med par bgyi/ rnam par 'jig par bgyi/ yams kyi nad dang 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /bzlog par bgyi'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das slan chad sdig pa'i las kun du spyod pa'i tshul mi spyod par bgyi'o/ /char gnod pa 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i char thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis
gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum gyi dgongs pa bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid/
bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung bzhin du slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /kun du

'dzin par bgyi'o/ /dge ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa kun du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po la dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i rgyal po dag de ltar
gyis shig /yal bar ma btang shig /de nas de'i 'og tu cho ga bya ba brjod par bya ste/ sngags 'di dpa' ba gcig pu ni/ /las kun byed pa dge ba ste/ /shes rab can gyis lan cig dran/ /dgos pa thams cad

byed par 'gyur/ /mthon po'i gnas su mkhas pa yis/ /sgra skad chen po brjod par bya/ /gnas gang dang gang du sgra sgrags pa de dang der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sad dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / glog
thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /sus kyang byin 'phrog par mi nus so/ /gtse bar mi nus so/ /gnas mthon po'i ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang shin
du mtho ba der rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mar byas te/ gos gtsang ma dkar po bgos la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ ba'i lci ba dang 'jim pa bsres pas dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ dkyil
'khor gyi dbus su mda' gang tsam pa cig btsugs te/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa btsugs te/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas pa byas la tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lan gsum 'khris par bskor ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pog phor bzhag la lan bdun bzlas pa'i bdug pas bdug go/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
pa byas la yungs kar gyis gtor ro/ /me tog sil mas gang bar gtor ro/ /phyogs bzhir gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi bzhag go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma bzhag par bya ste/ zho dang /
'o ma dang / 'bras btsos pa dang / bu ram dang / sha ka ras gdab po/ /chu dang yungs dkar la sngags lan lnga brjod de/ phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par bgyi/ zla ba nya la sbyor bar bya'o/ /skad cher

bklags la phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang 'og tu yungs kar gtor zhing / klu thams cad kyi so so'i ming nas brjod na/ cho ga 'di byas ma thag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / klu

mi bsrun pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ thub par 'gyur ro/ /ltas ngan pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / gdon 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams
cad rgyang ring du spangs par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa dang / rab tu gnod par sems
pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phyir gnod par byed pa thams cad kyi mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu dang lo tog thams cad legs par yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ legs par yongs su
smin pa dang / ro zhim par 'gyur ro/ /sa bon legs par btab pa/ thams cad legs par 'khrung bar 'gyur ro/ /gshed byed dang / las dang / byad stem thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/
mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /de srid du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams
cad legs par yongs su rgyas par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du dgos par 'gyur ba thams cad lan gcig dran par byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ spra tshil las nam mkha'
lding gi gzugs sor brgyad pa skyil mo dkrung bcas pa/ 'dab ma bskyang ba/ klu rgyal gdan du bting ba/ mgo dgu pa mgo rgyan du thogs pa/ klu mgo gsum pa lag pa g.yas na thogs pa/ nor bu
rin po che 'bar ba lag pa g.yon na thogs pa/ gser gyis g.yogs pa byas te/ cho ga bzhin du tshon gyis ri mo bris la/ stan sna tshogs kyi steng du bzhag la/ nyin zhag gcig la sngags stong brjod
do/ /nam lus kyis mi thub pa'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza' bar bya ste/ yang khrus byas la bsgrub par bya'o/ /gu gul gyis bdug go/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma ci 'byor pa sbyar ro/ /mar
me btang la de'i mdun du nyal na ston par 'gyur zhing las thams cad brjod par 'gyur ro/ /mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /
lang long med pa'i gnas su bzhag la/ nam than pa byung ba'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas blangs te/ klu'i gnas su bkur bar bya/ klu'i gnas mtshor bzhag la/ me tog dang bdug pa byin la/ yungs kar
la sngags lan gsum bzlas te gnas su gtor na 'phral du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /gal te 'phral du char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs na/ de'i phyir klu'i gnas kun du nam mkha' lding gis
gang bar mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas me lce gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ bye tshan mgo la 'bab par 'gyur/ chu skams par 'gyur ro/ /than pa byung ba'i tshe sprin la bstan na char 'beb par 'gyur ro/ /
rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / char sprin la bstan na skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad bdun gyi nang du phyogs bzhi kun du ser ba mi 'bab cing / sad dang dus ma yin pa'i
rlung gis mi tshugs par 'gyur te/ thams cad thub par 'gyur/ rlung 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag go/ /yang na grong khyer gyi sgor ro/ /yang na rgyal po'i sgor bzhag go/ /des
rlung thams cad chod par 'gyur ro/ /rlung chen po rnam par 'thor yang chod par 'gyur ro/ /phyis ldang mi nus so/ /bstan ma thag tu klu thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mchu'i gzungs las
thams cad byed pa nam mkha' lding bklags pas grub pa mchog tu 'grub bo/ /de nas tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshogs pas kyang rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu

zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog pa/ snying 'gems pa/ klu mi bsrun pa'i rigs phung bar bgyid pa/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad sel ba/ lo tog dang /
me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad sgrub pa 'bul na/ sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa dang /

khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ngas byin gyis brlab
kyis brjod cig /de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis gzungs 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ shAkya

mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te samyak+saM bud+hA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra d+ha rA ya/ ma hA ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ na ma s+t+rai lo kya muR+ta ye/ na mash+tsa tur+NA~M/ ma hA rA dzA nAM/ na mo badzra sha ni dz+wa li ta rau twad ta sa ya/

dza ya ma hA ba la bIr+ya pa ra kra ma kro d+ha rA dza brah+mai brah+ma swa ra b+ho b+ho nA ga a d+hi ba ti bi sa ra da bi sa ra/ ma ra brah+ma dan+b+ha na muR+d+ha nAM/ pra ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bik+Shu tsakra hasta na bi sh+nA gen du ma ti biSh+Ta tsakre shri ts+tshin+da

mi/ tu ti tu ti/ li li li li/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ mu hu mu hu h+yan tu sarba duSh+Ta nA gaM/ po Ta ya hr-i da yaM ma he shwa ri dz+wa li ta tri shU la dwa ra/ ha na ha na hU~M hU~M phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ tu ti tu ti/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/

tsa tuR+NA~M/ ma ri tsa naM/ dz+wa li ta sha ka ti d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ spu ra spu ra/ bi spu ra bi spu ra/ tsa rwa tsa rwa/ nA sha ya/ duSh+TaM nA ga hr-i da yaM/ s+pho Ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ duSh+TaM ya sha ni/ ba ti nA ga na shi ta bi d+yu dz+wa

la b+hasmiM ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra bo nA ga a d+hi pa te badzri ba ya b+ho b+ho tu ti tu ti hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ badzra a shan ni nA sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ sarba nA ga hr-i da ya ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ bud+d+ha bi lo

ki tA ya swA hA/ brah+ma ya swA hA/ biSh+Nu mu rad ti swA hA/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ti tri shU la ya swA hA/ tsa tuR+ma hA rA dza sa ma d+ha ra ya swA hA/ b+hu tsa ga ya swA hA/ nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ \u0f00 d+hi ri d+hi ri swA hA/ dz+wa la te bag+h+ra ya swA hA/

ro ma hA ra nA sha ya swA hA/ dzu ti dzu ti dzu ti swA hA/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu mi bsrun pa thams cad lus rul te dri
mi zhim par gyur te/ lus shig shig por gyur cing / sha bkras btab par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bskyab du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smad par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni brlag go/ /bcom ldan 'das slan cad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi

bgyid do/ /gnod par mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das klu thams cad gnod par sems shing mi mchi ste/ tha na lta bar yang mi bgyid
na 'jug pa lta ci smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas 'di yi cho ga brjod de/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur 'brul lo/ /lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar la lan
nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na klu thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad bdun kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/
klu bzlog par bya'o/ /lan gcig brjod na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad bzlog go/ /thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis ser ba thams cad skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro/ /
gal te 'bab na yang yud tsam gyis chur 'gyur ro/ /ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na rdo rje bskor na/ phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'drim par 'gyur te/ phyogs der ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /
nang par dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog tu zhugs la/ skyil mo dkrung gi phyag rgya bcings te/ sngags lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis brjod de brjod ma thag tu rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba
thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /rlung thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig khyud kor du mtshams bcad par

'gyur ro/ /rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bu dang tsha bo 'khor dang bcas pa rgyun tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /las
thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dkrol na klu mi bsrun pa thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' las sa la
ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po dang / tshangs

pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ tshangs pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / klu mi bsrun pa/ snying rje med pa/ 'tshe ba rnams
gdul ba dang / tshar gcad pa dang / chad pas gcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod nas 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa legs so legs so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal

po chen po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam par kun nas bskor ba dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / gzhan yang klu mi bsrun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang
bcas pas slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / lo ma dang / yal ga rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyid do/ /
rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / tshad pa thams cad bzlog par bgyid do/ /dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'tshal lo/ /rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig
bskyang bar 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa grub par 'tshal lo/ /mi 'tshe bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gong

du sngags dang / gzungs ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /'di ni bro bor ba ste/ tad+ya thA/
pa ki tsa ti/ shu li shu mu li/ sha sha shu shu/ ti ti bi ri ti/ hu yu hu hu/ hu ri ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni klu'i mna' lags te/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi bsrun pa rnams 'jig

par bgyid do/ /than pa dang / than pa che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / glog byung na/ ri'am khang pa mthon po'i steng
du rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ mna' 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun brjod la/ chu dang yungs kar bsres pas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /gtor cing dran ma thag tu
klu thams cad kyi lus rnams dum bu brgyar 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gyes par 'gyur ro/ /'gugs par 'gyur te/ de'i slad du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
klu'i rgyal po khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /rdo rje mchu'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ badzra lo ha tuN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i
gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag thams cad 'dus nas klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog par bgyid pa/ snying 'gems par bgyid pa/ klu ma rungs pa rnams
kyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ba/ rlung dang / ser ba'i sprin thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad 'byor bar bgyid pa rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i
gzungs brjod par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i slad du byin gyis brlab du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /

dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams ngas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis khyed kyi smros shig ces bka' stsal

pa dang / de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis gzungs sngags 'di smras te/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu bo che rnams la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ma rungs pa/ drag tu rgod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma tha ma tha/

pra ma tha pra ma tha/ dz+wa li ta/ bi kr-i ta/ badzra dza ya/ dza ya/ ma hA ba la b+h+yo ra bi ra pa ra kra ma kro d+ha rA dza/ pra ma b+ha pu pu ma/ pra ma swa re/ b+ho b+ho nA ga de bi di/ b+h+yi sa ra ma d+ha/ bra ma d+ha na d+he na/ mUk+Yu nAM/ s+pho Ta maM/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/

b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+har+Na tsakra hA d+ha ni b+ho ban nA gen dra/ ma ti ka ma de ba na tsa kre na/ shi ra tsin+d+hA ma hU~M ti hU~M ti li hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ mu du mu du mu h+ye n+pu/ sarba duSh+TaM/ s+pho Ta ya/ hr-i da ya/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa la ti/ tri shU la d+ha ra d+ha ra/

ha na ha na/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ du di ba b+ha ba b+ha/ k+She Ne k+She Ne/ tsa tuR+NAM/ ma hA rA dzA nAM dz+wa la ti/ shag+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hU~M phaT/ s+phu ra s+phu ra/ bi spu ra bi spu ra bi spu ra/ tsa rarba tsa rarba tsa sarba nA sha ya

duSh+TaM nA ga hri da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ duSh+Ta a sha ni/ b+hat+ta ma ga sha byi ra dz+wa la/ b+hasmiM ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ya/ b+ho nA gA d+hi pa ti bi tsin+tu/ b+h+ye bo ya/ b+ho b+ho tu/ ti tu ti

tu/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ badzra A shA ni nA sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ badzra A shA ni nA sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni bi s+pho Ta kA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki tA ya swA hA/

brah+ma swA hA/ biSh+Nu mA ra ya swA hA/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri shU la ye swA hA/ tsa tuR+ma hA rA dza sa ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ bi tsa ga ti ya phaT swA hA/ oM di ri di ri swA hA/ dz+wa li ta ba g+h+ra ya swA hA/ dzu ti dzu ti swA hA/
phaT phaT/ rdo rje 'bar ba gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di thos ma thag tu klu ma rungs pa thams cad lus rul nas dri mi zhim pa mnam par 'gyur ro/ /lus so sor
zhig cing 'pho bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyabs su gsol/ lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas
pa thams cad kyis smad par gyur/ bdag cag ni ma rungs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams gnod par mi bgyid/ 'gums par mi bgyid/

chung ngu na mig kyang blta bar mi bgyid na skabs blta ba lta ci smos/ rgya mtsho klu'i rgyal po dang / klu'i rgyal po gdugs lta bu dang / klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba dang / mdangs che ba dang / ma rungs pa la
sogs te/ klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ klu thams cad kyis dus phyi ma'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams
cad la gnod par mi bgyid/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / lo ma dang yal ga thams cad srung bar bgyid/ rlung dang / ser ba thams cad dgag par bgyid/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyid
par rang gi blo'i tshig gi yi dam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang / yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
par bgyid/ gnod par mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag la 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /bro'i
tshig kyang 'di dag lags te/ tad+ya thA/ oM ta gi tsa gi/ g+hu li g+hu li/ mu li sha sha /gu gu/ shi ti bi ra ma ti/ hu yu hu yu swA hA/ char che ba'am/ char mi 'beb pa'am/ dus ma yin par char ba

pa'am/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / grang ba'i rlung dang / gnam lcags lhung ba'i tshe rig 'dzin gyi bro tshig 'di khang thog gam/ sa mthon po'am/ ri'i steng du yang rung / kha shar phyogs su
bltas te/ lan bdun skad chen por bzlas/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te gyen du gtor na/ gtor ma thag tu klu thams cad dum bur 'gyur zhing / nan tan byas pas myur du char 'bebs so/ /
gzungs 'di nyid kyis dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nan tur drag po byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur/
rdo rje gnam lcags mchu lan brgyad du bzlas pas klu dgag par bya/ lan cig dran pas rlung dang ser ba slar bzlog par bya'o/ /gnam lcags lhung na yang chur 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bskor na phyogs
gang du bskor ba des ser ba 'byol lo/ /nang par sngar sa dben par 'dug ste/ sngags 'di lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas na/ rlung dang sprin dang / ser ba yang 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /klus
gnod pa mi byed cing phyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /yungs kar la bsngags te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig gi bar du mtshams bcad de/ rlung dang sprin dang ser ba yang mi g.yo'o/ /ngag nyan cing
kun du bsrung ba dang / las byed par 'gyur ro/ /sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dril bu dkrol na klad pa 'gas shing sa la ltung bar 'gyur/ gnod pa byed pa sel lo/ /mchod pa tshul bzhin
bsngags par byas te/ skad gsal bar klags te phyogs bzhi steng 'og du yungs kar gtor na/ ser ba dang / rlung dang / klus gnod pa byed pa bcings par 'gyur/ ltas ngan pa dang / mi dge
ba dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / gza' dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po yang phyir bskrad par 'gyur/ dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur/
nad dang gnod par sems pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra bgegs thams cad bzlogs par 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba rgyas pa dang / smin pa dang / che bar 'gyur/ 'byung

po dang / gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ha tuN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags mchu
zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na rgyu zhing /
a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang
po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams dang / mi rnams ni bstan pa la gnod pa bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin dang /
'khor du mi gtogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring bar gnod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mi 'dul na bdag la drag pos 'dul ba'i chos bstan du
gsol/ theg pa'i chos dgra bsrung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs
pa sbyin pa'i lcags mchu'i gzungs ma rungs pa 'joms pa/ don thams cad byed pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/
dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ theg pa'i chos dgra bsrun pa/ rkang med dang rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang gnyis thams cad skrag du

'jug pa/ dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang bya'i

gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / log

'dren gyi gdon dang / ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur ba dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa

dang / 'dus pa las gyur ba dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa phung bar byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs nam mkha'i lding
drag po'i gzungs 'di zung shig /bstan pa la gnod pa skrag par byed pa/ char drag po dang / ser ba drag po 'bebs par byed pa'i gzungs brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ e te me te/ pra me tri tra/ go le

bo le bos se/ mod de/ pa da te/ khA rad te/ kha ra Ne/ gA nA gA ne/ nA gA mu ga ne/ mo ne pra tI mo ne/ kA li pra kA li tsan+ta/ ma hA tsan+te/ pra ti tsan+te/ be go so na/ go nA mo hA/ pra mo hA/ ma hA mo TA/ pra

mo TA/ na sha Ni/ pra nA shA nA d+hi pa ti/ balgA Ni/ pra balgA Ni/ ni d+ya Ni/ pA nid ThA ni/ kro d+ha ni/ pra di kro d+ha Ni/ ha na ha na/ bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta bra duSh+TaM/ nA sha ya sarba a b+ha ya pra dai hU~M phaT/ sngags 'di
brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu kun du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul lo/ /gnod pa thams cad khas bub tu brgyal lo/ /ske tshe dang / yungs nag tu bsres la/ chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang /

ri bo la gtor ro/ /de phyin cad char 'bebs par byed do/ /yang chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu mig dang / rdzing bu/ lu ma/ 'bab chu/ gnyan dgur bu ram/ sbrang / shing mngar/ sha ka ra/ klu sman sna tshogs 'o ma
la/ sngags la gtor ro/ /de'i phyir ser ba chen po 'bebs so/ /yid zlos bgyis te/ sprin la bltas la lha phyag bya zhing bzlas na ji ltar 'dod pa'i ser ba chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab
can gyis 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs 'di zung shig / chongs shig /brjod cig /gzhan la ma spel cig /sbos shig /thun mong du min no/ /rgya mtsho'i chu rdo bzhin mi mngon par sbos
shig /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i drag po'i gzungs 'dis 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyed pa'am/ gang du 'gro yang rungs te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la byang
bu gzugs so sngags pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dang gang gis yid rtse cig tu bya'o/ /dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/

dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung bas bstan pa la gnod pa bsnyung ba'i phyir yid la zung shig /chongs shig de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtug ste zhus dag /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ha tuN+De nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha nas rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugaso/ /
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni rab tu lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i dgra lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dran pa'i chos bstan du
gsol/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i 'jig rten shAkya thub pa'i zhing khams na/ mir gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor na dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dang /
dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dam pa'i chos 'jig pa la bsrung ba'i thabs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /lha'i dbang po khyod kyis lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs/ thams cad skrag par byed pa/ lha ma yin la thog smad lnga 'babs pa/ 'jig rten gyi rims nad zhi bar byed pa/
'jig rten thams cad du zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa/ dgra

thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ 'thab
pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'phags pa'i lcags kyi mchu 'di zung shig /thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs

kyi rig sngags brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ba ga tsa ni/ shu ti shu ma li/ ga sha sha sha ta ta bi ra ti/ hu yu hu yu ri ti swA hA/ rgya mtsho la 'bar li t-i gtor ro/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'bab bo/ /

klu'i gnas su phur bu la bye ba grangs med pa bzlas la/ klu'i gnas su btab na/ ser ba dang / thog ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'beb bo/ /sarba nA ga na pa bi r+ya phob/ nA ga shar phob/ nA ga ra ba sha phob/
rab tsi sri badzra hu phaT/ drag po yul khams kyi dgrar gyur pa bzlog pa/ mis gtor ba'i thog smad lnga 'bebs pa/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs
'di yis lha ma yin rmongs su 'jug pa/ 'khor rnam bzhi bsrung ba theg pa chen po'i chos dgra bsrung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtug ste zhus dag go/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa d+h+ri sha a ya auSh+Tha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lcags mchu nag po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gnas der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang / dung skyongs dang / gzi can dang / e la'i

'dab ma dang / mdongs bu dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin bskul dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa dang / klu'i rgyal po
mgo lnga pa dang / mgo drug pa dang / mgo gsum pa dang / mgo gnyis pa dang / mgo stong pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis mnas bor shig /a na na ste/ bi nan ste/ bi shi ki shi a gu bi ya gu re re/

hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ stam b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ ba sa sha rI ra ni/ ma tri tra/ ma tra ma ni swA hA/ sngags tshan dang po des klu rnams 'khrugs nas brgyal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das lags lo tog dang / 'bras
bu dang / sman rnams dang / rtsi shing dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams skams par rngo mi thog lags so/ /char chu dus su 'bebs so/ /rtsi shing dang nags tshal bskyed par bgyid lags
so/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi longs spyod 'tshe bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid lags so/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'das na bdag
cag klu rnams kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig /gnas med par gyur cig /lus rtsub par gyur cig /mdze dang shu ba dang / sha bkra 'byung bar gyur cig /mgo 'gas pa dang / snying 'drul bar gyur cig

ces bros bor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon bar dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad

tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag la gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ bsrung bar 'dod pa de dag ni khyed cag gi lus la 'jug

par gyis shig sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su su/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ru mu ru/

mi ri mi ri swA hA/ lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gnod sbyin pho mo rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i char gyi rgyun myur du 'bebs so/ /klu'i gnas kun nas chab phul dgu blangs la/ chab so sor

bzhag la/ yungs kar gyis bsngag cing chu ru stsal/ sngags rdzogs pa dang / klu'i gnas su bskyal lo/ /char ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis sems

can rnams la phan par lhag par dgongs pa mnga' ba/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs shig /k+Shi pran nir gad tsha da swA hA nA ga yu yu swA hA/

sprin pa la blta zhing phyogs bzhir kha bltas la phyag bya zhing / lan lnga bcur bzlas na/ char nges par myur du 'bab bo/ /char 'bebs pa'i tshe klu mi bsrun pa'i gnas su song la/ lus spos chus bkrus la
zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ sha chang sgog btsong spang bar bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsams la/ kha shar phyogs su bltas nas/ 'phags pa rnams la gsol ba gdab bo/ /ri pu

ri pu/ pa la ya thA/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ badzra badzra dza la ya swA hA/ sarba du shaM na bi ra na sha ga swA hA/ ga ru Da hri ti swA hA/ ya stags la bla re sngon pos dbub/ rgyal mtshan sngon po gzugs/ rig sngags
'chang ba stan sngon po/ gos sngon po/ rkang pa yang sngon por bgrad/ lha bshos sngon po/ bum pa chus bkang ba bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir bzhag /dbus su klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gzugs dgod/
shar gyi pad ma la klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dgod/ lho phyogs kyi pad ma la klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa dgod/ nub phyogs kyi pad ma la klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa dgod/ byang phyogs kyi pad ma la klu

mgo lnga pa dgod/ phrin las kyi gzhung las 'byung ba yang dgod/ oM he hu la phaT phaT/ hU~M bi dza ya phaT phaT/ nA ga li dz+wa la/ shad shad/ dz+wa li bi kraM ta/ badzra badzra la ma hA ba la bIr+ya pa ra kro d+ha da ra tsi/
bra me ru/ phaT phaT phaT du/ gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu sa chen po rnams g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu khas sbub du 'gyel nas/ rab tu
'dar te brgyal nas 'dre ldog cing ngu'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la smre zhing sngags 'dis klu rnams shin tu tshig go/ /ma rungs lags so zhes gsol ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / zhing rnams
kyi mig shin du gang bar gyis shig /lo tog phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs shig /mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la rnam par 'tshe bar ma byed cig /char gyi rgyun phob shig /'on kyang khyed kyis yun
rings po'i bde ba dang / klu'i gnod pa kun dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang mangs khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang med khyed
cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phy-ir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su
bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /gling 'dir char phob don rnams kyis/ /sa dang bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu
rnams la byams byed shog /char med than pa byung ba'i tshe/ /sngags tshan dang po brgya bzlas so/ /bar ma lnga bcu bzlas/ /tha ma bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /sprin la blta zhing bar bar sus kyang ma
tshor bar shib bur bzlas so/ /grangs las thal na ser bar 'gyur bas sdig che'o/ /klu gnad la gtad pa yin pas sdig che'o/ /lan grangs yang yang mi gdab bo/ /zhag gcig gam/ zhag
gnyis sam/ zhag lngar char gyi rgyun mi 'bab mi srid do/ /chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/ /kun gyi smon lam myur du 'grub 'gyur shog /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags pa lcags mchu nag po'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ba la nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri btang zung chen po na chos ston te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa yang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gis sems
can rnams dbugs 'byin cing / shar phyogs na me lce kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa lag pa gcig na
ni rnga yab thogs/ lag pa gcig gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas na ni be con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba'/ de'i 'og na ni bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so/ /g.yon na ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur
bzhag go/ snying po ni ki li ki la dang / 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang / lus dmar po dang / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje rgyan chen te snying po'i mchog go/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag

po chen po dang / nye ba na ni 'phags pa mA ma kI'o/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud do/ /sgo'i nang logs su ni khro bo rdo rje'i tho ba dang / rdo rje'i be con
gnyis mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/ /g.yon logs su ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su

ni gos dkar mo'o/ /de'i 'og tu ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can no/ /g.yon du ni rig sngags kyis rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo / /

de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang yul 'khor srung dang / dbang po'o/ /me'i phyogs na ni me'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug go/ /

bden bral gyi phyogasu ni srin mo'i bdag po ma mo rnams kyi bskor ba'o/ /nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /byang phyogs
su ni lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / de la sogs
pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin

gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /\u0f00 ki li ki li badzra/ ki li ki la swA hA/ spyi gtsug la swA hA/ dpral ba la swA hA/ mig la swA hA/ drag shul can la swA hA/ shin du drag

shul can la swA hA/ rdo rje'i zhags pa la swA hA/ lus dmar po la swA hA/ lag na rdo rje la swA hA/ lag na zhags pa la swA hA/ lag na ral gri la swA hA/ lag na dgra sta la swA hA/ gzhu 'dzin la swA hA/

gtun shing 'dzin la swA hA/ lag na 'khor lo la swA hA/ lag na mdung rtse gsum pa la swA hA/ snying po la swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ drag po ki li ki la la swA hA/ byis pa ki li ki la la swA hA/

dmar po ki li ki la la swA hA/ stobs po che la swA hA/ ral pa can la swA hA/ gsus 'phyang po la swA hA/ khro bo chol pa la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ srin po la swA hA/ srin po ya mun la swA hA/ drag po

chen po la swA hA/ sprin la swA hA/ ri 'dzin la swA hA/ ri btang zung 'dzin la swA hA/ rdo rje be con la swA hA/ 'jigs byed chen po la swA hA/ lus 'jigs byed la swA hA/ sdig byed la swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud

la swA hA/ rdo rje'i gtan pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i lus la swA hA/ 'gro lding ba la swA hA/ bdud rtsi la swA hA/ dka' thub 'dzin la swA hA/ lcags kyu la swA hA/ don yod la swA hA/ gtsug tor rgyal po la swA hA/
mdog dkar po la swA hA/ sngo bsangs mdog la swA hA/ 'phyang bo la swA hA/ glang po che la swA hA/ ba glang 'phel gyi lag pa la swA hA/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la swA hA/ sbrul gyi ska rags can la

swA hA/ rdo rje phur pa la swA hA/ lag pa gnyis ka la swA hA/ A rdo rje la swA hA/ 'bar ba'i 'od byed la swA hA/ blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swA hA/ myu gu la swA hA/ 'od byed la swA hA/ rdo rjes rnam

par 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i dra ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur la swA hA/ sprin rnam par 'thor ba la swA hA/ char pa rnam par rton pa la swA hA/ rdo rje lcags kyu la swA hA/ rdo rje snying po la swA hA/ rdo rje

nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ mthe bo'i rgyal po la swA hA/ be con gyi rgyal po la swA hA/ go cha'i rgyal po la swA hA/ \u0f00 d+hi ang / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag

'tshal lo/ /\u0f00 hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT swA hA/ \u0f00 a mr-i te hU~M phaT swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ lus ngan

po la swA hA/ dbang po la swA hA/ me lha la swA hA/ drang srong chen po thams cad la swA hA/ nyi ma la swA hA/ zla ba la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ srin po'i bdag po la swA hA/ klu'i bdag po la swA hA/

rlung la swA hA/ dbang bdag la swA hA/ dbang bdag gi chung ma la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ nor lha'i bu la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swA hA/ tshangs pa chen po la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha mo dpal la swA hA/

lha mo dka' thub bzlog la swA hA/ rig sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /las

thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki la/ d+hi ke/ ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta/ ma hA ka Ta/ sha ma sha ma sha ma/ ma hA sha ma/ shA tri shA tri shA tri/ shAn

ta shAn ta shAn ta/ dan ta dan ta dan ta/ d+hi ra d+hi ra d+hi ra/ ma hA me g+ha dur d+ha ra/ ha ri ha ri ha ri/ kud Ti kud Ti kud Ti/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ b+hin da b+hin da b+hin da/ sarba duSh+Tan/ gu mu gu mu gu mu/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ pa Na na

da/ ma ni da ma ni/ Ta Ta Ta/ ThA ThA ThA/ dA dA dA/ dA dA dA/ tsa tsa tsa/ tsa tsa tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha da ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ sha ba ri sha ba ri sha ba ri/ ma tang gi/ tsaN+Da li/ hu hu hu/ dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/ ha

ta pra t+yar+thi na/ tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phaT phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tha tha tiSh+Tha tha tiSh+Tha tha ma ti kra mA tha/ ma tang gi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he// // gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / kha dang / mid pa dang /

mig dang / snying dang / ngag thams cad bcing ngo / /dbrog go/ /dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dun d+hu dun d+hu dun d+hu/ ban d+hu ban d+hu ban d+hu/ nI la nI la nI la/ nI lAng ga badzra d+ha ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis

shig /ko ti ko ti ko ti ni/ sarba bU tA ni badzra ma na/ badzra d+ha ra/ ad ta ta sa/ tsar du nar du mar du/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ sems can chen po dran par gyis shig /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ phaT phaT

phaT/ tsaN Da tsaN Da tsaN Da/ ma hA tsaN Da/ hur tu hur tu hur tu/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badzra pA Ni/ ha na ha na/ ma ma sarba sha truM NAn/ mu hu ni ta Da ya phaT/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ lag na rdo rje'i las dang
'gal bar ma byed cig / dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig dral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bslus bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/ /tsu tsu tsu/ ha ra

ha ra ha ra/ phud Tu phud Tu phud Tu/ ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pa tsa ni pa tsa ni pa tsa ni/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig /tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phu lu phu lu
phu lu/ phu phu phu/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi snying po 'di dang 'gal bar bgyis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /dar phu/ tsar phu/

nar phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /swA hA/ \u0f00 hU~M hU~M phaT phaT
swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun du 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur bar kun du snang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dang / bdud sdig can ral gri dang / 'khor
lo dang / gzhu dang mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad

dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba bzhugs pa der dong ngo / /de nas de ltar gyur ba dang / khro bo chol ba mdog dmar po/ sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ mche ba gtsigs
pas mi bzad pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ shar phyogs

su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang kun du snang ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong phrag brgya khro bo chol bas 'dar bar gyur to/ /bdud sdig can myos shing gzir te/ phongs nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pa bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /de ltar gyur

ba dang / de'i tshe 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das
la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/
mngon par dga' bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog
gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas/ don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi

'di dag smras so/ /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ sti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod par byed
na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad bshig pa dang / bcom pa dang / bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas don 'dod pa thams

cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bid dwan sa ya/ dza Ti lam bo d+ha ra/ u
tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur
bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ stobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la ni gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu'am/ srin po'am/ srin po'i bu'am/ grul bum mam/
grul bum gyi bu'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi bu'am/ klu'am/ klu'i bu'am/ dri za'am/ dri za'i bu'am/ sha za'am/ sha za'i bu'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed kyi bu'am/ mkha' 'gro
ma'am/ mkha' 'gro ma'i bu'am/ bsgrub pa'am/ sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa dang / brjed byed dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs la sogs pa dang / gnon po'i gdon thams cad dang / brjed
byed la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na

rdo rje legs so legs so/ /stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid do de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bskor bar bgyi
ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag na

mdung rtse gsum thogs pa drag shul can/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti ra na da hU~M hU~M hU~M/ oM oM oM/ phaT phaT phaT/ stobs po che la swA hA/ oM rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi ki ra/ bi

d+h+wan sa ya dza Ti la lam b+ho d+ha ra/ u tsu sh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba duSh+Tan/ stam b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ du rA tsa rAn duSh+Tan ni bA ra ya/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM a nan ta bi dza ya/

ma hA tsaN+Da hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+h+r-i ka hU~M phaT/ oM shri ri shi ra ma li ni/ si ni si ni/ shi shi ni/ shi shi ni/ oM sarba ad ma dza/ ma hA ti dza badzra/ a sha ni badzra/ pa sha a nu/ pra bi sha /sarba duSh+Tan/ stam

b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM hUM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ oM a nan ta/ bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN De/ hU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra karta ri ka ra ka ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha/

ma hA ba la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /dza la dza la hU~M phaT/ oM bi pu ra/ rak+Sha badzra/ pan dza ra hU~M phaT/ oM ki li ki li/ badzra badzri b+hu ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ A kar Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/

hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ dA ra ya/ dA ra ya/ pa Ta ya pa Ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha

ma hA ba la/ ta Da ta Da/ ta Da ya ta Da ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ di pya di pya/ di pa ya di pa ya/ hU~M phaT/ oM tsu lu tsu lu/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha/ shi khA ra ha rA ha ra hU~M phaT/

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA tsaN Da/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi ki ra/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ bcom ldan

'das tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ ha na ha na/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bid d+h+wan sa ya/ bid d+h+wan sa ya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyis bdag pos mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa/

gzi brjid chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ kurba kurba/ ma hA kurba/ bi kurba/ ku nad ti/ ku nad ti/ na ti na ti/ shi ni shi ni/ khi ni khi ni/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ku ru ku ru/ tu Ta

tu Ta/ tud Ta tud Ta/ rbad Ta rbad Ta/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po/ klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ khro bo chol pa stobs po che/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/

su ru su ru/ hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~MphaT/ da ha da ha/ hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hri hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu ru swA hA/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ sarba duSh+Tan/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya

hU~M phaT/ oM ha ha/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ oM bi sa ra/ san tra sa ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha ra ha ra/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M/ mA ma/ mA ma phaT/ oM d+h+rI ka

kro d+ha ni/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM ma hA ba la/ badzra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ swA hA/ oM dz+wa la gra sa/ u tsuSh+ma sang ga ra hU~M// //rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bsrung

ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur/ shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/
dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bu mang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs kyang gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas
zin pa rnams la ni skyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur/ mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo yang bde bar btsas par 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di zhag gsum
bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs
te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ lag na rdo rje dga' ba/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / tshangs pa dang dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang /
srin po dang / ro langs dang / lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/ smyo byed dang / skrod pa dang / gsod pa dang / skems byed dang / sgo legs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / rdo rjes rnam par
'joms pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung
po'i bdag po dbang bdag la 'byung po'i bdag po legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sbar te/ rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas/ thams cad

dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad

la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes sdom bag can du rdo rje spar te/ de nas rdo rje pad
ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas/ rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa/ dga' bar byed pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ khro bo chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir bar bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo / /de dag tshig nas smre zhing
srog btang ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyams thag pa'i skad kyis dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab du gsol/ byang
chub sems dpa' yongs su bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo chol pas gzir cing myos te/ phongs nas srog la yang mi lta'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /mthu che ba'o/ /de dag gis 'di skad ces

smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /mthu che ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje seng ge'i lta

stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po la khro bo chol pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pas smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na pa tsa ma tha bid d+h+wan sa ya/ dza Ti lam bo d+ha ra/ u tsuSh+ma
kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ a A ma mA hAd swA hA/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro bo stobs po che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas dus byed par
mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la drag po'i las dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la bgegs dang / mi dang / rnam par log 'dren gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams cad dga'
bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
'dir dbang bskur na bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo chen po lan khris bzlas bzlas te/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor

byed pa/ byas pa bzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skyabs su dong ba/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil

'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyi lung byin pa/ gang bdud thams cad dang / sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang

klog pa de la bdud dang / dgra thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul
'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gsad pa dang bcing ba thams cad las
thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gcad pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i 'jigs pa thams
cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/
rjes su dran par byed na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lo nyes pa byung ba'i tshe/ stobs po che lan bdun bklags na/ sprin chen po las char 'bab po/ /gal te char

mi 'bab na sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog skam par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis sprin chen po las char 'bebs so/ /gal te
char mi 'bebs na srog skam par 'gyur ro/ /gong du smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs kyi cha'am/ rlung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram 'am/ mtsho'i 'gram 'am/ mchod rten gyi gnas su byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan dan dmar po dang / ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang / pad ma dmar po dang / a ti mu ta ka'i me tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me
tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po la sogs pa dang / bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de g.yul ngo thams cad
du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs po che rgyal mtshan gyi
rtse mo la btags te g.yul ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags gro kha la bris te spyi bor btags nas g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /
de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
stobs po che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos so/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi tshul lo/ /
stobs po che zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rje'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /
skyabs su mchi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /dge bsnyen gyi yan lag gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bde dang thar dang mtho
ris dang / /mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni/ /dam pa kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /stobs po che ni gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas bdud sdig can chos la dga' zhing yid bde ba dang rangs par gzigs
nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'o/ /de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa'am/ smyung bar byas pa'am/
smyung bar ma byas pa'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la brten pa la 'ang 'grub par byed do/ /de la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rig
sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig stsol ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris shig /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/

lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig sbyin par byed/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do/ /gos sbyin par byed do/ /dngul sbyin par byed do/ /

gser sbyin par byed do/ /ba glang sbyin par byed do/ /dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ spyi'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/
sems can nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnams la ni 'bras bu'i dus su gnas so/ /'bras bu'i dus kyi yon tan gyi don du gnas so/ /yon tan gyi don gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ /stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun

sum tshogs/ /spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs/ /mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab che/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ /dbang cher grags shing bsod nams che/ /
yon tan rtse mo stobs po che/ /mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir/ /sangs rgyas brgyad stong der gshegs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor
bzhag ste/ dge ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis gzungs sngags 'di sa'am/ ri'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcangs na 'jigs pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro nad
ma mchis par lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di ni

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung shig /chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zung shig /sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
bar yang zung shig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal

po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung shig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / sti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang /

ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /shin du zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang /
cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa bzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i

sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shing ltar ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la stsogs pas mchod pa byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag

tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de la bar chod mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di gnas gang yang rung ba na 'chang na lha dang mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po

che/ bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang /

dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga'o/ /stobs po che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su

mdo sde 'di la gus par mi byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod
pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge 'dri'am/ tshig mnyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i
chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin du phra ba/ shin du zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang log par sems pa de myos par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
