cad la/ /dang por bdag po bzhugs gsol nas/ /de yi 'og tu sbyin sreg brtsam/ /sngags 'grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /dang por rigs kyi rig sngags kyis/ /bsrung ba byas te las rnams brtsam/ /

sngags 'grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /las mthar rigs kyi snying po yis/ /gzi byin bskyed pa brtsam par bya/ /sngags 'grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /
thog ma dang ni tha mar yang / /mar gyi dgang blugs rtag tu bsreg /sngags 'grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /rigs bdag rig sngags snying po
bzlas/ /tha mar mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag la sbyin sreg gi/ /cho ga ma lus bsgrags pa yis/ /cho ga de yis 'dir yang ni/ /

sbyin sreg las rnams bya bar bshad/ /lag mthil chu la bzlas pas ni/ /lan gsum du yang 'thor 'thung bya/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i tha mar ni/ /rang gi rig sngags nyid kyis kyang / /bsang gtor lan gsum bya bar bshad/ /de 'og

me la kun bsregs nas/ /spyan drang rig sngags de nyid kyis/ /bzhud cig bzhud cig ces byas te/ /de yi 'og tu slar btang ngo / /gsang sngags yi ge'i rjes mthun par/ /mjug tu bzlas brjod brtsam par bya/ /de ltar sbyin
sreg thams cad kyi/ /cho ga mdor bsdus bshad pa yin/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang gang dag gis/ /bsdus nas rig sngags thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags cho ga rtsom 'gyur

ba'i/ /cho ga yan lag bsdu ba bshad/ /dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad ni/ /thog ma nyid du kun bsdus te/ /de nas bsnyen pa'am sgrub pa dag /blo dang ldan pas brtsam par bya/ /dri zhim de ni de dang de/ /de bzhin bdug spos

rnam pa dang / /snying po thang chu rigs rnams dag /khyad par du ni bsag par bya/ /yungs kar sardza ra sa dang / /dug dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /til dang 'bru mar ba mar dang / /bum pa dang ni zangs kyi snod/ /'bru dang rin chen sna lnga dang / /

sman rnams dang ni sbrang rtsi dang / /de bzhin bu mos bkal ba yi/ /tshon sna lnga yi srad bu dang / /mar me'i don du kong bu dang / /shing bal mar me'i snying po dang / /kham phor dang ni tshon rtsi'i rdzas/ /de bzhin seng ldeng phur bu dang / /mchod

sbyin gyi ni yam shing dang / /nim pa'i dgang gzar blugs gzar dang / /gi wang dang ni ur mo'i lcags/ /tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /gos dang gsang srel srad bu dang / /ri dgas nag po'i lpags pa gsar/ /nas dang 'bras

yos pri yang ku/ /tsan dan dkar dang shing gi lham/ /muny+dza ku sha sha ta bus/ /me tog snod ni shis pa dang / /mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dang ni/ /de bzhin bgrang phreng la sogs dang / /de dag la sogs blo can gyis/ /nor dang sgrub pa'i yan
lag rnams/ /thams cad thog mar yongs bsdus nas/ /de yi 'og tu las rnams brtsam/ /sgrub pa'i yan lag bsog pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // de nas sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid

gang dag gsungs pa kun/ /sngags zlos pa yi dngos grub phyir/ /de dag mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang / /nor gyi char 'bab gser chen dang / /'khor lo ldong ros ral gri ste/ /'di dag dngos grub

bdun yin no/ /phal cher spyi yin khyad par 'phags/ /che la mchog gi mchog yin te/ /de yi bsod nams phung chen dang / /rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dngos grub dam pa ni/ /gtsug tor pad ma rdo rje gsum/ /

rigs dang rigs kyi bye brag las/ /phal cher yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /gsang sngags gang yang rung ba yis/ /gang yang rung ba'i dngos grub kyang / /mngon bar shes pa lhag rtog pa/ /gtso bo yin par yongs su bsgrags/ /

gser dang dngul la sogs pa las/ /yu ba khru gang tsam byas la/ /de steng rin chen chen po ni/ /gcig pu bzhag pa'am nor bu ni/ /pad ma rA ga dag pa 'am/ /yang na shel las byung ba'ang rung / /khri'u 'i steng du legs bzhag

nas/ /sgrub pa pos ni mtshan mo bsgrub/ /gsang sngags sta gon cho ga dang / /bdag nyid dbang bskur gang bshad pa/ /de yi rang bzhin cho ga des/ /bum pa bzang po bsgrub par gsungs/ /gser dag dang ni dngul dag dang / /

rin chen sna tshogs la sogs pa/ /dpag tshad lnga yi khor yug tu/ /nor ni char bzhin 'bab par gsungs/ /mi zad pa yi gter chen ni/ /gser la sogs pas gang ba ste/ /sbyin dang longs spyod la sogs pa/ /spyad cing phyung

yang mi zad pa'o/ /ur mo'i lcags kyi 'khor lo ni/ /mdzub gang tsam la rtsibs drug pa/ /shin tu gzugs legs rno bdar ba/ /myur du 'grub cing chen por 'gyur/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i gzugs 'dra zhing / /gser ni gtso ma'i

mdog lta bu/ /ka ra bI ra'i mdog 'dra zhing / /ldong ros dag ni mchog tu bshad/ /ral gri mthe'u chung mtho do ba/ /'phan med zheng du sor bzhi tshad/ /bdar ba tsa sha'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /'grub phyir ba so'i dngo can no/ /phyag rgya bri ba'i

cho ga bzhin/ /gtsug tor phyag rgya gser las byas/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i yu ba byas/ /che la bzhag ste bsgrub par bya/ /pad ma tsan dan las byas pa'i/ /de bzhin gser sogs las byas pa/ /mtho gang ba las sdong bu

dngul/ /mdab brgyad snying po mdzes par bya/ /rdo rje ur mo'i lcags byas pa'am/ /yang na tsan dan dmar po'ang rung / /lcags gsum las byas sor bcu drug /gnyis ka rtse mo gsum par bya/ /bab la yon tan 'phags

pa dag /gser gyi gyim phag 'dra ba yi/ /sul gyis gang zhig ljid che ba/ /kha dog bzang po 'grub phyir mchog /ser skya dag las byung ba yi/ /gi wang kha dog ser po'o/ /btsag ni yug snam gser mdangs can/ /me tog

ban du'i mdog 'dra ba'o/ /grog mkhar brtsegs pa 'dra ba la/ /btsag na ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog /shin tu 'jam po 'di 'dra ba/ /chu rgyun las byung any+dza na'o/ /ras phran gtsang ma 'jam po ni/ /kho lag che la gur gum

btsos/ /dgon pa'i phyugs kyi lci ba yi/ /thal ba ga bur gyis bsgos pa'o/ /mchod phyir thogs kyi srad bu dkar/ /phra zhing sum bsgril legs bkal ba'am/ /yang na gser gyi skud pa ni/ /legs bsnyad sum bsgril

yon tan can/ /sna ma'i me tog phreng ba ni/ /bu mos bkal skud las brgyus pa'o/ /shri pa Na yis shing gi lham/ /yam shing legs bzhogs 'theb rten can/ /rma bya'i gdugs ni smyug ma yi/ /yu ba ring po gsang la

btags/ /mdung rtse gsum dang dbyug tho thogs/ /thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid ldan/ /bsgrubs na myur du 'grub pa'i phyir/ /mtshon cha rnams ni rab tu shis/ /'di ni cho ga las gsungs pa'i/ /bsgrub bya'i rdzas rigs gang

yin pa/ /de dag mtshan nyid 'jig rten las/ /khyad par du ni nye bar brtag /de bzhin dngos grub mang po yis/ /bsgrub bya'i rdzas ni sna tshogs pa/ /de bas de dag bdag blo dang / /gtsug lag blo yis yongs su

brtag /nad med mdangs bzang lus ma nyams/ /gzugs bzang rma med dar la bab/ /bdag nyid shi bar gyur pa'i ro/ /ro langs dngos grub phyir ni mchog /yang na las kyi bye brag las/ /rigs ngan dag kyang rab tu shis/ /

ro langs bsgrub pa dag la ni/ /'jigs med mchog ste des nges so/ /rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // yo byad kun dang ldan ba yis/ /ci rigs bar ni mchod byas nas/ /bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams

yongs gzung ba/ /dus mtshams dag la snga dro bya/ /gsang sngags nye bar gyur nas ni/ /gang tshe bka' lung gsal shes pa/ /de tshe bsgrub pa'i rdzas gzung ba/ /mkhas pa dag gis legs par bya/ /khrus byas gtsang zhing smyung

byas te/ /bkra shis ngo mtshar dag byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams yongs su gzung / /'byung khung dag nas ci mthong ba/ /lan gcig smra ba 'jigs med pas/ /kha thabs bzhin du nyos pa

yi/ /bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni yongs su gzung / /gang tshe sgrub pa'i dus dag tu/ /gsang sngags nye bar gyur shes pa/ /de tshe blo dang ldan pa yis/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams yongs su gzung / /yang na mkhas pas rdzas dag ni/ /rnam mang

gzugs dang ldan pa dag /lung gis dag par rnam shes pa/ /de dag cho ga bzhin du gzung / /rdzas bzang gang yang rung ba dag /cho ga bzhin du yongs bzung nas/ /de ma thag tu rab bsgrims te/ /blo dang ldan pas sgrub pa brtsam/ /rdzas

yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // de nas bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams kun/ /ci rigs par ni rnam par sbyang / /brtag par bya ba sra ba rnams/ /ba yi sna lngas sbyang bar bsgrags/ /ba yi rnam lnga cha mnyam pas/ /ldong ros

dag ni btag par bya/ /'o ma gtsang ma mang po yis/ /ba la legs par btag par bya/ /ba gcin mang pos li khri ste/ /mar mang rnams kyis gi wang ngo / /'o ma kha dog ldan ba'i rdzas/ /any+dza na ni 'ba' zhig go/ /ral gri 'khor

lo la sogs rdzas/ /ba yi lci ba chu mang bas/ /shing dang sems can la sogs rdzas/ /thams cad ba yi gcin dang chus/ /ri dgas nag po'i lpags la sogs/ /ba yi gcin dang bska bas bkru/ /de ltar rdzas rnams bkrus nas

ni/ /spos chu dag gis bshal bar bya/ /ba yi gcin dang bcas pa yi/ /til dang chu yis ma lus bshal/ /rdzas dang mthun ba'i spyad pa'i/ /'jig rten na ni gang grags pa/ /de dag gis ni rdzas sbyang ba'am/ /yang na thams

cad spos chus bya/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags sam/ /rigs dang rigs kyi snying po yi/ /gsang sngags rdzas dang mthun pa yis/ /thams cad sbyang bar bya bar grags/ /thams cad rigs kyi rig sngags kyis/ /

bsang gtor byas na dag par bshad/ /dang po ba yi rnam lngas bya/ /de yi rjes la til gyi chus/ /thams cad rab tu spyad bar bya/ /rdzas sbyang pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // rgyan dang mtshon cha gos la sogs/ /rdzas kyi

rigs su gtogs pa kun/ /phal cher 'jig rten grags ba yi/ /tshad kyang grags pa nyid du zad/ /ldong ros dag ni btags pa las/ /dngos grub phyir ni srang lnga'o/ /'bring po la ni srang gsum ste/ /tha ma dag la srang gcig

go/ gi wang dag ni srang gcig tshad/ /bab la dag ni srang gnyis so/ /any+dza na ni zho drug ste/ /ba mar la ni srang bdun no/ /thal ba la ni srang lnga ste/ /gur gum ldong ros dag dang mnyam/ /mi snang ba la bshad pa yi/ /ril bu sna tshogs

yang byas te/ /bye brag tu ni grangs bdun nam/ /nyi shu gcig gi bar du shis/ /yang na dgos pa'i dbang gis su/ /rdzas rnams tshad las lhag gyur kyang / /blo dang ldan pas sgrub pa la/ /de yi tshad du rdzas rnams gzung / /sngags rgyud

gzhan las ci gsungs dang / /rang gi cho ga las gsungs dang / /'jig rten dag na gang shis pa/ /de dang de dag yongs su gzung / /sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshad dang ni/ /grogs po rnams kyi tshad dag dang / /rig sngags kyi ni snang ba las/ /

rdzas kyi tshad kyang shes par bya/ /rab dang 'bring po tha ma yi/ /dngos grub dag gi bye brag las/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /rdzas kyi tshad kyang bshad pa yin/ /rdzas kyi tshad kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang gang zhig gis/ /

dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur ba'i/ /rdzas sgrub pa yi cho ga dag /gsang chen rgyas par bshad par bya/ /sgrub pa'i phyir ni dgos pa rnams/ /thog mar yid la legs bsams te/ /blo dang ldan pas yo byad ni/ /thams cad legs

par bsog par bya/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis/ /gsang sngags yongs su tshim byas te/ /dbang bskur cho ga gsungs pa'ang bya/ /de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /dang por dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du

legs mchod de/ /der ni bdag nyid tshul bzhin du/ /dbang bskur nas ni las rnams brtsam/ /de nas gzhan yang zlos pa dag /dngos grub phyir ni dbang bskur ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor las rnams kun byed pa/ /gang dag rab tu bsgrags

bshad pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga gang dag sngar bstan pa / /des ni sa gzhi sbyang la sogs/ /thams cad de bzhin kho nar bya/ /khru lnga'am bdun nam brgyad pa la/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /grwa bzhi ldan par

rnam brtags pa/ /nub tu sgo gtod sgo khyud can/ /de yi tshad kyi phyed kyi chas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim bskor ba dag /tshon rtsi sna lnga'i phye ma yis/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya/ /mkhas pas de yi nub phyogs su/ /khru bzhi yis

ni bar bcad nas/ /khru lnga'am bzhi 'am gsum pa la/ /grwa bzhi shar du sgo yang gdod/ /cho ga bzang po kun la mang / /sgrub pos mngon par dbang bskur phyir/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshad dag gi/ /phyed kyi tshad du dkyil 'khor bya/ /sa gzhi shar du

gzhol ba la/ /nub bam byang du sgo gtod do/ /kun kyang byang du gzhol na ni/ /nub tu sgo yang gtod par gsungs/ /kun tu thig ni btab nas kyang / /tshon sna gcig gis bri bya ste/ /phyi rol gyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /rdo rje rtse mo gsum pa bri/ /

gsang sngags kun la thog mar ni/ /dbus su pad ma'i snying por bcas/ /'dab ma brgyad pa bris nas kyang / /de nas bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan/ /sgo rnams kun tu rdo rje dang / /grwa rnams su ni bum pa dgod/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor

dag la yang / /cho ga de bzhin bya bar bshad/ /dbang bskur ba yi dkyil 'khor du/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi rnams ni/ /grwa yi ri mo'i nang rol du/ /nges pa nyid du bzhag par bya/ /dbus su gsang sngags zlos pa po'i/ /rig sngags

rgyal po gang yin pa/ /de yi phyag rgya bris nas su/ /de yi steng du bum pa bzhag /ji ltar rigs la rnam bstan pa'i/ /phyag rgya gtsug tor pad ma dang / /rdo rje 'di gsum rim bzhin du/ /rab tu gsang ba'i dam pa yin/ /phyag rgya rnams la

ma goms na/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags sam/ /yang na lha rnams kun gyi phyir/ /yungs kar steng du bum pa bzhag /snam bu'i cha ni legs phye nas/ /shar du bcom ldan phyag rgya bzhag /de yi g.yon du snying po'o/ /

g.yas su rigs kyi yum bzhag go/ /de bzhin byang du cho ga bzhin/ /pad ma 'chang ba gzhag par bya/ /lhor ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /nub tu tshangs pa drag po'o/ /grwa gnyis kyi ni ngos dag tu/ /kun dga' bo dang rab 'byor dang / /mdung

thung dang ni mche ba dang / /rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams dgod/ /grwa gnyis kyi ni ngos dag tu/ /don grub pa dang mthu chen dang / /dpal mo dang ni gos dkar can/ /rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams dgod/ /

grwa gnyis kyi ni ngos dag tu/ /rdo rje rdo rje dbyug pa dang / /rdo rje khu tshur gnam lcags ma/ /rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams dgod/ /grwa gnyis kyi ni ngos dag tu/ /drag po'i glor ni drag mo dang / /tshangs pa'i glor ni dpal chen dang / /

sna tshogs lha yi tshogs rnams bri/ /sngon bzhin phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/ /phyogs mtshams skyong ba'i lha la sogs/ /phyogs skyong go rim bzhin du dgod/ /lhag ma ma smos pa yang dgod/ /klu rgyal dga' bo bsnyen

dga' bo/ /sgo yi ngos su gzhag par bya/ /mdzes dga' nye mdzes phyi rol sgor/ /mdun du bdud rtsi thabs sbyor bzhag /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i cho ga bzhin/ /mchod sogs cho ga gang yin ba/ /de dag byas nas sbyin sreg

las/ /rnam gsum tshul bzhin legs par brtsam/ /bgegs rnams gzhom phyir drag shul spyod/ /rang gi 'byor phyir rgyas par bya/ /zhi ba'i ched du zhi ba ste/ /ji ltar mthong bzhin bya bar gsungs/ /rigs gsum dag gi

spyi la yang / /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags sam/ /yang na thabs sbyor byed pa yi/ /bgegs rnams la ni drag shul spyad/ /snying po nyid kyis rgyas pa ste/ /zhi ba'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyis/ /yang na kun la las kun

pa'am/ /so so yi ni cho gas bya/ /dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas sgo yi g.yas rol du/ /mar sogs sbyin sreg rdzas dag las/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bya'o/ /las rnams gsum po dag la yang / /
mkhas pas gsang sngags rnam gsum gyis/ /rim pa bzhin du brgya brgya 'am/ /yang na lhag par sbyin sreg bya/ /rig sngags bdag por bcas pa rnams/ /tshim par bya phyir sgrub pa pos/ /rigs dang rigs la

sbyin sreg brgya'am/ /yang na so sor bdun bdun bya/ /sgrub pa'i rig sngags gang yin de/ /rang gi bdag po'i mdun du bzhag /'phrog ma dang ni ri mkhar ma/ /dung can ma dang lha mo drag /ral pa gcig ma'am phyogs

bzhin du/ /mchod bar 'dod pas mchod pa bya/ /lha rnams thams cad legs mchod de/ /sbyin sreg ci dgar byas nas ni/ /sngar bkod pa yi bum pa la/ /rang gi sngags kyis mngon bar bsngags/ /lha yi mdun na gang 'dug pa/ /

gcig ni rang gi sngags kyis bzlas/ /dkyil 'khor dbus na gang 'dug pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod bya/ /sgo yi drung na gang 'dug pa/ /rdo rje khro bos bzlas brjod bya/ /snying po'i rigs kyi rig sngags

kyis/ /shar gyi grwa gnyis bzlas brjod bya/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags dang / /de bzhin gsang sngags gzhan kun gyis/ /nub kyi grwa gnyis 'dug pa yi/ /bum pa la ni tshul bzhin bzlas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams

kun/ /bzlas shing tshul bzhin sbyin sreg nas/ /ci nus par ni legs mchod de/ /de nas rab tu bskor bar bya/ /dbang bskur ched du cho ga gang / /dkyil 'khor dag tu kun bshad pa/ /bkra shis la sogs de dag ni/ /'dir yang nan

tan bskyed de bya/ /bum pa bzang po rin chen bcas/ /'bru dang bcas shing sman dang bcas/ /me tog 'bras bu lo mar bcas/ /chur bcas mgul chings phreng ba can/ /de yi las rnams thams cad la/ /dang por dbang ni bskur

bar gsungs/ /zlos pa po'i grogs po ni/ /smyung bar gnas pa dbang bskur ro/ /yang na rang gi bla ma ni/ /lung la lhag par mkhas pas bya/ /yon tan ldan zhing dka' thub can/ /mkhas pas las 'di byed du gzhug /dang po

bgegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu sbyar/ /bar du bar ma dag gis ni/ /mjug du rang gis bzlas par bya/ /yungs kar bzlas brjod byas pa dang / /gi wang dri dang bdug spos sogs/ /srad bu gdu bu gos

rnams kyang / /'dir ni kun tu bcang bar bya/ /dbang bskur zin nas bdag nyid kyis/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg las byas nas/ /dogs pa med par cho ga bzhin/ /slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /yang na sa phyogs mnyam bzang bar/ /

stegs bu khru do gru bzhi la/ /tshon sna gcig gis rgyas pa dang / /chung ngur legs par bri bar bya/ /phyag rgya gsum po phyogs bzhin du/ /de bzhin nub tu mdung rtse gsum/ /de yi dbus kyi bum pa yis/ /dbang bskur phyir ni sngon bzhin

bya/ /mdor bsdus cho ga 'di yis kyang / /bdag nyid dbang bskur byas par 'gyur/ /de ltar byas na bgegs med pa/ /'di ni zlos pa'i gsang chen yin/ /lha rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang / /bgegs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /tshe dang

bsod nams mngon par 'phel/ /sdig pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ /de phyir zlos pa tshul shes pas/ /cho ga rgyas pa shes byas nas/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba 'di ni kun du spyad/ /dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// //

de nas gzhan yang sngags sgrub pas/ /nyin re zhing yang dus gsum du/ /sngags dang rjes su 'thun ba yi/ /sbyin sreg las ni gsungs pa brtsam/ /cho ga bzhin du til nag dang / /zho dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar 'am/ /lag ban gyi ni sbyin

sreg bya/ /zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /zhag bdun yang na zla gcig tu/ /gsang sngags dngos grub rjes mthun par/ /cho ga 'di ni bya bar bstan/ /de la bdug cing bsang gtor bya/ /yid la bzlas shing blta bar bya/ /bsang byed

bcas pa'i lag pa yis/ /gsang sngags bzlas shing brim par bya/ /gi wang chu dang yungs kar gyis/ /bye brag tu yang bsang gtor bya/ /rdzas la dus tshigs dus tshigs su/ /ji ltar rigs par mchod par bya/ /yar gyi ngo la sgrub

'os pa/ /mkhas pas zla ba nya la bya/ /mar gyi ngo la sgrub 'os pa/ /mar gyi ngo yi bcu bzhi la/ /mkhas pas rigs kyi rig sngags kyis/ /rdzas rnams byin ni bskyed par bya/ /dri dang bdug spos phreng sogs kyis/ /khyad bar du ni

mchod par bya/ /lag ngar gdu bu btags pa yis/ /lag mthil dri yis bskus pa yis/ /lag pas mtshan gcig thal byung du/ /nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas/ /de nyid kyi ni nub mo yang / /so so'i rigs kyi gsang sngags ni/ /rdzas

rnams byin bskyed byed pa 'dis/ /dus gsum du ni brgya brgya bzlas/ /de ltar blo dang ldan ba yis/ /rdzas de yongs su bzung ba nas/ /ma grub bar du dus gsum bzlas/ /de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM te dza te dza sa ni sid+d+hi sA d+hA

ya hU~M phaT/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /oM dI pya dI pya/ dI pa ya A bi sha ma hA shri ye swA hA/ pad ma'i rigs la'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya ban+du ri hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /ka ra bI ra dmar po 'am/ /me tog ma

la ti yang rung / /yang na yungs kar dag gis bya/ /rdzas la legs par 'phang bar bya/ /thog ma bar ram mtha' mar ram/ /mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe na yang / /sgrub pa rtsom pa'i bar bar du/ /'phangs na rdzas kyi byin bskyed 'gyur/ /

dus de rnams su cho ga bzhin/ /spos chu bzlas brjod byas ba 'am/ /mar la sogs pas ci rigs su/ /bsang gtor byas bas byin bskyed do/ /gal te rdzas rnams ma grub na/ /cho ga de nyid bya bar bshad/ /yang na dkyil

'khor 'di bris nas/ /cho ga shes pas byin bskyed do/ /tshon rtsi sna lnga'i phye ma yis/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bri/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo gcig pa/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad du bya/ /dang por shar du 'khor lo dang / /ngos su chos gos

lhung bzed bzhag /de nas byang du pad ma dang / /ril ba spyi blugs dbyug pa bzhag /de bzhin lhor ni 'khor lo dang / /ngos su dbyug to bum pa bzhag /phyag rgya thams cad stegs bu la/ /bzhag cing kha dog dkar por bya/ /

rang gi phyag rgya bkod nas su/ /rdzas ni snod dang bcas pa bzhag /de steng bzhag pa'i rdzas la ni/ /sngags kyis sngon bzhin byin bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung thung dang / /rig sngags grub pa'i spyan dang ni/ /gsang

sngags dbang phyug gzi brjid gter/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /phyag drug pa dang rta mgrin dang / /sgrol ma lha mo zla ba dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur dang / /ngos su ki li gnod mdzes dang / /rig sngags chen mo mA ma kI/ /

gos dkar can ma gang yin dang / /rig sngags gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /de dag nub kyi phyogs su dgod/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sel byed pa/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs su rang gi rgya/ /snga ma

bzhin du cho gas mchod/ /phyogs cha'i dbye ba shes pa yis/ /go rims bzhin du grwa kun tu/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags dang / /lus ngan po yang rim bzhin du/ /rdzas kyi khri yi shar phyogs su/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i

lha nyid gzhag /rigs dang rigs kyi phyag rgya ni/ /sna tshogs ca 'dod pa yang gzhag /so so yi ni gsang sngags kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du spyan drangs nas/ /mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor sngar bstan bzhin

du bya/ /rig sngags so sor ji lta bar/ /gsang sngags gsungs pa'am rig sngags kyis/ /khyad par du ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas cho ga 'di dag bya/ /dang po sbyin sreg las dag gis/ /rdzas rnams legs par byin yang

bskyed/ /kun la rigs kyi rig sngags kyis/ /bsngags shing mjug tu bsang gtor bya/ /mA ma kI yi snying po dang / /rigs dbang yi ge bzhi bcas pa/ /de dag gis ni bye brag tu/ /byin bskyed cho ga bya bar bshad/ /na mo lo ga

d+ha tra ye/ na maHsha~M ka re shAn+ti ka re/ g+huT g+huT g+hu Ti ni/ g+ha Ta ye/ g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ mA ma kI yi rig sngags so/ /oM ku lan+d+ha ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ mA ma kI yi snying po'o/ /oM badzra hU~M d+ha/ rig pa'i dbang po'i 'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wA la yA/ rgyal

ba rnams kyi'o/ /sid+d+hi sA d+ha ya/ bar ma rnams kyi'o/ /dI pya dI pa yA/ gsang sngags bar ma rnams kyi yin te/ rdzas gzengs bstod pa'o/ /phan ces bya ba ni thams cad la'o/ /gzi brjid ldan bas rdzas nang du/ /phyi bshol

ma mdzad bzhugs nas su/ /kun gyi gzi brjid spel ba dang / /byin brlabs can du mdzad du gsol/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig gi rnams/ /zlos bu dang ni ma 'dres dang / /bsnor ba yis kyang ci 'dod pa/ /mkhas pas rdzas kyi byin

bskyed do/ /ka ra bI ra'i me tog ni/ /dmar po dag dang yungs kar dang / /de nas sna ma'i me tog gis/ /rim pa bzhin du rdzas byin bskyed/ /thog mar dri yis byug par bya/ /de nas me tog yungs kar gyi/ /bdug spos kyis kyang rnam par

bdug /spos chu yis kyang bsang gtor bya/ /dus gsum du ni spos kyi chus/ /rang sngags bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ /bsang gtor bya zhing rang sngags kyis/ /skabs skabs su ni bzlas brjod bya/ /nyi ma shar gyi bar du yang / /

byin bskyed pa yi cho ga bya/ /cho ga 'dis ni rig sngags rnams/ /zlos pa po la myur du 'grub/ /de ltar byin ni bskyed pa'i rdzas/ /bstan zhing myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas ni nyung tus kyang / /dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /

mngon bar 'phel zhing gzi byin dang / /rnam par dag pa mngon du 'gyur/ /cho ga 'di yis rdzas rnams la/ /rtag tu byin yang bskyed bar bya/ /bsgrub bar bya ba'i las rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ba byas nas kyang / /cho ga gsang bar

bstan pa 'dis/ /rdzas rnams kun gyi byin yang bskyed/ /rtag tu dus dang dus mtshams la/ /de lta bur ni byin bskyed de/ /de nas phyis ni mtshan gcig tu/ /bsgrub ba legs par brtsam bar bya/ /rdzas byin bskyed pa'i cho ga rim

par phye ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang ci mthong ba'i/ /dus bzang yon tan ldan ba la/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir ni mkhas pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du brtsam par bya/ /dgun zla tha chungs ston zla 'bring / /dpyid zla ra dang 'bring po dang / /dbyar zla ra ba nya

dag la/ /sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya/ /dbyar zla ra ba rtag tu 'bab/ /dpyid zla 'bring po rlung gis 'khor/ /dpyid zla ra ba sna tshogs bgegs/ /dgun zla ra ba bgegs med do/ /ston zla 'bring po glog 'gyu zhing / /sgra chen rnams kyang 'byung

bar 'gyur/ /bgegs ni 'grub pa'i mtshan ma bas/ /de ltar de dag brtag par bya/ /zla ba lnga po de dag la/ /dngos grub rab ni 'grub par bya/ /zhi ba yi ni las rnams kyang / /de dag nyid la legs bar brtsam/ /lnga po mar gyi zla phyed

kyi/ /dus tshigs rnams su gang bsgrags pa/ /de la 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /dngos grub bsgrub par rab tu shis/ /zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/ /rdzas kyi dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /nyi ma gzas zin tshe na yang / /mkhas pas las rnams

bsgrub par bya/ /tshes lnga dang ni tshes bdun dang / /tshes gcig dang ni tshes gsum dang / /tshes grangs bcu gsum dag la yang / /las rnams thams cad bya bar shis/ /tshes grangs skar ma dang ldan na/ /mchog tu 'gyur bar shes bar bya/ /

pha lo dag la ni bye brag tu/ /skar ma rgyal ni kun la shis/ /gza' dang yud tsam byed pa dang / /drag po drag po'i las la'o/ /rang gi cho gas gsungs pa 'am/ /lha rnams kyis ni bskul ba'ang rung / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed la/ /las

rnams thams cad rab tu shis/ /bka' lung stsal ba'i tshes grangs sam/ /tshes grangs bcu gsum pa yang rung / /zhi ba phal cher ston ngo la/ /de bzhin rgyas pa dgun ngo la/ /dpyid sman drag shul cho ga bzhin/ /bsgrub pa

dag ni rab tu shis/ /dpyid stod las rnams thams cad bya/ /dbyar gyi ngo la las rnams bya/ /ston dang dgun dang dpyid smad ni/ /'bring dang rab dang tha ma'o/ /gsum du phye ba de la yang / /gsum gsum dag tu dbye bar bshad/ /

dus gsum dag gi dngos grub kyang / /phal cher rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /dang po srod kyi dus las te/ /'bring po nam gyi phyed na'o/ /rab kyi dus ni nang par te/ /der ni dngos grub rim bzhin 'gyur/ /zhi dang drag shul rgyas ba'i

yi/ /dus kyang de dag yin bar bsgrags/ /tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams kyi/ /cho ga'i rim pa de dag nyid/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /dngos grub rnams kyi mtshan ma la/ /rim pa ci ltar mthong ba bzhin/ /bye brag rnam gsum

shes bar bya/ /nyi ma zla ba gzas zin la/ /dus ni gang yang nges pa med/ /drag shul spyod pa khyad par du/ /gzas zin tshe ni bya bar bzang / /rab la sogs pa'i bye brag las/ /zhag gsum yang na zhag gnyis sam/ /

yang na zhag gcig tu yang rung / /smyung bar bya ba rab tu bshad/ /sgrub ba'i dus rim par phye ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang rtog pa las/ /ji skad bstan pa'i cho ga bya/ /ngal bar thal ba'i skyon yod pas/ /smyung bar bya ba mi shis so/ /

de yi bar du bsgrub pa pos/ /bsnyen pa dang ni mchod pa dang / /sbyin sreg cho ga bstod pa dang / /dge ba dag la brtson bar bya/ /lan brgyar mngon bar bsngags pa yi/ /bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa ni/ /mang du bsgril cing spos

bskus pa/ /mdud pa bdun ni bor ba la/ /sgrub pa pos ni gsang sngags 'dis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod nas/ /srod la sked par bcings na ni/ /khu chu dgag bar byas par 'gyur/ /oM dza ye ku ma ri shu kra ban+d+ha ni swA hA/

oM rak+Sha ku ru ku ruM gi na swA hA/ oM ku lan+d+ha ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ bde gshegs sngags pa gzhon nu mas/ /pad ma 'dzin la ku rung gis/ /rdo rje'i rigs la mA ma kIs/ /cho ga bzhin du khu chu dgag /tshur spyon tshur spyon

brtul zhugs bzang / /bdag gi lus la myur zhugs nas/ /rkang gi bar du gnas nas su/ /'dir ni yun ring rgyu bar mdzed/ /rig sngags bshad pa 'di gsum ni/ /thams cad kyi ni spyir yin no/ /kha cig tu ni rtog

pa las/ /gsungs ba'i sngags kyis cho ga bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba dang / /bsnyen pa dang ni dus tshigs dang / /byin bskyed la sogs cho ga yang / /nyi ma re re bcing bar bya/ /thog mar lan brgya bsngags pa yi/ /

mig sman gyis ni gnyid kyang bsal/ /sgrub pa'i tshe yang mig sman de/ /legs par bsku bar bya bar bsgrags/ /sug smel ga pur sro tan tsa/ /shing tsha ta gar pi pi ling / /kha ra ta yi kha chur sbyar/ /gnyid dang snyom

dang 'jigs ba sel/ /'thor 'thung yang dang yang byas te/ /kha gdong bkrus nas mig bkru'o/ /mig smano bskus pa'i mig des ni/ /sgrub pa'i tshe na bgogs kyang mthong / /\u0f00 dz+wa la lo tsa ni swA hA/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /oM bi lo ki na swA hA/ /pad+ma'o rags la'o/ /

oM ban+du ni ra d+hi ba te swA hA/ rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /rigs gsum gyi mig sman bsku ba'i rig sngags so/ /ngal dang rmya ba bsal ba'i phyir/ /spos kyi chu ni khyor gang tsam/ /dri zhim bdun bdun bzlas pa dag /khyor ba nyid kyis btung bar bya/ /de nas nye rig byas nas ni/ /

blo dang ldan pas mtshan ma brtag /mtshan ma bzang po mthong nas ni/ /bsgrub pa gus pa brtsam par bya/ /'khor lo dung dang lcags kyu nya/ /g.yung drung pad ma rgyal mtshan dang / /bkra shis bum pa gang ba dang / /dpal be'u rdo rje

phreng ba dang / /bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sbrum ma'am phang na bu thogs bang / /na chung dga' zhing rgyags pa dag /gang zhig de yis 'grub par ston/ /bram ze gos dkar gyon pa dang / /shing rta glang po rta dag dang / /rtsa rdog 'bras bu sna tshogs

dang / /ngo mtshar che zhing mthong ba dag /'brug gi sgra ni grag pa dang / /rig byed dbyangs dang rgyal ba'i sgra/ /dung dang rdza dang rdza rnga yi/ /sgra rnams 'grub phyir rab tu shis/ /rma bya khrung khrung ngang mo dang / /ne tsho la sogs bya rnams kyi/ /sgra snyan rnams ni kun thos

nas/ /dngos grub sbyin pa'i las brtsam mo/ /smon lam bkra shis thams cad dang / /bsod nams dga' dang bde legs tshig /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rnams/ /thos nas 'grub pa shes par bya/ /glog dang sprin dang char 'bab dang / /ser bu me

tog char 'bab dang / /'ja' dang dri ni zhim po ste/ /mtshan ma 'di dag lha yi yin/ /bar snang las byung mtshan ma ni/ /thams cad 'bring por shes par bya/ /sa las byung ba'i mtshan ma dag /de dag sa ba'i yin par bshad/ /lha dag gis ni dngos grub

rab/ /bar snang dag gi 'bring por 'gyur/ /sa pa dag gi dngos grub phal/ /gsum la'ang gsum gsum dag tu dbye/ /de dag la sogs mtshan ma rnams/ /dngos grub phyir ni rab tu bsgrags/ /mdor na gsang sngags thams cad la/ /

de las bzlog pas mi 'grub po/ /dang por mtshan ma bzung nas ni/ /sems kyang rab tu dga' byas te/ /yongs su mgu ba'i bsam pa yis/ /de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /sgrub pa'i mtshan ma rim par phye ba'o// //

dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyud kun dang / /yang na bsgrub pa dag la'ang rung / /tshes grangs yud tsam byed pa dang / /mtshan ma'ang rgyas par shes byas nas/ /mi bzang ba la mar dag gi/ /rigs kyi rig pas sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas las rnams

brtsam byas nas/ /'on tam dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gnas gang dag tu rim pa bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni mngon bri zhing / /de nyid du ni sgrub pa yi/ /de yi rim pa bshad pa yin/ /ri la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /dngos grub

chen po thob par bsgrags/ /mtsho la sogs par 'bring rnams 'thob/ /gzhan dag tu ni phal rnams so/ /sngags dang rjes su 'thun nas su/ /bzlas rjod byed pas las rnams brtsam/ /gzhan du bsgrub par byas na ni/ /dngos grub

myur du mi 'thob po/ /ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten kun/ /bde gshegs kun gyi gsang sngags 'grub/ /mchod rten chen po nyams dga' ba/ /byang chub chen po grub gnas dang / /de bzhin bltam la sogs pa brgyad/ /de na bgegs ni

yod ma yin/ /las kyi cho ga thams cad dang / /'thun pa dag kyang de na yod/ /der ni bdud kyis bgegs bya bar/ /nam yang nus pa ma yin no/ /de bas gsang sngags thams cad kyang / /der ni nges par 'grub par gsungs/ /'dir ni

drag shul spyod pa'i las/ /dur khrod dag tu bya bar shis/ /yang na shing gcig pa dag gam/ /khang stong mtshan ma gcig pa'ang rung / /'bab chu'i 'gram ni thams cad tu/ /rig sngags bsgrubs na 'grub par gsungs/ /bskyed mo tshal

du gnod sbyin mo/ /klu yi bdag po mtsho rnams su/ /khang stong tu ni longs spyod phyir/ /mngag gzhug grong srang la sogs par/ /phug gi gsang sngags phug rnams su/ /bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams myur du

'grub pa'i phyir/ /cho ga gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /man ngag bstan pa 'di nyid kyis/ /gnas rnams gtan la dbab par bya/ /gang yang rung ba'i gnas gcig tu/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa 'am/ /bzlas brjod sa yi cho ga yis/ /

dang por sa ni sbyang bar bya/ /lha yi gnas ni rnam dag par/ /byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs 'gyur bas/ /bsgrub pa la ni bye brag tu/ /cho ga gzhan yang 'di dag bshad/ /tsan dan dmar pos bskus pa yi/ /seng ldeng phur bu mdzub gang ba/ /

rnon por byas pa bzhi dag la/ /skud pa dmar po dag gis dkris/ /rdo rje phur bus lan grangs brgyar/ /mngon par bzlas brjod byas pa dag /gnas sam khyim dag tu yang rung / /khu tshur gyis ni phyogs bzhir gdab/ /dang por las

kun byed sngags sam/ /yang na bgegs kyi dgras kyang rung / /yungs kar dag la sogs pa yis/ /legs par kun tu bsal bar bya/ /ba dan dkar po gcig la ni/ /rig sngags rgyal pos mngon bsngags te/ /smyug ma ring po'i yu ba

la/ /btags te dang po shar du gzugs/ /rdo rje ra bas bsngags pa yi/ /lcags kyu'i phye mas ra ba bya/ /rdo rje dra ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /lan brgyar bsngags pa'i phye ma yis/ /khor yug tu ni rdo rje phreng / /bris na rdo rje dra bar 'gyur/ /

dkyil 'khor nang gi dang po yi/ /sgo kar bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsrung ba'am/ /yang na gzhan gyis mi thub pas/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bsrung ba ni/ /'phrog ma sogs bas bya bar 'dod/ /rigs gsum dag

gi spyi la yang / /cho ga 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/ /cho ga gsum po 'di dag ni/ /thub dka' bar yang yongs su bsgrags/ /re re'am yang na kun gyis kyang / /bsgrub pa'i tshe na bgegs kun sel/ /rdzas bsgrub pa na bsrung ba'i phyir/ /

cho ga gsang ba 'di gsungs te/ /mdor bsdus pa la don yang che/ /rim pa bzhin du rab tu gces/ /mkhas pas rin chen la sogs pas/ /sa gzhi snying po can du bya/ /thab khung la yang ci rigs par/ /rdzas bzhag pa yi 'og tu'ang

rung / /dri gtsang khang ngam khang bzangs su/ /bsang gtor byas pa dag gsungs pas/ /der ni sa brko mi dgos kyi/ /cho ga de ltar phyi rol du'o/ /bdag nyid kyis ni cho ga bzhin/ /brtags shing byas pa'i khang bar ni/ /bye brag tu ni las

brtsams na/ /der ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /khung dag tu ni bsgrub pa min/ /sa phyogs dog par mi bya'o/ /khang rul du yang blo can gyis/ /bsgrub pa brtsam bar mi bya'o/ /de nas dad pa'i yid kyis su/ /srod la gsang sngags lha yi rnams/ /

mthong ba bzhin du gus byas te/ /sta gon gnas pa legs par bya/ /rigs gsum gi ni rig sngags lha/ /bdag por bcas pa gang bzhugs dang / /sngags rgyud 'di la lha rnams ni/ /gang dag yongs su bsgrags pa dang / /gsang sngags lha ni gang dag cig /bdag nyid nyon mongs

chen po yis/ /cho ga 'di bzhin bsnyen pa dang / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg gis mnyes pa/ /zhag bdun na ni sgrub pa'i tshe/ /byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol/ /'di na lha dang 'byung po dang / /'khor rnams dang ni bcas pa dag /ci nus par ni mchod byas

pas/ /mchod pa la ni phan 'dogs rnams/ /yongs su mnyes shing kun 'dus nas/ /bdag la dngos grub myur gnas mdzod/ /de ltar gus par nyin re zhing / /tshig gis kyang ni phyogs bzhir brjod/ /nyin re'am zhag re bri byas pas/ /gsang sngags

sta gon gnas par bya/ /mchod yon dag dang me tog dang / /bdug pa dri zhim dag kyang dbul/ /sgrub pa pos ni cho ga 'dis/ /srod kyi dus su bya bar bshad/ /sgrub pa po yi cho ga 'dis/ /rdzas kyang sta gon gnas par bya/ /lag pas legs

par brim pa dang / /bdug pa dag gis legs par bdug /yang na gza' skar byed pa dag /bzang po la ni smyung byas te/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas rdzas kyi rnams/ /sta gon gnas pa'i cho ga bya/ /sa ni bsgrub par byed pa 'am/ /gsang

sngags sgrub pas zhag gsum na/ /yo lang chung ngu dag gis bya/ /bzlas rjod byed pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /phye ma sna tshogs nyid kyis kyang / /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs zlum po la/ /phyi rol rim pa gnyis pas bskor/ /sgo

gcig btod pa bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su khru do pa'i/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /dkyil 'khor lhag ma tshad dag ni/ /ci ltar dga' ba nyid du bya/ /der ni bdag po gsum dag dang / /nub tu bdud rtsi thabs sbyor bzhag /dkyil

'khor gnyis pa'i nub phyogs su/ /dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas/ /gcig tu gzi brjid phung po ste/ /gcig tu yang na sgrub pa'i spyan/ /gcig tu dpa' mo chen mo ste/ /phyag drug ma yang gcig tu bri/ /gcig tu rig sngags mA ma kI/ /

rig sngags rgyal snying gcig tu bri/ /khro bo kI li gcig tu ste/ /gcig tu rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /de ltar bstan pa de dag kun/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu dgod/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags rnams/ /phyi rol phyogs su rim pa

bzhin/ /de ltar bkod nas phyi rol skor/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa yang bri/ /de nas phyogs mtshams skyong ba dang / /'dod pa'i lha rnams bri bar bya/ /de nas so so'i gsang sngags kyis/ /rim pa bzhin du spyan yang drang / /bdag po rnams ni snying po yis/ /de yi

'og tu mchod par bya/ /pad ma'i dbus su rang sngags kyis/ /rdzas ni legs par bzhag ste mchod/ /bum pa gang ba de steng du/ /cho ga bzhin du rdzas bzhag go/ /yang na gab tshe'am kham phor dag /me tog la sogs blugs pa bzhag /de nas lag pas

brim bya zhing / /rang gi rig sngags yongs bzlas pa'i/ /me tog brgya 'am stong dag gis/ /de yi 'og tu 'phang bar bya/ /de nas gu gul bdug spos ni/ /mar dang sbyar bas bdug par bya/ /spos chus bzlas brjod byas pa yi/ /de nas dal bus bsang gtor

bya/ /de nas rang gi gsang sngags dang / /dkyil 'khor du bshad thams cad kyis/ /re res so sor bzlas pa dag /sbyin sreg ci skad bstan pa'ang bya/ /sbyin sreg bya ba'i mar dag gam/ /yang na ba yi 'o mas bya/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi til sbyar dang / /lag bar gyis

ni mjug tu bya/ /de nas gsang sngags thams cad kyis/ /mkhas pas rdzas la bsang gtor bya/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bri pa dang / /rjes su 'thun par byin bskyed do/ /yid la yongs su zlos byed cing / /cho ga shes pas zlos bzhin

du/ /rdzas la mig gis blta bar bya/ /de byas sta gon gnas byas 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg cho ga gtor ma'i rim/ /mchod sogs gang yin de dag kun/ /bzlas brjod byed pas rgyas par 'dir/ /rgyud las bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /'di ni

rdzas la sta gon du/ /gnas pa'i cho ga yin par bsgrags/ /sta gon gnas pa'i rdzas de ni/ /myur du 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /yongs su gzung ba dag kyang bya/ /dngos grub bzung ba dag gis kyang / /

rdzas kyi byin yang bskyed pa dang / /cho ga 'di dag nyid kyis kyang / /dkyil 'khor 'di yi dbus su ni/ /rdzas rnams sgrub pa dag kyang bya/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di nyid du/ /bgegs kyang myur du zhi bar 'gyur/ /rdzas rnams sbyang bar bya ba dang / /dbang

bskur ba yi cho ga yis/ /sgrub pa po rnams dbang bskur ba'ang / /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu bya/ /las kun byed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gsang chen gsang ba'i bdag pos gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bri byas na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par

'gyur/ /rdzas sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // rdzas ni yongs su bzung byas nas/ /sgrub pa pos ni dus gsum du/ /khrus dang mchod pa sbyin sreg dang / /lag pa yis kyang brim par bya/ /gos ni lan gsum brje ba dang / /dus mtshams

dag la smyung byas te/ /mchod dang lha bshos cho ga dag /khyad par du ni legs par bya/ /dus gsum dag tu sdig pa bshags/ /bsod nams rjes su yi rang dang / /dus gsum dag tu smon lam gdab/ /glegs bam dus gsum lan gsum bklag /dkyil 'khor

lan gsum dag tu bya/ /lan gsum du yang sdom pa bzung / /dus gsum du yang bsrung ba bya/ /de ltar byas na nges par 'grub/ /gang tshe bag med gyur pa yis/ /dus gsum dag gi las nyams na/ /de tshe rang gi rig sngags de/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

brjod bya/ /de ltar nyin re dus gsum du/ /mkhas pa dag gis rtag tu bya/ /de nyams na ni brlag 'gyur zhing / /dngos grub dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /las kyi klags la 'bum bzlas pa'am/ /yang na dkyil 'khor 'di bris pas/ /

gsang ba'i cho ga de byas te/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sngon bzhin legs par thig btab nas/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba/ /cho ga bzhin du legs par bri/ /dbus su

'khor lo bris nas de'i/ /shar du 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor dkar/ /rgyal dang rmad du byung ba dgod/ /mkhas pas ngos gnyis dag tu yang / /bde gshegs mdzod spu mdung thung dang / /

sangs rgyas byams ma spyan du bcas/ /kun dga' bo dang rab 'byor dang / /de bzhin lhung bzed mkhar sil dang / /sgo kar las kun byed pa dgod/ /rim bzhin sgor ni 'phrog ma dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub pa yang dgod/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rdzas

rnams ni/ /yang na gsang sngags lha bzhag ste/ /de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bya/ /sbyin sreg thams cad bya bar gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni phyag rgya'am/ /gtan du dgod par rab tu bsgrags/ /so so'i cho gas spyan drang ba'am/ /spyi yi snying pos

byar yang rung / /der ni rang gi rig sngags kyis/ /snga ma bzhin du me sbar te/ /de nas mar dang sbrang rtsi las/ /sbyin sreg brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/ /de nas zho dang 'bras chan dang / /til gyi sbyin sreg brgya brgya bya/ /mkhas pas mjug tu brgya bzlas bas/ /

'di ni cho ga gsang chen yin/ /dri zhim me tog dri sogs kyis/ /'dir ni mchod ba bya bar gsungs/ /zho dang bu ram legs sbyar ba'i/ /gtor ma rgya chen dbul bar bya/ /cho ga 'di yis lha rnams ni/ /myur du legs par tshim bar 'gyur/ /dgyes nas

ring por mi thogs par/ /sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol/ /zla ba re re'am zla phyed dam/ /nyi ma re re'am dus mtshams la/ /dbul pos kyang ni ci nus par/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya/ /cho ga de ltar bya ba kun/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la'ang

shes par bya/ /ci ltar dga' ba'i tshad tsam du/ /kun tu zlum por rab tu bya/ /de dbus pad ma bris nas su/ /rig sngags rgyal dang rta mgrin dang / /sna tshogs gzugs dang spyan gsum pa/ /phyag bzhi phyag drug bcu gnyis phyag /de bzhin

'dod pa 'byor byed dang / /grags dang ldan ba dpal mo che/ /sgrol ma lha mo zla ba dgod/ /sgo yi phyogs su dkar mo dang / /gos dkar can ma gzhag bya zhing / /sgo kar las kun byed bzhag pa/ /'grub phyir pad ma 'chang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor

cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /ci ltar 'dod bar dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi bar yang legs bris te/ /sngon bzhin snying po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig sngags rgyal po bzhag par bya/ /rig pa chen mo mA ma kI/ /khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor dang / /rig pa

chen po lcags kyu ma/ /dbyug pa dang ni stobs po che/ /rdo rje khu tshur rig rgyal mo/ /gnod mdzes go rims bzhin du bzhag /khro chen lha yi yan lag dang / /gom pa 'dor ba nyid dang ni/ /khro mo me rnams ngos gnyis su/ /blo dang ldan bas bzhag

par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs kyi nang rol du/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed mig dang ni/ /rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /sgo kar las kun byed pa bzhag /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mchod pa yang / /cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya/ /lha rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ni/ /

phyag na rdo rjes rab tu bshad/ /de nas nang par nam langs nas/ /rmi lam bzang po rnams dpyad de/ /gtsung zhing khrus byas gos dkar bgos/ /sbyin sreg las ni brtsam bar bya/ /lha rnams cho ga bzhin mchod de/ /bkra shis ngo mtshar dag

kyang bya/ /cho ga bzhin du me sbar nas/ /ci skad gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /ba lang lci bas byugs nas su/ /'bras yos ku sha sngon po dang / /me tog dkar po dri zhim bas/ /gnas de khyad par can du bsham/ /de yi g.yas kyi phyogs su ni/ /

bud shing zho dang ku sha dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'bras chan til/ /bsreg bya cung zad ci 'byor dgod/ /g.yon du legs par brtags pa yi/ /mchod yon snod ni bzhag par bya/ /dbus su dgang gzar blugs gzar dang / /legs par bzhus

pa'i mar dag bzhag /bzhag nas mkhas pas las kun pa'i/ /gsang sngags kyis ni bsang gtor bya/ /sngon bzhin gsang sngags bdag po ni/ /mdun du bzhag te mchod byas nas/ /de nas rang rigs spyan drang ste/ /mchod

yon bzlas pas bzhugs su gsol/ /bdag gi mdun du mar gyi snod/ /dag par byas pa bzhag par bya/ /mar dang me yi bar dag tu/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rdzas bzhag go/ /bdag dang mar dang bsgrub bya'i rdzas/ /me dang gsang sngags bdag

por bcas/ /lnga po 'di dag go rims bzhin/ /blo dang ldan bas legs par dgod/ /g.yon du rig sngags byin bskyed ma/ /g.yas su las kun byed pa ste/ /gnas der snga ma bzhin du yang / /bsrung ba thams cad rab tu sbyar/ /de nas ku sha sar ba yi/ /gding ba dag

kyang bkram nas su/ /lha bshos 'bras yos bkra shis can/ /sA lu'i 'bras chan zhor bcas dbul/ /de nas bdug spos dri zhim bas/ /kun nas rab tu bdug par bya/ /de 'og ci ltar bstan pa yi/ /sbyin sreg las ni ci dgar bya/ /gser dang

dngul zangs rdo ba 'am/ /dung dang mu tig shing dag gam/ /grog mkhar sa las byas ba yi/ /snod du rdzas ni bzhag par bya/ /byang chub shing gi lo ma dag /de yi gding bar shis pa yin/ /'o ma can gyi shing gi 'am/ /yang na arga'i lo ma 'ang rung / /chu shing

pad ma'i 'dab ma 'am/ /yang na ras dkar 'jam bo 'am/ /dri zhim shing las skyes pa yi/ /gding ba lnga po 'dod pa yin/ /phye ma khu ba gos sogs dang / /ci rigs par ni g.yogs nas kyang / /cho ga shes pas mnyam bzhag ste/ /rdzas la

legs par bdug par bya/ /yid kyis rdzas kyi byin bskyed cing / /mar gyi bsreg blugs rgyun du bsreg /legs par blta zhing cho ga 'dis/ /mkhas pas rdzas la bdug par bya/ /rdzas la bzlas shing bsang gtor nas/ /blugs gzar

chang bas bzung nas ni/ /dal bus mar gyis legs bkang ste/ /rdzas kyi steng du de bzlas shing / /bsreg blugs zlos pa me 'bar ba/ /swA hA zhes ni brjod bya zhing / /hA yi dbyangs kyi rgyun bsrings te/ /blugs gzar rtse mor de bdug cing / /

stong ngam yang na lan grangs brgyar/ /rdzas rnams la ni bdug par bya/ /de ltar rdzas la yang dang yang / /cho ga 'di ni bya bar gsungs/ /gsang sngags kyi ni rang bzhin dang / /dngos grub che chung shes bya ste/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig

kyang / /grangs kyi cho ga yin bar bzhed/ /rdzas ni zad ba ma grub na/ /mkhas pas de la nyung zad cig /rig sngags bzlas shing bsang gtor de/ /gzhag nas mchod cing blta bar bya/ /rab la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / /las kyi dbye ba bsgrags

pa dag /dkyil 'khor du gsungs cho ga bzhin/ /'bar na 'grub pa'i mtshan ma yin/ /shin tu chen po'i rdzas kyi rnams/ /de yi g.yas su bzhag pa 'am/ /g.yon du 'os pa g.yon du bzhag /der ni de la gtug cing bya/ /sems can kun gyi mgo bo la/ /

yang na rang gi mgo bo nyid/ /mod las bsgrub rdzas ci yang rung / /mkhas pas bdug pa bsngos te bya/ /bdug pa'i cho ga 'di yis su/ /sngon bzhin phye la mar dag gis/ /la la'i phyir bsngo kha cig la/ /blta zhing sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /gal te mar

dag ma 'byor na/ /cho ga bzhin du 'o mas bya/ /yang na 'o ma mar dang ni/ /mkhas pas mngar gsum dag gis bya/ /zhi ba la sogs khyad par gyis/ /kha cig la ni zho yang rung / /yang na bsreg bya'i rdzas bsten bas/ /ci ltar rigs par

bdug par bya/ /mtshon cha rnams la 'bru mar gyis/ /dri zhim thang chu a dza na/ /du ru ka sogs 'bru mar gyis/ /bdug pa'i cho ga bya bar gsungs/ /rdzas la sogs pa'i bye brag las/ /rdzas ni rnam ba sna tshogs dang / /dri zhim las byung 'bras

bu yis/ /bdug pa'i cho ga dag kyang bya/ /sha chen la sogs rdzas rnams la/ /tshil bu dag gis bya bar bsgrags/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas kyang / /so so'i sha dang tshil gyis bya/ /cho ga bstan pa 'di yis sam/ /yang na sngar gsungs cho ga yis/ /

dngos grub myur bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan/ /cho ga 'di yis rdzas dag la/ /bdugs nas de la dbang yang bskur/ /dbang bskur nas ni lha gnas su/ /bzhag ste legs par mchod ba bya/ /de nas cho ga las gsungs pa/ /

thos par bya phy-ir gtor ma bsog /bdag nyid rgyas par khrus byas nas/ /cho ga 'di ni brtsam bar bya/ /dri zhim rnams kyis dril byas nas/ /de bzhin khrus rtsi kyu ru ras/ /khrus bya nyi ma phyed mtshams nas/ /mkhas pas rdzas la yongs su

bzlas/ /skud pa gdu bu gos rnams dang / /thal ba yungs kar chu dag la/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni rdzas 'di la/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /de dag thog mar bzlas brjod de/ /cho ga 'di ni myur du bya/ /de phyir de tshe dgos pa kun/ /

thog ma nyid du bsngags par bya/ /me tog la sogs ci 'byor ba/ /yongasu bsdu ba byas nas ni/ /ci rigs pa yi gnas bzhag ste/ /sgrub ba'i sar ni gnas bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor las gsungs cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang / /ci rigs par

ni mchod byas te/ /rdzas rnams bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /tshon sna lnga yi srad bu la/ /lan brgyar bsngags nas dang por des/ /phur bu rnams la bre bar bya/ /mkhas pas thabs sbyor bzlas

pa yis/ /sgo drung gi ni bum pa la/ /srad bu lhod par btags nas su/ /de nas der ni bzhag par bya/ /thabs sbyor bgegs rnams sel byed pa'i/ /khro bo yid la dran bzhin du/ /srad bu'i 'og nas 'byung ba dang / /'jug par bya ba 'di

gsungs so/ /yang na mkhas pas khro bo des/ /srad bu la ni bsngags pa 'am/ /bsrung ba'i don du gang dga' ba'i/ /rig sngags gzhan gyis bzlas kyang rung / /bskrad pa la sogs cho ga dag /sngar gsungs pa yang shes bya zhing / /dkyil

'khor gyi ni nye 'khor du/ /cho ga 'di dag bya bar gsungs/ /phyogs dang phyogs skyong ci snyed dang / /so so'i rigs kyi lha'i rnams/ /phyogs dang go rims ci lta bar/ /de kun phyi rol dag tu mchod/ /bum par rdo rje bzhag pa 'am/ /yang na lo mas kha brgyan pa/ /de la srad

bu btags nas su/ /sgo yi phyogs su bzhag bar bya/ /rigs dang rigs rnams so so yi/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'am/ /yang na ci ltar rigs ba yis/ /rdzas sgrub tshe na kun nas bsrung / /yang na rigs kyi rig sngags dang / /so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /

bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bsgrub tshe 'dir ni thams cad bsrung / /pur bu rdo rje rtse 'dra'am/ /yang na rtse cig sbom po la/ /rdo rje phur bus lan brgya ru/ /mngon bar bsngags pa byas pa dag /lha yi gnas kyi phyi rol tu/ /grwa bzhi kun du gdags

par bya/ /yang na dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /btab nas las rnams rab tu bya/ /rdo rje phur bu'i cho ga 'di/ /las kun byed par shes par bya/ /bsgrub tshe 'dir bgegs 'tshe med cing / /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /dri zhim phye ma'am pir dag gis/ /sna

tshogs tshon gyi 'de gu yis/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas su/ /de nas cho ga 'di dag dang / /so so'i phyogs kyi ri mo'-i mthar/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bya bar gsungs/ /dbus kyi ngos rnams dag tu yang / /rdo rje bsgrengs pa'i phreng ba bya/ /rdo rje

ra ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /cho ga de ni bya bar bstan/ /de yi dbus su bzhugs nas su/ /rdzas rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis phyi nang du/ /rdo rje'i lte ba'i dra ba bya/ /rdo rje dra ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /shin tu thub par

dka' bar 'gyur/ /sgo khyud dag ni thams cad dang / /sgo rnams kyi ni mdun dag tu/ /mkhas pas rdo rje bris nas su/ /de nas las rnams bya bar bsgrags/ /yo lang chung ngus thang bu la/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya/ /

mdor bsdus cho ga bris nas su/ /rdzas rnams bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /khru lnga'am bdun nam brgyad pa la/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /gsang sngags dngos grub rjes 'thun par/ /yang na lhag par byas kyang rung / /sgo rnams kun du

rdo rje dang / /grwa rnams su ni bum ba dgod/ /las kun byed pa'i bum pa dag /sgo drung du ni bzhag par bya/ /dbus su chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /thog ma rgyal po lnga rnams dgod/ /ngos su mche ba mdung thung dang / /spyan dang rgyal ba'i mdzod

spu'o/ /bde gshegs phyag rgya thams cad dang / /sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma'o/ /rab 'byor dang ni kun dga' bo/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams ni/ /phyogs cha bstan pa bzhin du dgod/ /phyi rol du ni ci dga' ba'i/ /lha

rnams dgod pa bya bar gsungs/ /don grub pa dang mthu chen dang / /'jam dpal dang ni glang po che/ /dpal ldan tshangs pa mes po dang / /de bzhin du ni brgya byin dang / /bcom ldan mngag gzhug sangs rgyas pa'i/ /lha ni de dang de dag dang / /

phyogs skyong rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu bri/ /de nas dbus su gsang sngags sam/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor rdzas bzhag ste/ /mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / /sbyin sreg las ni bya bar bsgrags/ /

mdor na bsrung ba'i las kyi rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu gsungs pa bzhin/ /bsgrub pa'i tshe na de dag kun/ /khyad par du ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bstan ba 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis gsungs/ /'dis ni rdzas rnams bsgrub byas nas/ /zlos pa bo

la myur du 'grub/ /der ni zhugs pa tsam gyis kyang / /bgegs rnams med par gyur pa dang / /lha rnams khyad par dag tu yang / /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rdzas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi

cho ga rim bar phye ba'o// // tshon rtsi sna ni lnga po yis/ /sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad bri/ /dbus su pad ma bris nas kyang / /dang por shar gyi phyogs su ni/ /'dod pa sbyor byed dgod par bya/ /de nas gsang sngags rgyal po drug /

de yi 'og tu gos dkar can/ /sgrol ma bdun dang dpa' mo bdun/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo grags ldan ma/ /sgo kar rig sngags ral pa gcig /rta mgrin yang ni dgod par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i bum pa yang / /sgo drung du ni bzhag par bya/ /

sgo yi grwar ni rdo rje bri/ /phyi rol tshangs dang lha yi spyan/ /dbang phyug chen po lha yi bu/ /rgyal sras dri ma med pa dang / /'od zer phreng bas brgyan pa dang / /klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas dang / /stobs chen mdzes pa zhes dga' dang / /rig sngags

'chang gi rgyal po ni/ /brtson 'grus chen po dung can dang / /sngon bzhin phyogs mtshams skyong ba dang / /'dir yang rig pa'i lha rnams dgod/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i cho ga bzhin/ /'dir yang thams cad bya bar grags/ /bshad pa 'di

la brten na ni/ /bgegs rnams kun gyis thub par dka'/ /pad ma rigs kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // gru bzhi par ni thig btab nas/ /dang por dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dbus su rdo rje bris nas kyang / /shar du rig sngags rgyal po

ni/ /legs par 'grub byed thog mar dgod/ /de nas de yi ngos gnyis su/ /rig sngags rgyal mo gnyis bris nas/ /rin chen rdo rje gnam lcags dang / /g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro/ /bkod nas de yi ngos gnyis su/ /kI li dang ni gnod

mdzes dgod/ /rdo rje rdo rje dbyug pa dang / /tho ba dang ni lu gu rgyud/ /rin chen rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /mA ma kI yang yongs su dgod/ /rgyal po blon sogs pho nya mo/ /rdo rje blo gros la sogs dang / /dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas/ /nor bdag gnod sbyin lhan cig tu/ /las

kun byed pa'i phyi rol du'o/ /phyi rol phyag na rdo rje'i rigs/ /'khrungs 'dod pa yi rig sngags dang / /'byung po srin po sha za dang / /grub pa gnod sbyin lto 'phye che/ /phyogs mtshams skyong ba'i lha rnams dag /thams cad go rims bzhin du dgod/ /de nas

mchod pa'i cho ga dang / /gang yang bsrung ba la sogs kun/ /sbyin sreg bstan pa bzhin byas te/ /ci skad bstan pa'i las rnams bya/ /zlos pa pos ni dkyil 'khor du/ /spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i las/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'am/ /

yang na rnam par phye ste bya/ /bum pa dgang ba thams cad ni/ /sgrub par gsungs pa'i cho ga dang / /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa/ /cho ga 'dra bar gsungs pa yin/ /dbang chen grags pa'i sems can kun/ /dam tshig las ni mi 'da' bas/ /

bsrung bar bya ba ma byas kyang / /dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgrub par bya/ /rig sngags kyi ni lha yi rnams/ /dam tshig gis ni dkyil 'khor du/ /lhag par byin gyis rlob pa dag /khyad par du ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu gus pas mnyes bya ba'i/ /cho ga

'dis ni dgongs 'gyur zhing / /sgrub pa po dag 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ /'dir ni rigs kyi snying po dang / /rigs kyi yum dang rgyal po dang / /spyi yi bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyang / /dngos grub myur du stsol bar mdzad/ /

dkyil 'khor gsum po 'di dag ni/ /gsang chen yin bar yongs su bsgrags/ /rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya rdzas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gsang chen snying por gyur ba ste/ /

tshul bzhin rdo rjes mtshan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya/ /dbus su rigs kyi rgya bris nas/ /de la rig sngags bzhag par bya/ /yang na bum pa gang ba ni/ /bkra shis sngon bzhin bshad pa bzhag /de steng kham bor la sogs pa/ /

kha sbyor nang du rdzas kyang bzhag /shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /byang du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /lhor ni bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /nub du drag po nor bdag go/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du ni/ /thams cad phyag rgya'i steng du

dgod/ /rigs kyi rig sngags g.yas phyogs su/ /g.yon du las rnams kun byed pa/ /nub phyogs kyi ni ngos gnyis su/ /dkar sham ma dang dpal mo bzhag /lhung bzed dang ni chos gos kyang / /shar gyi grwa ni gnyis su

bri/ /byang phyogs phyag na pad ma yi/ /dbyug pa dang ni gaN+Di bri/ /lho phyogs rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje dang ni tho ba bri/ /nub phyogs kyi ni grwa gnyis su/ /rtse gsum nor gyi bum pa bri/ /sgo kar gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /shar gyi phyogs su

'phrog ma bzhag /lho yi phyogs su ri mkhar ma/ /byang du ral pa gcig ma bri/ /phyi rol lha rnams dgod pa ni/ /mdor na ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /gsang sngags mchod pa'i cho ga kun/ /snga ma bzhin du yongs su bsgrags/ /

dkyil 'khor rab tu gsang ba 'di/ /sgrub pa'i tshe na bgegs med bshad/ /rdzas rnams kun dang las rnams ni/ /gsang sngags bdag gis ci dgar 'grub/ /bcug nas 'byung ba nyid kyis kyang / /bgegs bya bar ni mi nus so/ /

dri dang me tog bsung zhim dang / /bdug spos mar me gsal ba dang / /bshos kyang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /de nas mchod pa legs par brtsam/ /bzlas brjod cho ga las gsungs dang / /dkyil 'khor dag tu ci bstan pa/ /de bzhin khang pa

'am dkyil 'khor du/ /mchod pa yi ni cho ga bya/ /rig sngags rgyal la lha bshos ni/ /snying por gyur ba sna tshogs dang / /mchod pa sna tshogs gang yin ba/ /cho ga bzhin du bya bar gsungs/ /mar gyi mar me gsal ba dang / /snying po dag kyang gsal bar dbul/ /

'go bar bya ba'i ched du ni/ /rang rig sngags la mchod yon dbul/ /de nas rig sngags rgyal po yis/ /yungs kar dag la bsngags nas su/ /nad rims dag ni thams cad du/ /gsang ba'i bsrung ba rab tu bya/ /las kun byed pa'i rig sngags sam/ /yang na bsrung ba gzhan yang

rung / /yungs kar yongs su bzlas ba dag /rdzas kyi drung du bzhag par bya/ /de yis kun du gtor ba yis/ /bgegs rnams las ni bsrung bar 'gyur/ /g.yon du rang gi phyag rgya bzhag pa 'am/ /ral gri mngon bar bsngags pa 'ang rung / /phyogs skyong phyogs su bzhag byas te/ /

de'i mod basmyung zhing bsrung ba byas/ /sems stobs che zhing gtsang sbra can/ /gos kyang de yi kha dog ldan/ /lus dang stobs dang lung 'tsho dang / /gzugs dang ldan ba'i skyes bu zhig /dpal la bzlas pa'i ral gri 'dzin/ /mgul nas phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang / /

yungs kar dag ni thu bar blugs/ /bgegs rnams blta la mkhas pa ste/ /phreng ba dang ni yungs kar dag /bgegs la rab tu 'phen par nus/ /bgegs rnams kun nas 'byung ba 'am/ /yang na 'jigs pa chen po la/ /'jigs pa med par ral

gris bsdigs/ /gal te nye bar 'ongs nas 'debs/ /yungs kar dag dang phreng ba spos/ /bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na rang gi gnas dag na/ /legs par gnas pa'i ral gris bya/ /bskor ba'i gnas rnams bor na ni/ /skabs dang

glags ni rnyed 'gyur zhing / /de la bgegs kyang 'jug bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bsrung / /de dag sgrub pa'i cho ga las/ /bsrung ba'i las ni mdor sdus ba'o/ /rgyud las gsungs pa'i yon tan can/ /phyogs skyong rnams ni ma rnyed na/ /

lcags mda' 'am yang na mda' can dag /bzlas nas phyogs su gzugs bar bya/ /gsang sngags bzlas shing dka' thub can/ /rgyud 'dzin shes par ldan ba zhig /gsang sngags sgrub pa'i grogs mchog ste/ /bzlas rjod byed cing

sgo kar bzhag /des ni bgegs ni bzlog pa dang / /las rnams kun la 'jug bar bya/ /rgyud rgyud dag las rang gi rgya/ /bsrung ba cis kyang mi tshugs gang / /de dag bzlas shing mchod byas nas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bcang bar bya/ /bgegs

chen drag po rnams la ni/ /de dag gis ni bzlas bya 'am/ /yang na 'dod pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /bsngags pa'i yungs kar dag gis bya/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /gtor ma'i cho ga ci rigs par/ /rab tu dang zhing bzang ba 'am/ /

yang na 'byung po kun la bya/ /bskrad pa dang ni 'og bcing dang / /steng yang bcing zhing khor yug tu/ /mtshams bcad phyogs kyang bcing bya zhing / /rdo rje dra ba ra ba bya/ /rgyud dang slob dpon lung dag gis/ /rdzas dang bdag dang lha yang bsrung / /gsang sngags

dag gis phyi nang du/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog par bya/ /cho ga de dag thams cad ni/ /phyi dro'-i dus su bya bar bshad/ /nyi ma nub par gyur nas ni/ /rdzas rnams bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /blo dang ldan ba phyir byung nas/ /nye reg

yang dang yang byas te/ /bdud rtsi thabs sbyor bzlas byas pa'i/ /spos chu khyor gang btung bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i snying po yis/ /bzlas pa'i mar ni cung zad btung / /ngal dang snyom ba la sogs pa'i/ /gnod pa thams cad zhi bar

'gyur/ /stangs zil sbrang rtsi pi pi ling / /sangs rgyas spyan gyis bzlas pa 'am/ /snga mas bskus na myur bar ni/ /bgegs las byung ba'i gnyid sel lo/ /bsdams shing shar du kha bstan 'dug /lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal

nas/ /kun la yid kyis gsol btab ste/ /de nas sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /mtshan ma bzang po rnam pa gsum/ /bzlas brjod byed pas bzung nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas bsgrub la 'jug par bya/ /mtshan ma dag ni

ci 'dra las/ /dngos grub dag kyang de 'drar gsungs/ /de nas bzlos pa'i mtshan ma yis/ /dngos grub bstan ba 'dod par bya/ /legs par grub byed ces bya ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i blo bsams nas/ /bum pa sgo kar bzhag pa la/ /

bskor ba dag kyang gus par bya/ /lha yi gnas su zhugs nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu phyag byas nas/ /'go bar bya phyir thams cad la/ /mchod yon gyi ni bya ba bya/ /rig sngags rgyal po'am rgyal mo 'am/ /yang na spyi'i snying po 'am/ /rang rang

sngags kyis ci rigs par/ /spyan drang ba yi cho ga bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu bya ba bzhin/ /rang gi phyag rgya legs par bstan/ /de ltar byas na rig sngags dang / /gsang sngags mthu chen byin gyis rlob/ /rdzas ni kha cig rnam brtags ba/ /

lag pa'i snyim pa'i nang du gzhug /kha cig mchod yon nang du gzhug /kha cig bum pa'i steng du'o/ /grog mkhar sa yi kham bor ram/ /yang na lo ma bting bar bzhag /bsgrub bya stegs bu la bzhag pa/ /gi wang bskus pa'i snod bcug ste/ /

bzlas ba'i gnas su bzhag nas su/ /yungs kar dag gis mngon bsrung te/ /blo can cho ga shes pa yi/ /me tog ta ma li yis mchod/ /brtan par bya dang bsrung ba dang / /byin bskyed pa ni gang bshad pa/ /ci ltar rigs par rdzas

la'o/ /ma stongs par ni bya ba'i rigs/ /lha dang rdzas kyi bar dag tu/ /ci yang bzhag par mi bya'o/ /rdzas kyi g.yas g.yon gnyis su ni/ /bsrung ba'i rgya dang yungs kar bzhag /bdug spos mchod yon gtor ma dang / /

zho dang mar me la sogs dang / /bsgrub bya'i rdzas ni bzhag nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor blta ba bzhag par bya/ /rdzas la mig gam lag pa yis/ /blta 'am yang na brim par bya/ /g.yo ba'i yid ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /blo dang

ldan bas shub bur bzlas/ /'dir yang byin bskyed cho ga dag /sngon bzhin skabs skabs dag tu bya/ /de yi mtshan mo thog thag ni/ /de bzhin rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas/ /mchod yon la sogs cho ga kun/ /dus gsum du yang bya bar bshad/ /

'thor 'thung la sogs dgos pa la/ /de tshe rjes su bsgrub pa bzhag /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub pa na/ /rtag tu nye bar gnas par bya/ /sgrub pa po bzhin cho ga yi/ /lhag ma sgrub grogs mchog gis bya/ /bgegs chen rnams ni

zlog pa la/ /rjes su bsgrub pa dag gis bya/ /des ma nus na bdag nyid kyis/ /yungs gar la sogs bzlas pas bya/ /shar phyogs nas ni char chen 'bab/ /'jigs su rung ba'i 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /me yi phyogs su glo bur du/ /

mtshams kyi snang ba nam langs bzhin/ /gshin rje'i phyogs nas 'ong ba ni/ /'chi bdag gzugs can 'jigs 'jigs blta/ /ral gri thogs shing sgra chen 'byin/ /sna chad lo ma mi thod du/ /mi'i khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /mgo skra gyen

du brdzes shing 'bar/ /gcin rgyang char bzhin 'bab pa yi/ /bsrung ba'i las rnams 'jigs par byed/ /bden bral phyogs nas sems can mang / /'jigs pa'i gzugs can tha dad pa'o/ /chu lha'i phyogs nas lha yi bdag /sprin dang bcas bar 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /

rlung gi phyogs nas tshub chen 'byung / /gnod sbyin pho mo byang phyogs nas/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas tshogs kyi gzugs/ /steng nas mthu chen lha rnams 'byung / /'og na sa 'ges g.yo bar byed/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub chen

po la/ /de la sogs pa bgegs kyi rnams/ /nam gyi phyed na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub chen po rnams la ni/ /bgegs kyang chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /phal la rjes su 'thun pa yi/ /bgegs ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung / /dus

gsum dag gi dngos grub ni/ /tha ma 'bring dang rab tu bshad/ /dus bzhin byung na rab tu shis/ /de la zlos pa mi shis so/ /dro dang dud 'thul 'bar ba dag /'grub pa'i mtshan mar bstan ba yin/ /'bar ba las ni sum char bshad/ /

du ba la ni rim bzhin gnyis/ /drod las dngos grub gcig pu ste/ /de ni tha ma yin par bshad/ /kha cig gsang sngags mthu dag las/ /myur du 'bab bar gyur pa 'am/ /gal te bsgrub tshe thog mar ni/ /dngos grub kha cig 'od byung

nas/ /de tshe rang rig rig sngags kyis/ /dngos grub mnan pa brtsam par bya/ /mis ni rig sngags rgyal ba yis/ /snying pos ba yi gi wang 'am/ /lag pas brim na dngos grub ni/ /mnan par 'gyur zhing bstan par 'gyur/ /mar ram yang na

me tog gam/ /rdzes kyi rigs la bzlas kyang rung / /de ltar mnan na rdzas rnams ni/ /spyad na yon tan thob par 'gyur/ /dang por grub par gyur na ni/ /thog mar gnas par byas nas su/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lhag ma la/ /blo can bzlas brjod ci

'dod bya/ /dngos grub 'bring po dag la yang / /cho ga de bzhin bya bar bshad/ /nam phyed dag na grub pa ni/ /spyad pa 'ang de yi dus su bshad/ /dang po pa ni srod la ste/ /'bring po dag ni nam phyed na/ /dngos grub rab dag spyad pa ni/ /skya reng 'char ka'i dus su'o/ /

dang po pa ni nang par ste/ /lhag ma gnyis la nges pa med/ /'bring po mtshan mo spyad bya ba/ /nang bar spyad par mi bya'o/ /dngos grub tha mar gyur pa dag /nang par spyad par dgag pa med/ /dus las 'das pa'i nges pa 'am/ /rim pa gzhan yang mi shes so/ /gang zhig

nang bar mi spyad la/ /gal te gnas pa'ang ma byas na/ /de ni dman ma bzhin bor ba/ /spyad zin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /bsgrub bas bskul ba'i rdzas dag la/ /gsang sngags gzi brjid kun zhugs pa/ /dus las 'das pa'i nyes pa yis/ /

phal cher yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ /bsnan pa dag ni phyi nas yang / /grub kyi bar du rung bar 'gyur/ /bsnan te bzhag pa'i rdzas dag ni/ /ci ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /gal te grub pa'i rdzas dag ni/ /nam yang spyad par ma byas na/ /

de las gzhan pa'i dus mtshams la/ /bzlas pa yang byas spyad par bya/ /ma grub pa yi rdzas dag la/ /cho ga de nyid rab tu bsgrags/ /dus tshigs dus tshigs dag la yang / /byin bskyed la sogs cho gas bsgrub/ /lo gsum gyis ni gang

ma grub/ /de ni nams kyang mi 'grub po/ /mchog tu gyur ba'i rdzas rnams la/ /cho ga 'di ni yongs su bsgrags/ /zla ba drug gis 'bring po rnams/ /dngos grub nye bar 'thob par 'gyur/ /chung ngu rnams la dus dag ni/ /gang yang nges

pa med par bshad/ /ri mo yi ni lha rnams la'ang / /cho ga 'di nyid bshad pa yin/ /yongs su bzung ba la sogs pa'i/ /cho ga'ang de las gzhan pa'ang bya/ /rdzas bsgrub pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // sems can snang dang mi

las/ /grub pa'i rdzas ma grub pa'i tshe/ /gal te phrogs par gyur nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya/ /tshes grangs mi dgos rgyu skar min/ /smyung bar bya ba'ang med par gsungs/ /mchog tu khro ba la gnas te/ /mod la dur

khrod thal ba yis/ /gru gsum nub tu sgo gtod pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya/ /de ltar bris nas phyi rol bsgor/ /sgrub pa'i rig sngags bzhag par bya/ /de nas shar du bcom ldan 'das/ /legs par grub byed ces bya ba/ /drag

po gnod sbyin sde dpon ni/ /mthu chen rig sngags rgyal po dang / /rdo rje khro bo rdo rje dbyug /rdo rje khu tshur lcags kyu ma/ /rdo rje kI li 'jigs byed gzugs/ /ser skya dang ni thog thog gzugs/ /lug rgyud rnam rgyal nag po dang / /de bzhin sgor ni dga' byed dgod/ /rdo rje sde dang

dpung bzang dang / /khro bo chen por grags pa rnams/ /de dag rigs bzhin bkod nas su/ /mkhas pas mchod pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod/ /gtor ma khrag dang bcas par gsungs/ /drag shul

spyod pa'i cho ga 'di/ /sngon du bstan pa kun kyang bya/ /mkhas pas rang gi rig sngags lha/ /sgo kar mngon du phyogs bzhag la/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis kyang / /cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor ci dga' bar/ /

de dang rjes su 'thun bya ste/ /lha ni drag po gang 'dod pa/ /mchod pa dag la sogs pa bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /drag shul spyod pa'i las kyi thab/ /gru gsum kha ran can byas te/ /sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya/ /

me 'bar yam shing sing ldeng ngo / /nim pa'am dur khrod nas skyes pa/ /rang gi khrag las bstags pa dang / /dur khrod thal ba sar ba 'am/ /dug khrag yungs kar bsres pa dang / /de nas ske tshe bsreg blugs dbul/ /rdzas 'phrog ba

yi phyir bsngos te/ /gzugs brnyan steng du gnas pa 'am/ /yang na gzugs brnyan gtub gtub cing / /'jug tu sbyin sreg dag kyang bya/ /khro bo'i cho ga shes ba yis/ /cho ga 'di ni bya bar gsungs/ /gsang sngags zlos pas

skrag gyur nas/ /rdzas 'phrog pa ni rings par yang / /'phrogs pa'i rdzas ni khyer nas su/ /mngon du 'ongs te sbyin bar byed/ /byed na de la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /zhi ba ci dgar rab tu bya/ /gal te zhi ba ma byas na/ /de tshe mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /

yang na mi snang ba yi rnams/ /dkyil 'khor sgor ni rdzas kyang 'jog /yang na zlos par 'dod pa'i rnams/ /rdzas dag lhag par ster bar 'gyur/ /rdzas 'phrog pa mod la dgug pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba'o// //rdzas phrogs nas ni

ring lon nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya/ /rigs gsum rnams kyi spyi yin te/ /dngos grub phyir ni las kun byed/ /thams cad du yang rig sngags rgyal/ /legs par grub byed ces bya ba/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /

phyag rgya bris te dgod par bya/ /rdo rje khro bo khro chen dang / /mA ma kI dang lcags kyu ma/ /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje'i tog /rdo rje dbyug pa tho ba dang / /'jigs byed lug rgyud kI li dang / /rdo rje blo gros mi thub ma/ /gsang sngags khro bo pho nya mo/ /rmad byung

pha rol gnon gang dang / /'dod pa 'byor byed rta mgrin dang / /phyag na zhal ras phal chen dang / /bcom ldan sna tshogs gzugs can dag /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu dgod/ /grags ldan ma dang dpal mo che/ /dkar mo dang ni gos dkar can/ /sgrol ma zla ba dpal

mo gang / /rmad byung pha rol gnon rnams dang / /'khor los sgyur sogs gtsug tor dang / /mdzod spu dang ni bde gshegs spyan/ /mche ba mdung thung byams ma che/ /rmad byung pha rol gnon gang dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub la

sogs pa/ /rigs kyi rig sngags bstan pa dang / /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags dang / /phyag rgya chen por grags pa dang / /phyi rol bsrung ba'i sgo ba dang / /cho gar gtogs pa gang yin ba'i/ /so so'i rigs

kyi mngag gzhug pa/ /brtson 'grus chen po dgod par bya/ /phyi rol 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /tshangs pa mes po chen po dang / /dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas/ /tshogs spyan tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /ma mo rnams dang klu

bdun dang / /de bzhin lha min bdag po dang / /bstan pa la ni gang dga' ba/ /rmad byung pha rol gnon kun dang / /dkyil 'khor snga mar gsungs pa yi/ /lha ni gang dang gang yin dang / /gsang sngags cho gar gang bstan pa/ /de kun

phyi rol mchod par gsungs/ /de nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /cho gas sngon bzhin me sbar te/ /rdzas 'phrog gzugs brnyan spra tshil las/ /byas te slob ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bya bar gsungs/ /der ni glor yang bzhag nas su/ /mtshon cha

yis ni btub btub cig /mjug tu tshul bzhin bsrag par bya/ /sngon bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga dang / /gtor ma yi ni las kyang bsgrags/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs de yi/ /cho ga kun gyi drag shul spyad/ /de bzhin rang gi rig sngags kyis/ /cho ga drag shul bya bar

gsungs/ /nyi shu brgyad la ma thob na/ /rdzas phyir dgra la drag shul spyod/ /mar gyi ngo yi tshes lnga la/ /cho ga byas pa de mchog go/ /lcug lcag gis ni dgra bzhu zhing / /de bzhin mes kyang gdung bar bya/ /sna tshogs tshig gis brgyad ba dang / /

mda' yi tsher ma rnon pos dbug /ske tshe lan tshwa byugs nas su/ /ci dga' bar ni yan lag gtub/ /dgra bo la ni cher khros pa/ /ci ltar 'dod pas chad pas gcad/ /dar ras dmar pos dkris nas su/ /skud pa dmar pos bcing bar bya/ /me tog

dmar pos mchod bya zhing / /ci srid 'dug gi bar du ni/ /rdzas kyi phyir ni bskul bya zhing / /nyin gcig bzhin du bzhu bar bya/ /gal te des ni de byin na/ /de tshe chad pas gcad pa bshol/ /rdzas ni bstan ba 'di dag gis/ /nam gyi phyed na sbyin

sreg bya/ /ko bi da rI'i yam bsreg shing / /'bru mar bstegs pa me la bsreg /rang gi khrag dang dug dang bcas/ /yungs kar lan tshwar bcas pa dang / /ske tshe de la bstegs pa yi/ /sbyin sreg brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/ /rdzas 'phrog pa yi ming dang ni/ /

rang bzhin dag ni smos nas su/ /khrag dang sbyar ba'i lan tshwa yis/ /lhag par sbyin sreg bya bar gsungs/ /gal te rdzas ni ma ster na/ /bdag nyid ngan ba 'dir brtag cing / /de tshe 'chi bar gyur pa'i las/ /ma lus bas ni sbyin sreg bya/ /gang tshe rdzas

ni sbyin gyur tam/ /yang na skyin pa gzhan yang rung / /sgrub ba bo la 'chags byed na/ /de tshe mkhas pas zhi bar bya/ /gal te chud ni gsan pa 'am/ /bag med pas ni spyad gyur ba/ /de tshe skrag pa de la ni/ /bsgrub pas myur du dad par gyis/ /'phags pa rdo rje

rnam 'joms sam/ /myur du khro bo chen po 'am/ /yang na mnol ba med pa yis/ /sbyin sreg las mthar myur du bskul/ /mkhas pas rigs gsum dag gis kyang / /'phrogs pa slar ni dgug pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni cho ga bzhin/ /gsang

sngags 'di ni sngon bzhin bya/ /na mo rata na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badzra/ dA ru

dA Na badzra/ dA ra ya bi dA ra ya badzra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/ b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hU~M phaT/ zlos bas gal te rdzas rnyed dam/ /yang na gzhan dag thub kyang rung / /de ni sngon bzhin dus mtshams la/ /bsrung bar bya ste sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan yang dngos grub 'bring dag dang / /

tha ma cung zad tsam la yang / /cho ga shes pas ci rigs par/ /de yi mod la sbyar bar gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal du/ /rdzas kyi cha cig thog mar dbul/ /blo dang ldan bas bla ma la/ /phyag byas nas ni gnyis pa dbul/ /gsum

pa sngar grub pa rnams la/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol dag tu dbul/ /bzhi pa grogs po rnams la sbyin/ /lnga pa bdag nyid spyad par bya/ /de la'ang skal ba phyed phyed du/ /bgos nas bdag gis phyed bskur ba/ /brtag bar bya ba'i rdzas rnams

la/ /cho ga 'di dag bshad pa yin/ /bcom ldan sku skal bdag nyid kyis/ /mchod yon phul nas bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams la slu ba'i phyir/ /mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs bshad/ /bla ma med par gyur na ni/ /bla ma'i skal ba bdag

gis blang / /de la lhag par gus bya ba/ /de ni de yi slu ba yin/ /sgrub ba po yis phyi rol du/ /mchod yon dbul zhing grub pa khyed/ /nyid kyi rdzas skal 'di bzhes zhes/ /tshig ni lan gsum bsgrag par bya/ /sngags grub pa rnams med na ni/ /

de yi skal bas sngags zlos pas/ /dogs med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /grogs po rnams la sbyin par bya/ /gsang sngags zlos pa'i grogs rnams ni/ /gus shing rtag par don du gnyer/ /dka' thub dag dang grogs byed pas/ /thog

ma nyid nas grub pa yin/ /de bas de yis sbyin pa ni/ /rdzas ni blang bar 'os bas na/ /bdag cag sngon nas grub pa zhes/ /'thun bar smra zhing blang bar bya/ /grub pa'i rdzas rnams de lta bur/ /bgo bar rab tu bsgrags pas na/ /

bdag rang nyid kyis de rnams la/ /rdzas ni rnam par bgo bar bya/ /grub pa'i rdzas rnams kha cig ni/ /ci ran tsam du bgo ste dper/ /any+dza na ni thams cad dang / /gi wang la sogs bzhin du bshad/ /cho ga shes pas la la ni/ /

yid kyis bgos pa byas te dper/ /ral gri la sogs mthong ba bzhin/ /de la phan gdags bsam par bya/ /grub pa'i rdzas rnams kha cig ni/ /gcig pus spyad par bya ste dper/ /ras la sogs pa mthong ba bzhin/ /

de la phan gdags bsam par bya/ /grub pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag las/ /kha cig mnyam par bgo ste dper/ /ri lu la sogs mthong ba bzhin/ /de la phyed du bgo ba med/ /rdzas rnams la yang phal cher yang / /gcig pus mang du bkur bar

gsungs/ /skal bar nor ram man ngag bstan/ /rgyud las gsungs pas yid ches bya/ /'di dag khyod kyis byos shig ce'am/ /bdag gi nor 'di khyod kyi'o zhes/ /bzlas rjod byed pas grogs po la/ /bgo ba dag ni de ltar bya/ /grub

par gyur na cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pa dag gis phan 'dogs pa/ /bdag nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /gang yang rung bas rab tu bya/ /dngos grub rnam pa mang po dag /grub pas rnam par bgo ba ni/ /bye brag tu ni bdag nyid kyis/ /dri med

blo yis shes par bya/ /skal pa dbang ba mchog gnas su/ /zlos pas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /bka' lung grub par shes par bya/ /de yi 'og tu bgo bar gsungs/ /de ltar kun la ci rigs par/ /legs par bgo bar bya bar

gsungs/ /dngos grub dag ni phal la yang / /mdor na cho ga de bzhin bya/ /gus shing nor dang mchod pa bya/ /bka' bzhin byed par phan 'dogs pas/ /rdzas grub bla ma'i skal la sogs/ /slu ba dag ni de ltar bshad/ /rang gi mchod

yon phul nas su/ /rdzas rnams legs par lung bzhin bgo/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag byas nas/ /rig rgyal mo la'ang gus byas te/ /blo yis gsang sngags lha rnams la/ /gus par bsam ste spyad par bya/ /blo can grub nas

nam mkha' la/ /ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya/ /'on tam grub pa rnams dang ni/ /lhan cig 'dug kyang cis mi tshugs/ /rtag tu rang gi lha nyid ni/ /yid la yongs su bzlas pa dang / /bdag gi grub pa'i rdzas rnams la/ /rtag tu blta zhing dran

byas na/ /pha rol gnod pa byed pa ni/ /sdang ba rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs/ /mkhas pas rig sngags brgya bzlas nas/ /grub pa rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi rig sngags bzlas na ni/ /sgrub po 'jigs pa kun las thar/ /

gcig la gcig ni mthong ba na/ /mkhas pas legs par smra bar bya/ /legs par 'ongs sam bde 'am zhes/ /mthong nas dang por mngon par brjod/ /dam tshig rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / /grub pa'i rdzas kyang bstan par bya/ /gang nas

'ongs zhes zer na yang / /dris pa'i lan yang gdab par bya/ /lha yi gnas ni thams cad dang / /shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / /dka' thub gnas dang byin can dang / /mchod sbyin pa dang bram ze'i gnas/ /mu stegs la sogs grub

pa dang / /nam yang 'da' bar mi bya'o/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'das gyur na/ /'khrugs nas mod la ltung bar 'gyur/ /bag med dam tshig nyams pa yis/ /ltung ngam ltung bar gyur kyang rung / /rig rgyal nyid kyis bzlas na ni/ /de nas mod la

ldang bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' gzugs med pa la'ang / /rab tu grub pa lha mig can/ /rang gi las rnams rig 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor can rnams 'gro ba bzhin/ /de bas sngon chad sprul pa yis/ /lam nas 'gro dang 'ong bar

'gyur/ /bsod nams dbang gis gnas kyi phyir/ /khyim yang ci ltar 'dod pa 'byung / /kun nas ljon shing mang pos brgyan/ /sna tshogs bya rnams 'phur zhing lding / /lha yi bu mo rgyu ba yi/ /rgyan gyi sgra ni sil khrol can/ /de yi

glu gar sil snyan gyis/ /mngon bar dga' ba'i yon tan gsal/ /me tog bzang po gsum gyis khyab/ /mar me'i 'od ni rab tu gsal/ /gang dang gang du kun brtags pa/ /der yang dpag bsam ljon shing che/ /'dod pa thams

cad 'byor ba yi/ /rmad du byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung / /rin chen rdo leb ngal bso'i phyir/ /nor bu'i gzhi las 'bab chu can/ /sa gzhi ne'u bsing gis brgyan pa/ /thams cad du yang mngon par 'byung / /rgyan rnams dang ni gos rnams dang / /

rtsed mo rnams kyi cha byad dang / /bdud rtsi la sogs 'bras ldan pa'i/ /dpal gyi shing yang de las byung / /de ltar grub pa 'dod pa rnams/ /ci ltar 'dod pa thams cad 'grub/ /grub par gyur nas de nas ni/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni 'bad par bya/ /dben

pa'i bskyed mos tshal dag gam/ /ri rnams kyi ni rtse mo 'am/ /rgya mtsho yi ni gling dag gam/ /mtsho chen dag gi gling ma'ang rung / /rang 'phrul sprul pa las byung ba/ /grub pa dga' phyir spyod bar byed/ /grub pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu/ /sngon grub pa yi gnas su'ang rung / /

de ltar grub pa byas na yang / /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /rdzas des bsrungs te bzhag pa 'am/ /cho ga bzhin du gnas par bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa ci las gsungs/ /lhag par yang ni byas nas su/ /mkhas pas rdzas de snga ma bzhin/ /slar yang bzlas te

bsgrub par bya/ /'on kyang gal te rdzas de ni/ /brgya la grub par ma gyur na/ /brtson 'grus brtan par bskyed nas ni/ /der ni phyir yang bsgrub par bya/ /gal te lan bdun bar du rdzas/ /bsgrub te 'on kyang ma grub na/ /gang gi cho ga 'di byas pa/ /des ni nges par

'grub par 'gyur/ /bsod snyoms zas la za zhing gnas/ /bsgrub po bzlas brjod byed la brtson/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dad pa yis/ /mchod rten che la phyag bya'o/ /gus pas shes rab pha rol phyin/ /bdun nam yang na lan brgyar klag /yang na

yon ni khyad par can/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i gling ma 'am/ /yang na rgya mtsho'i gling ma la/ /mchod rten dag ni khru gang ba/ /mkhas pas gus pas brgya byas te/ /re re'i mdun nas 'dug nas ni/ /bzlas brjod

dag kyang stong byas nas/ /mchod rten tha ma 'bar gyur ba/ /mthong nas nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga ni byas bas kyang / /stong dag legs par byas nas ni/ /mchod rten nges par 'bar 'gyur zhing / /gdon mi za bar 'grub par

'gyur/ /kun la'ang bye bar bzlas na ni/ /nges par 'grub par rnam par bstan/ /nyes pa chen po byas pa yang / /lo bcu gnyis kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga bzhin du ma bsnyen pas/ /rig sngags dngos grub mi ster na/ /tshim par bya phyir

bshad pa yi/ /sbyin sreg de ni brtsam par bya/ /yang na las dang don rnams kun/ /bsgrub par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /bris nas de yi nang nyid du/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi bya'o/ /ri yi rtse mo'am phyugs lhas sam/ /yang na gang gA'i gling

ma 'am/ /yang na sa gzhi mnyam byas par/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po sngon bzhin bya/ /'di ni blo dang ldan ba yis/ /khru ni brgya rtsa brgyad par bya/ /de dang mnyam pa'i bum pa yis/ /kho ra khor yug nye bar brgyan/ /rta babs bzang po bzhi dag kyang / /

sgo sgo dag tu yongs su gzugs/ /khor yug rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /ba dan sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /rta babs dag kyang rgyal mtshan dang / /lo ma sar pa dag gis brgyan/ /phreng ba brgyus pa gshibs pa dag /blo dang ldan bas bcad

par bya/ /phyi rol kho ra khor yug tu/ /mar gyi mar me gsal bya zhing / /bdug spos rigs ni sna tshogs pas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bdug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa khor yug tu/ /khru bdun dag dang ldan ba dang / /gsum pa khru ni gsum

pa ste/ /cho ga de ltar yongs su gzung / /mchod sogs cho ga gang yin dang / /dkyil 'khor cho ga sngon bzhin bya/ /gzhan yang cho ga lhag par ni/ /sbyin sreg dag kyang bya bar gsungs/ /dbus su rang gi rig sngags kyis/ /bum pa gang ba

bzhag nas su/ /de yi phyogs bzhi dag tu yang / /sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kun/ /shar gyi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /byang phyogs su ni pad ma'i rigs/ /cha dang 'thun par legs par
