gnas pa dang nam mkha' mdzod dang / lag na rin po che dang / mngon bar shes pa lnga dang dbang thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / nams kyang dbang po zhan cing dbang po dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lta ba ngan par ltung bar mi

'gyur ba dang / nams kyang yul 'khor ngan pa dang / skye bo ngan pa'i nang du skye bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang mi khom par skye par ma gyur cig /nams kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mthong ba dang thos pa dang / mchod pa dang rim gro

bgyid ba dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur ba nas rmi lam du yang nyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir nams kyang byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang sems can

yongs su smin bar bgyid pa dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang skad cig tu yang thabs dang shes rab dang bral bar ma gyur cig /nams kyang rigs dman pa dang

brtson 'grus zhen pa dang / le lo can du ma gyur cig /bdag tshe rabs tshe rabs su sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la brtson 'grus sbyangs pa skye bar gyur cig /sems can la sman pa'i slad du bdag brdzus te skye bar gyur cig /

ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khrungs pa de ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar gyur cig /de nas bstan bcos thams cad dang / bzo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kIrti ta sarba

dzi no b+hi/ a he kIrti ta/ sarba dzi na bi/ badzra a ka ri badzra sa~M b+hA ba pi/ badzra ba da ka re swA hA/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkhas nye bar 'tsho ba ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis yang dag par bsgrubs

pa'i phung po lnga po gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su spyod pa dag la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /nam gum nas kyang bya rgod dang /

spyang ki dang / khyi dang / wa dang gcan zan dang / bya rnams kyis lpags pa dang / sha dang / rgyus pa dang / rus pa dang rkang dang / khrag rnams yongs su za bar gyur cig /de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges

par gyur cig /de nas khams gsum na rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i sems can de snyed sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la rnam par thar par bgyid par gyur cig /rnam par thar bar bgyis nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dag la rab tu

'god par gyur cig /de nas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /thos pa dang / dran pas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ gar+b+he gar+b+he/ gar+b+ha bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa
gang lags pa de dag la bdag gi bsam ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas rus pa'i khong nas dga' ba dang / rkang gi khong nas dga' bas sems thams cad dang / lus thams cad btud nas sems can la sman pa'i

slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de tsam du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga na a ka re/ ga ga na sa~M b+ha be/ ga ga na kIrti ka re swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshogs shin tu bsags pa

pa gang lags pa rnams dang / tshogs chung ngu gang lags pa rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang lags pa rnams dang / byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa gang lags pa de rnams la bdag skul ma 'debs te/

de rnams la bdag gi lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa de dbul bar bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshogs rnams shin du bsags shing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams legs par bsags nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar gyur cig /bdud bzhi tshar gcod par gyur cig /sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /sems can la sman pa'i slad du sems

can gyi khams dang las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de tsam du bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a k+Sha ye a k+Sha ye/ a k+Sha bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rdul phra mo snyed kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' de rnams kyi smon lam chen po bcu po khri phrag grangs med pa gang lags pa de dag mdzad pa rnams la lhun gyi grub par 'jug pa de bzhin du bdag tshe rabs tshe rabs su 'jug par gyur cig /de nas sangs rgyas kyi

zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'jig rten

gyi khams mngon bar dga' ba dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de'i 'jig rten gyi

khams mig mi 'dzums dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan ba dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs de'i 'jig rten gyi

khams dri bsung zhim pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bkod pa dang / ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal

po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sbyin pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs ba dra ba can gyi 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi gleng gzhir sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che chen po'i

pad ma'i snying po byung ba mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi mthu rab tu 'byung zhing / der de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas par gyur cig /ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis smon lam chen po shin du yongs su dag pas bsgrubs pa na/ rang gi

bsod nams las nges par skyes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan pa de dag yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi

zhing gcig tu 'gyur zhing chu zheng dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan gyi rgyan dpag tu med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khyad par du 'phags pa mngon par mtho ba'i rgyan bkod par mthong ba dang / reg pa dang thos pa dang /

dran pas lhan cig mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su btang ba/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/

dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes mi snyags pa/ ngang tshul ngan pa/ sdig pa'i chos yang dag par spyod pa/ rgyud bsregs pa bsam pa bsregs pa/ sa bon bsregs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa/

ngan song la mngon bar phyogs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gtum po dam pa'i chos spong ba de rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'das pa dang por 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gis de dag thams

cad zhi ba'i lam bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la 'god par gyur cig /de nas ji tsam du khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can de rnams zhing der 'dus pa gnyis pa las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdag gis de dag thams

cad bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'god par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa dung gi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sha~M khe sha~M khe/ shang

kha paN+Da re swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dus pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa gang lags pa

de dag thams cad bdag gcig pu gnyis su ma mchis pas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'phel bar bgyi bar spros/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa

dang smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad cing / de las gzhan pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang mngon du mdzad nas bde bar bzhugs pa tshegs chung ngus bzhugs su

gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rtse mo'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ shi khe/ shi kha ban+d+he swA hA/ de'i 'og tu bdag tshogs shin du bsags/ gnag pa yongs su rdzogs/ bsam ba yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi

bya ba yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi ba de bzhin nyid kyi 'khor lo dang /

yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'khor lo dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byed

pa'i 'khor lo dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i 'khor lo dang / bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i

'khor lo dang / nga dang / bdag dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon bar zhen pa'i bar mi dmigs pa'i

'khor lo dang / mdor na gang na 'khor lo med pa/ bskor ba med pa de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar gyur cig /rab tu bskor nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par gyur cig /yongs su smin bar bgyis nas sems

can la sman pa'i slad du sems can gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ci tsam pa de tsam du gnas par gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

tad+ya thA/ sar+b+ba ma n+ya pra ha swA hA/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan yongs su sbyong ba dang / de bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / pha ma dang bla ma dang / yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dman pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa las bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i

rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rjes su yi rang ba dang / mthol ba dang / bshags pa dang ldan pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang ldan pa dang / byis pa nas bzung nas da ltar ram/ skye ba thog ma dang tha

ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag tu bsags pa nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar gang lags pa de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas mchog dang /

gtso bo dang / gya nom pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam ba ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam ba dang mnyam ba dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par

rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ltar mnyam ba dang / lus dang sems

grol ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /

byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad nas yongs su bsngos pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba dang / yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /

ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' de dang / ji ltar chos kyi dbyings de dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang / ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de nas ji ltar de kho na nyid mthong

ba'i bar gang la gnyis med cing gnyis ma yin pa med pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha bi sha ya bi sho d+ha ni

swA hA/ 'phags pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyal po sngags dang bcas pa ji snyed pa rdzogs s+ho// //paN Di ta bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ye shes snying po dang / dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
la phab pa/ gnyis zhuso/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang / /ngan 'gro rnams las

bsgral ba dang / /nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba'i phyir/ /srid pa mi bde dog pa na/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs ci mchis pa/ /de ltas yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /sems can phongs

pa thams cad kyi/ /skyabs su bdag nyid rtag tu shog /bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon/ /rten med rnams kyi rten du bdag /skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa dang / /bdag ni sems

can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs zhi bar byed par shog /dge ba'i las rnams gang dang gang / /'di dang gzhan du bsags pa rnams/ /bsod nams ye shes shes bya ba'i/ /tshogs ni rnam pa gnyis su shog /pha rol phyin pa

drug sgo nas/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus gang brtsams pa/ /de yang sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad la ni phan par shog /tshe yi mtha' klas byed pa dang / /gang yang cung zad byed 'gyur ba/ /mdor na sems can

thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs thams cad zhi ba dang / /grol bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing / /byang chub rab tu dga' brtson no/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /cho ga bzhin du kun du bskyed/ /sems can kun dang snying rje dang / /byams pa nye

bar gnas par bya/ /sems ni legs par sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rjes dran drug /nang gi bdag nyid zhi ba yis/ /bsam pa gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/ /

bdag kyang dge ba'i sems kyis su/ /de bzhin du ni smon lam 'debs/ /chos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs la/ /mnyam par bzhag nas yi rang ngo / /sems can thams cad bde ba dang / /zhi zhing nad kyang med par shog /bdag ni bya ba kun nus

shing / /yon tan dang yang ldan par shog /nor ldan gtong phod shes rab can/ /bzod ldan dge la dad pa dang / /sems can tshe rabs thams cad du/ /skye ba dran zhing brtser ldan shog /dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po

las byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus so/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan ba dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug

bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang
ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams

cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems

can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam

ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis

rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing

nyams thag ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i

dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang byung bas skye bo mang po nyams thag pa de dag zhi ba dang

ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/

bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jig rten chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po

mdzad par gyur cig /bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa' dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/

spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub

pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /ji ltar
thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang
sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

bgyid par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum

gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyis thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /

ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing / /de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par/ /de srid mgon

po mtshan brjod cing / /ngag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/ /de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba/ /de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / /yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /de ltar lus dang ngag yid

kyis/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis pas/ /lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu sbyor bar

bgyis pas na/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/ /de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/ /srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA pa lo

ke te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ oM tsakra ba ti/ tsin+ta ma Ni ma hA pa du me ru ru tiSh+Tha/ dz+wa la A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs s+ho// //oM pa du me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/ snying po'o/ /

oM ba r-i da pa du me hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ma Ni badzre Ni hU~M/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sngags snying bzhin du 'byung / smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus/ /

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di'am yang dag 'das pa dang / /mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/ /

de bas 'di na rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ /shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye/ /bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa

gang yang med/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa/ /ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa/ /rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis la mthong ba/ /

ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing / /gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni/ /drang srong chen po

gang zag mtshungs med pa/ /bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs/ /de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/ /zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin/ /'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa

de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang dag brten pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing / /gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa/ /de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/ /mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /de bas dge 'dun

rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/ /'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang / /the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag /cig char spangs te

'phags pa'i bden mthong ba/ /des ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang / /sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing / /glo bur byas

na'ang 'chab par mi byed la/ /de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/ /phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams

kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/ /gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /shes rab zab

mos shin du bstan pa yi/ /'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing / /lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni/ /de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de

yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba/ /lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/ /de ltar kun du sbyor ba rab btang ba/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog

tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng
'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /

sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /

sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /'di na rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin du bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa

de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang / /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / /dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang / /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /

shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /kau di n+ya'i sngar thob dang / /kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang / /tshangs pa yi ni byams

pa dang / /brgya byin gyis ni dbang rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang / /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang / /de dag rnams
kyi mthu dang gzis/ /bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho// // /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad ma dkar po'i drung / /thams cad skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i

drung / /sangs rgyas gser thub u dum ba ra'i drung / /'od srung n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na gnas/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /
mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde
legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing / /
khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med/ /
bden pa'i tshig gis kun du bde legs shog /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ /

@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zas skom bzang po ro zhim zhing mdog sdug la dri bsung dang ldan zhing ngad ldang ba/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i nags

tshal dkon zhing dri ma med la rgyan gyis klubs pa/ yal ga'i thor to'i ljid kyis g.yur za la mgo lcogs me tog kha phye zhing 'dab mas legs par brgyan te/ bung ba lang long khyus lding zhing 'phungs pa
rnams kyis bzhib cing non pa'i shugs kyis bag tsam 'dar ldem ldem la/ rin chen yal ga dang ma rgad lcug phran gyi bla re 'jol ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ 'gro ba dag tu ma tshor bar 'gro ba'i

g.yang sa chen po ya nga ba dag tu mar me snang gsal dag cing dri ma med pa lta bu byin pa gang las bsod nams dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dge ba dang / dge ba'i rgyu dang 'thun pa bde dgu'i

gzhir gyur pa des na sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba che ge mo zhig gi lus dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis bsgrubs pa la tshe dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang / gzi byin dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang /

shes rab dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /sbyin bdag gi bsod nams ma skyes pa rnams ni skye bar gyur cig /sbyin bdag gi longs spyod skyes zin pa rnams ni 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /de bzhin du

sbyin bdag gi pha ma mchog tu dka' ba byed byed pa/ gso gso/ gnam gnam/ bskyed bskyed/ bsring bsring la 'dzam bu'i gling bkra yer yer mig gis mthong bar byed pas kyang bsod nams kyi phud kyi skal shas thob

par gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi chung ma rnams dang / bu rnams dang / bu mo rnams dang / sbyin bdag gi gnyen mdab mdza' bshes rgyas pa'i tshan ris gang dag 'khod cing 'tsho la gnas pa de dag kyang tshe ring zhing /

longs spyod che la g.yog 'khor mang bar gyur cig /gang dag 'das shing tshe 'phos pa de dag kyang 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i gnas dang gnas tha dad pa'i khyad par thob par gyur te/ lha'i gnas su skyes par gyur nas/

'phags pa byams pa'i zhal snga nas mnyes par byed par gyur cig /de bzhin du rgyal po'i mchog rgyal po chen po mnga' bdag dam pa dpal lha btsan pos ma phebs pa rnams ni phebs par gyur cig /phebs zin pa rnams

ni cham du phebs par gyur cig /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyang brnyes par gyur cig /de bzhin du nye 'khor gyi grong na gnas pa'i rigs bzhi ste/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang /
dmangs rigs la sogs pa yul gyi mi rnams la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur cig /de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bde ba'i ri bo dang / gangs can dang / lngas rtsen dang / lnga len la sogs pa dang /

nor bu bzang dang / rdzogs bzang gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya 'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang /

nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sbyin bdag gi khyim 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dang / sbyin bdag gis bsten pa'i lha'i khyad par gyis de dag gzi byin dang / stobs dang gzhal

med khang rnams rgyas par gyur cig /de dag gzi byin dang ldan par gyur/ stobs dang ldan par gyur/ gzhan gyis mi tshugs par gyur/ che bar grags par gyur nas/ sbyin bdag bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid kyi mdzod dang /

bang ba dang / ba lang gi khyu dang / phyugs gdags sna tshogs kyi khyu dang / zhing gi rmo brko dang / las kyi sgo rnams dang / bla 'og gi bya ba thams cad la chos bzhin du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par gyur

cig /gnod pa rnams ni zlog par gyur cig /don du bsgrubs pa rnams ni snang bar gyur cig /de bzhin du sbyin bdag gi dad pa dang sbyar te/ dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi gnod pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar
gyur cig /dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba rnams zlog par gyur cig /yi dgas kyi bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /mi rnams tshol khros g.yen spyo ba'i sdug bsngal

thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /mdor na khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can

thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad kyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa ma skyes ma byung ba/ ma byas ma bcos pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi gnas pa/ dmigs su med pa/ bde ba/ zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ bde legs can/

gnas dang gling dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / mi g.yo ba gang yin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi mchog de reg cing thob par gyur cig /gnod sbyin gang dag bzhon pa mi zad dpung can lha rdzas

gos gyon phreng ba thogs/ /gang dag 'jig rten gsum mchod mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song ba/ /lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras la sogs pa/ /de dag thams

cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyi khyim du chos bzhin srung bar shog /lngas rtsen dang ni 'phrog ma bu sdug 'khor bcas nor bu bzang sras dpung dang bcas rnams dang / /gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas

dang rang gi sder bcas dang / /gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang po gang dag sde chen grags ldan bstan pa dag la dga' ba rnams/ /thams cad 'thun par khyod kyi pha tshan dang ni gnyen sdug bcas la rtag tu skyong gyur cig /

mtshan mo dang ni nyi ma 'char kha nyi ma'i gung rnams dang / /nyi ma nub kar rtag tu khyod la bkra shis ldan par shog /dpal chen lag na rdo rje nor bu bzang dang 'phags skyes sogs/ /khyod dang gnyen 'dun rnams dang
bcas la yongs su skyong gyur cig /gtong la dpa' ba rnams kyang khyim 'khor stobs dang 'byor pa grub cing mi nad med par shog /yon gnas rnams kyang yon tan tshogs pas 'phel bar 'gyur zhing
'bru rnams rab tu rgyas par shog /mchod rten rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring 'bar bar shog /rgyal po chos bzhin byed pas skyong gyur sems can mtha' dag rab zhi
bde ba myong gyur cig /sbyin pa'i rabs las 'byung ba'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus/ stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ / @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la ser sna rnams

chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams

cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig

byams pa yi/ /thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung

gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo
chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos

shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs
mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /

thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin bcas lha bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde

legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de di ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /
rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du
bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyi/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /

sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed
cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /

sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i bde legs kyi
tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ yang zhus s+ho/ /@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ swasti gA thA/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha cig nye bar song nas su/ /lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ /sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che/ /ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur/ /des ni tshig rnams gsan gyur nas/ /'jig rten rtsa

lags bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu brjod byed pa/ /nga yi bde legs 'gyur te nyon/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na/ /rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa/ /des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/ /

cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs

shog /zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin du gya nom gang / /shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/ /de sngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /

dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /rgyal ba gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/ /de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung

bzhi ste/ /sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin du dkon/ /de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis na shin du bde legs shog /dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/ /'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog /mchog min
mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni

shin du bde legs shog /ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang / /mtha' yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ /ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa/ /ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/ /

ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam ste/ /
stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa/ /de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/ /'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang
zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams
kun dang ldan/ /kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral/ /bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar
nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med/ /skyon med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /shin du 'gog cing gya nom nges par

'byung / /shin du dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde
legs shog /shin du sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i/ /bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod pa/ /bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba/ /de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/ /
ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /dam pa rnams kyis
dam pa don dam mkhyen/ /mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtson/ /gzhan gyis mi phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/ /shin du sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyan mchog /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung
dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden ba 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /'dun pa bskyed nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing / /

gau tam bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhi/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhi der reg /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten
mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /bden pa mthong bas brjed pas brgya lam na/ /gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang / /de ni de 'chab pa

yi 'os min te/ /chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro/ /ngo mtshar shin du du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis
ni shin du bde legs shog /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med/ /ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog /
ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du du bde legs shog /so ga'i zla ba

dang por thub pa yis/ /nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/ /chos de dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med/ /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos
kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /sdig pa rnying zad gsar du byas med la/ /rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral/ /

srid pa 'gags pas rtsa ba mi skyed pa/ /bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden
mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus s+ho/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ swas+t+ya ya na gA thA/
bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/ /lha zhig nye bar song nas su/ /gang gis rtag tu bde legs pa/ /
bdag gis zhu yis bcom ldan gsungs/ /dam pas de dag gsan pa dang / /'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pas/ /gang gis kun du bde legs su/ /'gyur ba lha khyod legs par nyon/ /gang zhig de bzhin
gshegs pa la/ /dad pa mi g.yo legs rab brtan/ /gang zhig dge ba tshul khrims can/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang / /bu dang bu mo bran dag la/ /rtag tu legs par
bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/ /legs par rab dad yon 'bul dang / /lha yi bka' bzhin byed pa dag /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /
gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med pa dang / /gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la/ /tshad med kun du mi 'khrugs
pa/ /byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgom pa/ /de dag kun du bde
legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi/ /stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing / /de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus kyis dri med chos/ /mngon sum

byas nas rgyu ba dang / /dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing / /ye shes 'khrug med skyes gyur pa/ /
de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig ltar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs
su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ yang zhuso/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ de ba pa ri pr-its+tshA maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na/ /lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la/ /phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to/ /
dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /
lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed pa/ /de dag bkra shis brjod par bya/ /yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang / /sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang / /sems ni legs par gtad

byas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin dang shin du snyan smra dang / /yang dag don la rnam nges dang / /khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /byis pa rnams la mi sten dang / /

mkhas pa rnams la sten pa dang / /mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / /'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/ /de ni bkra
shis dam pa yin/ /sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang / /dge ba'i las la sten pa dang / /bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang / /chog shes

'thun pas 'tsho ba dang / /rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin spyod de bzhin bzod pa dang / /'phags pa rnams dang 'thun sbyor dang / /dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa/ /de ni bkra
shis dam pa yin/ /le lo med dang mang thos dang / /chos la legs par rnam nges dang / /de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig sems can thams cad la/ /
byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgom zhing / /dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs dang / /tshul khrims
nongs par ma gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang / /mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /
gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang / /shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang / /gang gi sems

ni mi g.yo dang / /dri med zhi dang mya ngan med/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /de dang 'di ni ci rigs par/ /'di la bkra shis de dag ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/ /lhas
zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ /@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha
de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mi
bskyod pa/ /rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /rigs lnga bde gshegs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje sems ma dang ni
rin chen sems ma dang / /chos kyi sems ma dang ni las kyi sems mar bcas/ /bcom ldan yum mchog rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /

rdo rje sems dpa' dang ni rdo rje rgyal po dang / /rdo rje chags pa dang ni rdo rje legs par bcas/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /

rdo rje rin chen dang ni rdo rje gzi brjid dang / /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang ni rdo rje bzhad par bcas/ /bcom ldan rin 'byung 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /

rdo rje chos rab dang ni rdo rje rnon po dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje smra bar bcas/ /bcom ldan snang mtha'i 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /rdo rje las rab

dang ni rdo rje srung ba dang / /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ni rdo rje khu tshur bcas/ /bcom ldan don grub 'khor gyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo sgeg mo dang ni lha mo phreng ba ma/ /

lha mo glu ma dang ni lha mo gar mar bcas/ /nang gi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /lha mo bdug spos ma dang lha mo me tog ma/ /lha mo mar me ma dang lha mo

dri mar bcas/ /phyi yi mchod pa'i lha mo'i bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /sgo ba lcags kyu ma dang sgo ba zhags pa dang / /sgo ba lcags sgrog ma dang sgo ba dril bur bcas/ /

bcom ldan sgo bsrungs rnams kyi bkra shis gang yod pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bkra shis shog /dpal rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa
lha sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus s+ho/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ /

sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/ /tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par
sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can/ /tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/ /
shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/ /tshe lo drug khri'i dus na
grong khyer mnyam med du/ /shing mchog sa la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /

tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan
bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ /u dum ba ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /skyob pa 'od
srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/ /tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI ru/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'gro

mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can/ /tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/ /a shwat+tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs
gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang / /phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba/ /chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi
'gyur ba/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thA ga ta ma~M ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang

mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/ /zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa/ /dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa/ /dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye
dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing / /yang dag bden pa'i 'byor ba sbyin mdzad mi slu ba/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /
bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /ye shes pad ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing / /tshe grangs med par byin gyis
rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing / /'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa/ /
thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
stag lung rgyud 'bum lag tugs/ yang zhus s+ho/ / @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ bcom ldan gser mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /
'jig rten gsum mgon 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku/ /bde gshegs sku yi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /
'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /bde gshegs gsung gi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten
gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog /dpal rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ rdzogs s+ho// //
stag lung rgyud 'bum lag tugs/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ rata na tri ma~M ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya mtsho lta bur rgal dka' 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgal/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis bsag dka' ma lus rdzogs/ /'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig gyur pa de bzhin

gshegs/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /rang don spangs shing gzhan don rtag tu lhur len cing / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lta ba rgyang bsrings te/ /dad dang brtson 'grus lhur len
grogs mchog byang chub sems/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /skye 'gag med cing rtog pa'i 'ching byed mtha' dag spangs/ /ma rig mun pa 'joms byed stong nyid sgron ma'i
mchog /dmigs pa sna tshogs spangs pa lam gyi bde sgrub chos/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ stag lung rgyad 'bum lag tugs/ / @#/ /rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i rtags su sku mdog gser 'dra ba/ /shes rab rtags su ral gri po ti
phyag na bsnams/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /thugs rje'i rtags su sku mdog zla ba'i 'od chags pa/ /
skyon gyis ma gos phyag mtshan phyag na pad ma bsnams/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags
su sku mdog mthing nag sngo/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /
rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus so/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ / @#// // rgya gar skad du/ ma~M ga la gA thA/
bod skad du/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum
spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo
ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /
dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i
bkra shis gsum pa'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/ /tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /
bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /dbang bcas lha yis bskor ba'i
bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum ba'i tshal/ /lha mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bltams pa na/ /srid pa'i

mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /lhum nas bltams pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang
sras/ /myur bskrun bdud rtsi 'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha
yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung
ste/ /dka' thub tshul du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/ /lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /

rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing / /bai dUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng bzhugs te/ /dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi

byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba/ /shin du rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams
la zhi byed shog /shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /mang po btul te sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/ /bkra shis
des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te/ /nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dgra rnam btul ba/ /ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis
gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer bA rA Na sA+er drang srong mchog bzhugs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang / /lha yul dang 'dir shin
du rmad du byung gyur pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa/ /bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan
shAkya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag /
nye bar ston ba rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs
lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/ /

man dA ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas
pa/ /mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dkon mchog gsum dang

mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa / rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
yang zhus so/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/ / @// // rgya gar skad du/ rata na tri swa sti gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi
tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med/ /chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i
dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med/ /dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs
rnam 'phel ba/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba/ /rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /
nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /tshangs dang lha dbang srungs ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/ /
bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang / /tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la

gsungs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yang zhus+ho/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs/
bsod nams chen po'i dpal gyis phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba/ gtsug lag gnyis kyi mdzad pas/ bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs tog dang / 'gro ba mang
po'i mgon skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dam par gyur cing / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs bas 'jig rten gyi bya ba la snying po med par gzigs nas/ rnam g.yeng kun spangs te ri khrod dben pa
kho nar bslab gsum gyi khang bzangs mang du thos pa'i nor gyis phyug cing / thugs rje'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tog gis mdzes pa'i/ bdag cag rnams kyi 'dren pa dam pa/
dpal ldan bla ma bzang po'i mtshan can/ dge sbyong chen po de'i thugs kyi dgongs pa khyad par can gong nas gong du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa'i gnas skabs
dang / mthar thug gi phan bde ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che yun ring du gnas shing / phyogs kun du dar cing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/
bod khams su smon lam gyi stobs can mnga' bdag lha btsan po/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lo paN skyes mchog khyad par can rnams kyi bdag rkyen la brten nas
bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab thog mtha' bar du dge zhing / sgro skur gyi mtha' dang bral la/ gzhung lugs ngan pa'i dri mas dben pa mdo sde dang / rgyud sde'i phyogs snga phyir 'gyur ro cog
rnams/ chos kyi rgyal po dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sdes ston pa dang bstan pa la shes nas mi phyed pa'i dad pa brtan pos kun nas bslang ste legs par bzhengs pa rnams la khyad par du gdul bya dbang po rnon
po dag tshogs rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs mang zhing sla la dus myur bas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'thob par byed pa/ gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa gsal bar byed pa'i gzhung lugs rgyud 'bum
zhes grags pa 'di rnams ni bla ma rje btsun chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi zhal snga nas dang / bla ma chen po chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi kar chag dang / slob dpon chen po rigs pa'i

ral gris mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi kar chag rgyud 'bum rgyan gyi me tog la sogs pa la brten nas gdan sa chen po dpal sa skya'i rgyud 'bum dang / shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po gser sdings pas zhus
dag dang go rims mdzad nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen skye med ston shes bzhengs pa'i rgyud 'bum dang / dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang gi dge bshes 'dar phyar gyis bzhengs pa'i rgyud 'bum
dang / bla ma gru spang rtsa ba'i phyag dpe dang / 'od dga' spun gsum gyi gtsug lag khang gi rgyud 'bum la sogs pa rgyud yang dag pa grangs mang zhing go rims legs la dag pa rnams la dpe

phyi byas te/ mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang du lung rigs kyi dbang phyug shAkya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis legs par bzhengs pa'i bka' 'gyur phyi mor gdan drangs nas mi'i dbang po thog gan

the mur gyi ring la/ ti sh+h+ri kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po bstan pa skyong ba'i dus/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga brgya bdun pa'i thar nye ba/ 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa gdul bya'i ngor zhi bar gshegs pa'i
tshul bstan nas lo sum stong bzhi brgya brgyad bcu 'das pa/ me mo phag gi lo gsar gyi zla ba tshes grangs gza' skar bzang po la dbu gtsugs te/ rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'dzin pa byang chub dpal
ldan gyis zhal ta'i rim pa rnams dang / /rgyu 'i dngos po bzang zhing mang la kha na ma tho ba med pas mthun pa'i rkyen bsgrubs nas/ bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal na len tra dang mtshungs pa sprul pa'i
rgyal po se chen gan gyi dgos kyi lha khang dpal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bzhengs te/ sde snod kyi tshul la cung zad blo kha phyogs pa thang po che pa'i btsun pa kun dga' 'bum

gyis kha ta dang / zhus dag gi dang ngos bgyis shing / gzhan yang dang ba dang brtson 'grus che zhing blo gros gsal ba'i sdom brtson dam pa mang du thos shing sde snod 'dzin pa rnams kyis rgya gar skad
la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i skad sor bzhag rnams ni sngon gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po rnams kyis mdzad pa bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po dang / sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas
dag par byas shing / bod skad rnams ni yul skad dang / 'phral skad ngan pa rnams dang / ma 'dres par bod yul gyi sngon gyi brda mes mkhan po rnams dang / sgyur byed
dam pa snga phyir byon pa rnams kyi brda gsar rnying dang / skad gsar bcad la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas da drag dang / ma mya dang / sa stsogs la sogs pa yod med rnams mkhas
pa rnams kyis ji ltar mdzad pa ltar gsung rab kyi dpe phyi rnams dang gtugs te/ brda don ma nor bar dag par byas nas/ gzhi dung gi sa gzhi ltar dkar zhing 'jam la mkhregs pa'i lho rgyal po
lha khang gi sho gu la/ dam che zhing mdangs gsal ba/ ud pal sngon po lta bu rgya nag chen po las 'ongs pa'i snag tshas/ 'bur dkyus tshugs gsum la mkhas pa'i
mthar phyin pas yi ge'i rig byed la/ slob dpon gyi go 'phang thob pas/ dag snyoms mdzes par bzhengs pa/ dbus gtsang gi yi ge pa yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa rnams kyis
legs par bris ba la phyi zhus lan gsum du byas shing / rgyud dngos yin pa dang ma yin pa rnams legs par phye nas/ kha cig gis mdo sngags yod pa rgyud du bris pa rnams ni

phye nas mdo nyid du bris shing / kha cig gis rgyud yin ngo shes pa mdo'i khrod du bris pa rnams kyang phye nas/ rgyud kyi nang du bris te/ 'dir ni rgyud sde bzhi po so sor phye nas rang rang gi gzhung tshad che chung
dang brjod bya 'thun pa dang / mtshan 'thun pa dang / sde tshan 'thun po rnams so sor bsdebs te/ grangs dang go rims tshang la ma nor bar rgyu bzang zhing bkod pa legs par bzhengs pa yin no/ /de ltar
bsod nams dpal gyis rab mtho ba/ /chos kyi rgyal po dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde/ /mchog gi blo gros mtshungs pa med pa des/ /dpal ldan bla ma dge sbyong chen po de'i/ /
thugs dgongs bla med rdzogs par bya phyir dang / /bstan pa spel phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung / /gangs ri'i khrod 'dir ji snyed 'gyur ro cog /legs par bzhengs par gyur pa de dag las/ /
'di dag rdo rje'i theg pa gsal byed pa/ /bstan pa'i snying po rgyud 'bum zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dpal ldan lhag bsam dag pa'i mthus/ /gsung rab rin chen tshul bzhin bzhengs pa las/ /
byung ba'i dge ba ston ka'i zla 'od dang / /mkha' ltar dag cing yangs pa gang thob des/ /'gro kun phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba yi/ /bstan pa rin chen phyogs dus
kun khyab cing / /sde 'dzin skyong dang srung ba'i dam pa rnams/ /skye dgu'i dpal du yun ring bzhugs gyur cig /gang gis gsung rab dri med 'di bzhengs pa/ /rgyal ba'i
sras po byang chub dpal ldan yang / /bstan dang 'gro ba'i rtsa lag dam par ni/ /sa chen steng 'dir yun ring bzhugs gyur cig /khyad par du yang des pas sa skyong ba'i/ /
mi dbang yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /bsnyun med sku tshe ring zhing chab srid brtan/ /byams brtse'i thugs kyis skye dgu skyong gyur cig /srid 'bangs rnams
kyang phan tshun byams ldan zhing / /nad dang mu ge 'thab rtsod la sogs pa/ /phyi nang nyer 'tshe'i gnod pa kun zhi nas/ /tshe ring 'byor ldan bstan la dad gyur cig /
gang dag 'di la sgo gsum gus pa yis/ /bya ba byed dang rjes su yi rang dang / /rgyu rkyen 'bul dang chos spyod rnam bcu yis/ /tshul bzhin sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang / /'dir yang
tshe ring nad med 'byor ldan zhing / /skye zhing skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du'ang / /'khor lo bzhi dang yon tan rnam bdun dang / /rnam smin brgyad ldan dal 'byor lus
thob nas/ /mthong dang bsgom pas spang bya'i nyon mongs dang / /shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags bcas pa kun/ /spong byed gnyen po lam lnga sa bcu rnams/ /rim gyis bgrod nas
kun mkhyen thob par shog /kun mkhyen ye shes zab yangs chu gter las/ /legs byung phrin las rnam bzhi'i 'od gsal bas/ /blo gros mun sel dngos grub kun gsol ba/ /
rgyud sde rin chen rnams kyi bkra shis shog /theg pa mchog gyur rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung / /gsal bar byed pa'i glegs bam/ bcwa brgyad la/ /
rnam dag rgyud sde brgya phrag bzhi dang ni/ /gcig dang bcas pa'i bcu phrag bzhi nyid bzhugs// //ye d+harmA he du pra b+ha bA he hun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba
data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra maNaH /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugaso/ /ma~M ga la~M b+ha ba tu/ shu b+ham stu sarba dza ga tA~M/ shu b+haM/ yang zhuso/ /
